atk-s0102a:13_0: 1. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… karerikuṭikāyanti mahāpadānasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā
atk-s0102a:13_1: – karerikuṭikāyanti karerīti varuṇarukkhassa nāmaṃ, karerimaṇḍapo tassā kuṭikāya
atk-s0102a:13_2: dvāre ṭhito, tasmā “karerikuṭikā”ti vuccati, yathā kosambarukkhassa dvāre ṭhitattā
atk-s0102a:13_3: “kosambakuṭikā”ti. Antojetavane kira karerikuṭi kosambakuṭi gandhakuṭi salaḷāgāranti
atk-s0102a:13_4: cattāri mahāgehāni, ekekaṃ satasahassapariccāgena nipphannaṃ. Tesu salaḷāgāraṃ raññā
atk-s0102a:13_5: pasenadinā kāritaṃ, sesāni anāthapiṇḍikena kāritāni. Iti bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikena
atk-s0102a:13_6: gahapatinā thambhānaṃ upari kāritāya devavimānakappāya karerikuṭikāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0102a:13_8: pacchābhattameva. Idha pana pakatibhattassa pacchato “pacchābhatta”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0102a:13_9: Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānanti piṇḍapātato paṭikkantānaṃ, bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhitānanti attho.
atk-s0102a:14_0: Karerimaṇḍalamāḷeti tasseva karerimaṇḍapassa avidūre katāya nisīdanasālāya. So kira
atk-s0102a:14_1: karerimaṇḍapo gandhakuṭikāya ca sālāya ca antare hoti, tasmā gandhakuṭīpi karerikuṭikāpi
atk-s0102a:14_3: dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ vibhattena pubbenivutthakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena
atk-s0102a:15_0: Udapādīti aho acchariyaṃ dasabalassa pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsaṃ nāma ke anussaranti,
atk-s0102a:15_1: ke nānussarantīti. Titthiyā anussaranti, sāvakā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhā ca anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:15_2: Kataratitthiyā anussaranti? Ye aggappattakammavādino, tepi cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussaranti,
atk-s0102a:15_3: na tato paraṃ. Sāvakā kappasatasahassaṃ anussaranti. Dve aggasāvakā asaṅkhyeyyañceva
atk-s0102a:15_4: kappasatasahassañca. Paccekabuddhā dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca. Buddhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:15_5: pana ettakanti paricchedo natthi, yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhanti, tāvatakaṃ anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:16_0: Titthiyā khandhapaṭipāṭiyā anussaranti, paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā na sakkonti. Paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0102a:16_1: anussarantāpi asaññabhavaṃ patvā khandhappavattiṃ na passanti, jāle patitā kuṇṭhā
atk-s0102a:16_2: viya, kūpe patitā paṅguḷā viya ca honti. Te tattha ṭhatvā “ettakameva, ito paraṃ
atk-s0102a:16_3: natthī”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti. Iti titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ
atk-s0102a:16_4: viya hoti. Yathā hi andhā yaṭṭhikoṭiggāhake satiyeva gacchanti, asati tattheva nisīdanti,
atk-s0102a:16_5: evameva titthiyā khandhapaṭipāṭiyāva anussarituṃ sakkonti, paṭipāṭiṃ vissajjetvā na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:17_0: Sāvakāpi khandhapaṭipāṭiyāva anussaranti, asaññabhavaṃ patvā khandhappavattiṃ na
atk-s0102a:17_1: passanti. Evaṃ santepi te vaṭṭe saṃsaraṇakasattānaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvakālo nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:17_2: Asaññabhave pana pañcakappasatāni pavattantīti tattakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā buddhehi
atk-s0102a:17_3: dinnanaye ṭhatvā parato anussaranti; seyyathāpi āyasmā sobhito. Dve aggasāvakā pana
atk-s0102a:17_4: paccekabuddhā ca cutipaṭisandhiṃ oloketvā anussaranti. Buddhānaṃ cutipaṭisandhikiccaṃ
atk-s0102a:17_5: natthi, yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ passitukāmā honti, taṃ tadeva passanti.
atk-s0102a:18_0: Titthiyā ca pubbenivāsaṃ anussaramānā attanā diṭṭhakatasutameva anussaranti. Tathā
atk-s0102a:18_1: sāvakā ca paccekabuddhā ca. Buddhā pana attanā vā parehi vā diṭṭhakatasutaṃ sabbameva anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:19_2: saradasūriyamaṇḍalobhāsasadisaṃ. Tassa ettakāni jātisatāni jātisahassāni jātisatasahassānīti
atk-s0102a:19_3: vā ettakāni kappasatāni kappasahassāni kappasatasahassānīti vā natthi, yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0102a:19_4: anussarantassa neva khalitaṃ, na paṭighātaṃ hoti, āvajjanapaṭibaddhameva ākaṅkhamanasikāracittuppādapaṭibaddhameva
atk-s0102a:19_5: hoti. Dubbalapattapuṭe vegakkhittanārāco viya, sinerukūṭe vissaṭṭhaindavajiraṃ viya
atk-s0102a:19_6: ca asajjamānameva gacchati. “Aho mahantaṃ bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇa”nti evaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva
atk-s0102a:19_7: ārabbha kathā uppannā, jātā pavattāti attho. Taṃ sabbampi saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “itipi
atk-s0102a:19_8: pubbenivāso, itipi pubvenivāso”ti ettakameva pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha itipīti evampi.
atk-s0102a:20_0: 2-3. Assosi kho…pe… atha bhagavā anuppattoti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:20_1: vuttameva. Ayameva hi viseso – tattha sabbaññutaññāṇena assosi, idha dibbasotena.
atk-s0102a:20_2: Tattha ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇakathā vippakatā, idha pubbenivāsakathā. Tasmā bhagavā – “ime
atk-s0102a:20_3: bhikkhū mama pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇaṃ thomenti, pubbenivāsañāṇassa pana me
atk-s0102a:20_4: nipphattiṃ na jānanti; handa nesaṃ tassa nipphattiṃ kathetvā dassāmī”ti āgantvā pakatiyāpi
atk-s0102a:20_5: buddhānaṃ nisīditvā dhammadesanatthameva ṭhapite taṅkhaṇe bhikkhūhi papphoṭetvā dinne
atk-s0102a:20_6: varabuddhāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave”ti pucchāya ca “idha, bhante”tiādipaṭivacanassa
atk-s0102a:20_7: ca pariyosāne tesaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetukāmo iccheyyātha
atk-s0102a:20_8: notiādimāha. Tattha iccheyyātha noti iccheyyātha nu. Atha naṃ pahaṭṭhamānasā bhikkhū
atk-s0102a:20_9: yācamānā etassa bhagavātiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha etassāti etassa dhammikathākaraṇassa.
atk-s0102a:21_0: 4. Atha bhagavā tesaṃ yācanaṃ gahetvā kathetukāmo “tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇāthā”ti
atk-s0102a:21_1: te sotāvadhāraṇasādhukamanasikāresu niyojetvā aññesaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:21_2: pakāsetukāmo ito so, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ vipassīti yasmiṃ kappe vipassī.
atk-s0102a:21_3: Ayañhi ‘ya’nti saddo “yaṃ me, bhante, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā
atk-s0102a:21_4: paṭiggahitaṃ, ārocemi taṃ, bhagavato”tiādīsu paccattavacane dissati. “Yaṃ taṃ apucchimha
atk-s0102a:21_5: akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī”tiādīsu upayogavacane. “Aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0102a:21_6: bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā”tiādīsu karaṇavacane. Idha pana bhummattheti
atk-s0102a:21_7: daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ – “yasmiṃ kappe”ti. Udapādīti dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento uppajji.
atk-s0102a:22_0: Bhaddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ
atk-s0102a:22_1: kappaṃ thomento evamāha. Yato paṭṭhāya kira amhākaṃ bhagavatā abhinīhāro kato, etasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:22_2: antare ekakappepi pañca buddhā nibbattā nāma natthi. Amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa
atk-s0102a:22_3: purato pana taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro, saraṇaṅkaro, dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:22_4: kappe nibbattiṃsu. Tesaṃ orabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhasuññameva ahosi.
atk-s0102a:23_0: Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana koṇḍañño nāma buddho ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno.
atk-s0102a:23_1: Tatopi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhasuññameva ahosi. Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne maṅgalo, sumano,
atk-s0102a:23_2: revato, sobhitoti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā. Tatopi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhasuññameva
atk-s0102a:23_3: ahosi. Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa
atk-s0102a:23_4: upari anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti tayo buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā. Tatopi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0102a:23_5: buddhasuññameva ahosi. Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana ito kappasatasahassānaṃ upari
atk-s0102a:23_6: padumuttaro bhagavā ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno. Tassa orabhāge ito tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ
atk-s0102a:23_7: upari sumedho, sujātoti dve buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā. Tato orabhāge ito aṭṭhārasannaṃ
atk-s0102a:23_8: kappasahassānaṃ upari piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassīti tayo buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0102a:23_9: uppannā. Atha ito catunavutikappe siddhattho nāma buddho ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno.
atk-s0102a:23_10: Ito dve navutikappe tisso, phussoti dve buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā. Ito ekanavutikappe
atk-s0102a:23_11: vipassī bhagavā uppanno. Ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhī, vessabhūti dve buddhā uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_12: Imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kakusandho, koṇāgamano, kassapo, gotamo amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhoti
atk-s0102a:23_13: cattāro buddhā uppannā, metteyyo uppajjissati. Evamayaṃ kappo pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā
atk-s0102a:23_14: sundarakappo sārakappoti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha.
atk-s0102a:24_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ buddhānaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ hoti – “imasmiṃ kappe ettakā buddhā uppannā vā
atk-s0102a:24_1: uppajjissantīti vā”ti, udāhu aññesampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti? Aññesampi pākaṭaṃ hoti. Kesaṃ?
atk-s0102a:24_2: Suddhāvāsabrahmānaṃ. Kappasaṇṭhānakālasmiñhi ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite
atk-s0102a:24_3: lokasannivāse lokassa saṇṭhānatthāya devo vassituṃ ārabhati. Āditova antaraṭṭhake
atk-s0102a:24_4: himapāto viya hoti. Tato tilamattā kaṇamattā taṇḍulamattā mugga-māsa-badara-āmalaka-eḷāluka-kumbhaṇḍa-alābumattā
atk-s0102a:24_7: yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokā pūretvā tiṭṭhanti. Atha taṃ udakaṃ anupubbena bhassati,
atk-s0102a:24_8: bhassante udake pakatidevalokaṭṭhānesu devalokā saṇṭhahanti, tesaṃ saṇṭhahanavidhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:25_0: Manussalokasaṇṭhahanaṭṭhānaṃ pana patte udake dhamakaraṇamukhe pihite viya vātavasena
atk-s0102a:25_1: taṃ udakaṃ santiṭṭhati, udakapiṭṭhe uppalinipaṇṇaṃ viya pathavī saṇṭhahati. Mahābodhipallaṅko
atk-s0102a:25_2: vinassamāne loke pacchā vinassati, saṇṭhahamāne paṭhamaṃ saṇṭhahati. Tattha pubbanimittaṃ
atk-s0102a:25_3: hutvā eko paduminigaccho uppajjati, tassa sace tasmiṃ kappe buddho nibbattissati,
atk-s0102a:25_4: pupphaṃ uppajjati. No ce, nuppajjati. Uppajjamānañca sace eko buddho nibbattissati,
atk-s0102a:25_5: ekaṃ uppajjati. Sace dve, tayo, cattāro, pañca buddhā nibbattissanti, pañca uppajjanti.
atk-s0102a:25_6: Tāni ca kho ekasmiṃyeva nāḷe kaṇṇikābaddhāni hutvā. Suddhāvāsabrahmāno “āyāma, mayaṃ
atk-s0102a:25_7: mārisā, pubbanimittaṃ passissāmā”ti mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti, buddhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:25_8: anibbattanakappe pupphaṃ na hoti. Te pana apupphitagacchaṃ disvā – “andhakāro vata
atk-s0102a:25_9: bho loko bhavissati, matā matā sattā apāye pūressanti, cha devalokā nava brahmalokā
atk-s0102a:25_10: suññā bhavissantī”ti anattamanā honti. Pupphitakāle pana pupphaṃ disvā – “sabbaññubodhisattesu
atk-s0102a:25_11: mātukucchiṃ okkamantesu nikkhamantesu sambujjhantesu dhammacakkaṃ pavattentesu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:25_12: karontesu devorohanaṃ karontesu āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajjantesu parinibbāyantesu dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni
atk-s0102a:25_13: pāṭihāriyāni dakkhissāmā”ti ca “cattāro apāyā parihāyissanti, cha devalokā nava brahmalokā
atk-s0102a:25_14: paripūressantī”ti ca attamanā udānaṃ udānentā attano attano brahmalokaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:25_15: Imasmiṃ bhaddakappe pañca padumāni uppajjiṃsu. Tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ānubhāvena cattāro
atk-s0102a:25_16: buddhā uppannā, pañcamo uppajjissati. Suddhāvāsabrahmānopi tāni padumāni disvā imamatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:27_0: 5-7. Iti bhagavā – “ito so, bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena kappaparicchedavasena pubbenivāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:27_1: dassetvā idāni tesaṃ buddhānaṃ jātiparicchedādivasena dassetuṃ vipassī, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:27_2: Tattha āyuparicchede parittaṃ lahukanti ubhayametaṃ appakasseva vevacanaṃ. Yañhi
atk-s0102a:28_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ, aññaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ
atk-s0102a:28_1: vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati. Evaṃ dīghāyuko pana atidullabho,
atk-s0102a:28_2: asuko kira evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatīti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti. Tattha visākhā
atk-s0102a:28_3: upāsikā vīsavassasataṃ jīvati, tathā pokkharasāti brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu brāhmaṇo, selo
atk-s0102a:28_4: brāhmaṇo, bāvariyabrāhmaṇo, ānandatthero, mahākassapattheroti. Anuruddhatthero pana
atk-s0102a:28_5: vassasatañceva paṇṇāsañca vassāni, bākulatthero vassasatañceva saṭṭhi ca vassāni.
atk-s0102a:28_6: Ayaṃ sabbadīghāyuko. Sopi dve vassasatāni na jīvati.
atk-s0102a:29_1: mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Tena cittena gahitāya paṭisandhiyā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0102a:29_2: āyu, iti sabbe buddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā. Te kasmā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ na aṭṭhaṃsu? Utubhojanavipattiyā.
atk-s0102a:30_0: Tattha yadā rājāno adhammikā honti, tadā uparājāno, senāpati, seṭṭhi, sakalanagaraṃ,
atk-s0102a:30_1: sakalaraṭṭhaṃ adhammikameva hoti; atha tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ mittā
atk-s0102a:30_2: bhūmaṭṭhadevatā, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ mittā ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā, ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānaṃ mittā
atk-s0102a:30_3: uṇhavalāhakā devatā, tāsaṃ mittā abbhavalāhakā devatā, tāsaṃ mittā sītavalāhakā devatā,
atk-s0102a:30_4: tāsaṃ mittā vassavalāhakā devatā, tāsaṃ mittā cātumahārājikā devatā, tāsaṃ mittā
atk-s0102a:30_5: tāvatiṃsā devatā, tāsaṃ mittā yāmā devatāti evamādi. Evaṃ yāva bhavaggā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0102a:30_6: ariyasāvake sabbā devabrahmaparisāpi adhammikāva honti. Tāsaṃ adhammikatāya visamaṃ
atk-s0102a:30_7: candimasūriyā pariharanti, vāto yathāmaggena na vāyati, ayathāmaggena vāyanto ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni
atk-s0102a:30_8: khobheti, vimānesu khobhitesu devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni na namanti, devatānaṃ
atk-s0102a:30_9: kīḷanatthāya cittesu anamantesu sītuṇhabhedo utu yathākālena na sampajjati, tasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:30_10: asampajjante na sammā devo vassati, kadāci vassati, kadāci na vassati; katthaci vassati,
atk-s0102a:30_11: katthaci na vassati, vassantopi vappakāle aṅkurakāle nāḷakāle pupphakāle khīraggahaṇādikālesu
atk-s0102a:30_12: yathā yathā sassānaṃ upakāro na hoti, tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca, tena
atk-s0102a:30_13: sassāni visamapākāni honti, vigatagandhavaṇṇarasādisampannāni. Ekabhājane pakkhittataṇḍulesupi
atk-s0102a:30_14: ekasmiṃ padese bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ atikilinnaṃ, ekasmiṃ samapākaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0102a:30_15: paribhuttaṃ kucchiyampi tīhākārehi paccati. Tena sattā bahvābādhā ceva honti, appāyukā
atk-s0102a:30_16: ca. Evaṃ tāva utubhojanavasena āyu hāyati.
atk-s0102a:31_0: Yadā pana rājāno dhammikā honti, tadā uparājānopi dhammikā hontīti purimanayeneva
atk-s0102a:31_1: yāva brahmalokā sabbepi dhammikā honti. Tesaṃ dhammikattā samaṃ candimasūriyā pariharanti,
atk-s0102a:31_2: yathāmaggena vāto vāyati, yathāmaggena vāyanto ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni na khobheti, tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:31_3: akhobhā devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni namanti. Evaṃ kālena utu sampajjati, devo
atk-s0102a:31_4: sammā vassati, vappakālato paṭṭhāya sassānaṃ upakāraṃ karonto kāle vassati, kāle
atk-s0102a:31_5: vigacchati, tena sassāni samapākāni sugandhāni suvaṇṇāni surasāni ojavantāni honti,
atk-s0102a:31_6: tehi sampāditaṃ bhojanaṃ paribhuttampi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, tena sattā arogā
atk-s0102a:31_7: dīghāyukā honti. Evaṃ utubhojanavasena āyu vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0102a:32_0: Tattha vipassī bhagavā asītivassasahassāyukakāle nibbatto, sikhī sattativassasahassāyukakāleti
atk-s0102a:32_1: idaṃ anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ, na pana evaṃ parihīnaṃ, vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0102a:32_2: parihīnanti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Imasmiṃ tāva kappe kakusandho bhagavā cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle
atk-s0102a:32_3: nibbatto, āyuppamāṇaṃ pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāri ṭhatvā pañcame vijjamāneyeva parinibbuto.
atk-s0102a:32_4: Taṃ āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā tato
atk-s0102a:32_5: parihāyamānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ; tadā koṇāgamano bhagavā nibbatto. Tasmimpi
atk-s0102a:32_6: tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā
atk-s0102a:32_7: parihāyitvā vīsativassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ; tadā kassapo bhagavā nibbatto. Tasmimpi
atk-s0102a:32_8: tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā
atk-s0102a:32_9: parihāyitvā vassasatakālaṃ pattaṃ, atha amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho nibbatto. Evaṃ anupubbena
atk-s0102a:32_10: parihāyitvā parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha yaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0102a:32_11: āyuparimāṇesu manussesu buddhā nibbattanti, tesampi taṃ tadeva āyuparimāṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:35_0: 8. Bodhiparicchede pana pāṭaliyā mūleti pāṭalirukkhassa heṭṭhā. Tassā pana pāṭaliyā
atk-s0102a:35_1: khandho taṃ divasaṃ paṇṇāsaratano hutvā abbhuggato, sākhā paṇṇāsaratanāti ubbedhena
atk-s0102a:35_2: ratanasataṃ ahosi. Taṃ divasañca sā pāṭali kaṇṇikābaddhehi viya pupphehi mūlato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0102a:35_3: ekasañchannā ahosi, dibbagandhaṃ vāyati. Na kevalañca tadā ayameva pupphitā, dasasahassacakkavāḷe
atk-s0102a:35_4: sabbapāṭaliyo pupphitā. Na kevalañca pāṭaliyo, dasasahassacakkavāḷe sabbarukkhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:35_5: khandhesu khandhapadumāni, sākhāsu sākhāpadumāni, latāsu latāpadumāni, ākāse ākāsapadumāni
atk-s0102a:35_6: pupphitāni, pathavitalaṃ bhinditvāpi mahāpadumāni uṭṭhitāni. Mahāsamuddopi pañcavaṇṇehi
atk-s0102a:35_7: padumehi nīluppalarattuppalehi ca sañchanno ahosi. Sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ dhajamālākulaṃ
atk-s0102a:35_12: cakkavāḷāni ahesuṃ. Abhisambuddhoti sakalaṃ buddhaguṇavibhavasiriṃ paṭivijjhamāno
atk-s0102a:36_0: “Sikhī, bhikkhave, bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho puṇḍarīkassa mūle abhisambuddho”tiādīsupi
atk-s0102a:36_1: imināva nayena padavaṇṇanā veditabbā. Ettha pana puṇḍarīkoti setambarukkho. Tassāpi
atk-s0102a:36_2: tadeva parimāṇaṃ. Taṃ divasañca sopi dibbagandhehi pupphehi susañchanno ahosi. Na
atk-s0102a:36_3: kevalañca pupphehi, phalehipi sañchanno ahosi. Tassa ekato taruṇāni phalāni, ekato
atk-s0102a:36_4: majjhimāni phalāni, ekato nātipakkāni phalāni, ekato supakkāni pakkhittadibbojāni
atk-s0102a:36_5: viya surasāni olambanti. Yathā so, evaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷesu pupphūpagarukkhā
atk-s0102a:37_0: Sāloti sālarukkho. Tassāpi tadeva parimāṇaṃ, tatheva pupphasirīvibhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:37_1: Sirīsarukkhepi eseva nayo. Udumbararukkhe pupphāni nāhesuṃ, phalavibhūti panettha
atk-s0102a:37_2: ambe vuttanayāva, tathā nigrodhe, tathā assatthe. Iti sabbabuddhānaṃ ekova pallaṅko,
atk-s0102a:37_3: rukkhā pana aññepi honti. Tesu yassa yassa rukkhassa mūle catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātabodhiṃ
atk-s0102a:37_4: buddhā paṭivijjhanti, so so bodhīti vuccati. Ayaṃ bodhiparicchedo nāma.
atk-s0102a:39_0: 9. Sāvakayugaparicchede pana khaṇḍatissanti khaṇḍo ca tisso ca. Tesu khaṇḍo ekapitiko
atk-s0102a:39_1: kaniṭṭhabhātā, tisso purohitaputto. Khaṇḍo paññāpāramiyā matthakaṃ patto, tisso samādhipāramiyā
atk-s0102a:39_2: matthakaṃ patto. Agganti ṭhapetvā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ avasesehi saddhiṃ asadisaguṇatāya
atk-s0102a:39_3: uttamaṃ. Bhaddayuganti aggattāyeva bhaddayugaṃ. Abhibhūsambhavanti abhibhū ca sambhavo
atk-s0102a:39_4: ca. Tesu abhibhū paññāpāramiyā matthakaṃ patto. Sikhinā bhagavatā saddhiṃ aruṇavatito
atk-s0102a:39_5: brahmalokaṃ gantvā brahmaparisāya vividhāni pāṭihāriyāni dassento dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0102a:39_6: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ andhakārena pharitvā – “kiṃ ida”nti sañjātasaṃvegānaṃ obhāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:39_7: pharitvā – “sabbe me rūpañca passantu, saddañca suṇantū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā – “ārambhathā”ti
atk-s0102a:39_8: gāthādvayaṃ bhaṇanto saddaṃ sāvesi. Sambhavo samādhipāramiyā matthakaṃ patto ahosi.
atk-s0102a:40_0: Soṇuttaranti soṇo ca uttaro ca. Tesupi soṇo paññāpāramiṃ patto, uttaro samādhipāramiṃ
atk-s0102a:40_1: patto ahosi. Vidhurasañjīvanti vidhuro ca sañjīvo ca. Tesu vidhuro paññāpāramiṃ patto
atk-s0102a:40_2: ahosi, sañjīvo samādhipāramiṃ patto. Samāpajjanabahulo rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭileṇamaṇḍapādīsu
atk-s0102a:40_3: samāpattibalena jhāyanto ekadivasaṃ araññe nirodhaṃ samāpajji, atha naṃ vanakammikādayo
atk-s0102a:40_4: “mato”ti sallakkhetvā jhāpesuṃ. So yathāparicchedena samāpattito uṭṭhāya cīvarāni
atk-s0102a:40_5: papphoṭetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Tadupādāyeva ca naṃ “sañjīvo”ti sañjāniṃsu. Bhiyyosuttaranti
atk-s0102a:40_6: bhiyyoso ca uttaro ca. Tesu bhiyyoso paññāya uttaro, uttaro samādhinā aggo ahosi.
atk-s0102a:40_7: Tissabhāradvājanti tisso ca bhāradvājo ca. Tesu tisso paññāpāramiṃ patto, bhāradvājo
atk-s0102a:40_8: samādhipāramiṃ patto ahosi. Sāriputtamoggallānanti sāriputto ca moggallāno ca. Tesu
atk-s0102a:40_9: sāriputto paññāvisaye, moggallāno samādhivisaye aggo ahosi. Ayaṃ sāvakayugaparicchedo nāma.
atk-s0102a:42_0: 10. Sāvakasannipātaparicchede vipassissa bhagavato paṭhamasannipāto caturaṅgiko ahosi,
atk-s0102a:42_1: sabbe ehibhikkhū, sabbe iddhiyā nibbattapattacīvarā, sabbe anāmantitāva āgatā, iti
atk-s0102a:42_2: te ca kho pannarase uposathadivase. Atha satthā bījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno uposathaṃ
atk-s0102a:42_3: osāresi. Dutiyatatiyesupi eseva nayo. Tathā sesabuddhānaṃ sabbasannipātesu. Yasmā
atk-s0102a:42_4: pana amhākaṃ bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyāva sannipāto ahosi, idañca suttaṃ aparabhāge
atk-s0102a:42_5: vuttaṃ, tasmā “mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, etarahi eko sāvakānaṃ sannipāto”ti aniṭṭhapetvā “ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:43_0: Tattha aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatānīti purāṇajaṭilānaṃ sahassaṃ, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:43_1: parivārāni aḍḍhateyyasatānīti aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni. Tattha dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:43_2: abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vatthuṃ kathetvā pabbajjā dīpetabbā. Pabbajitānaṃ pana tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:43_3: mahāmoggallāno sattame divase arahattaṃ patto. Dhammasenāpati pannarasame divase
atk-s0102a:43_5: sajjite dhammayāge vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne desanaṃ anubujjhamānaṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:43_6: pesetvā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ patto. Bhagavā therassa arahattappattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0102a:43_7: veḷuvaneyeva paccuṭṭhāsi. Thero – “kuhiṃ nu kho bhagavā gato”ti āvajjanto veḷuvane
atk-s0102a:43_8: patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā veḷuvaneyeva paccuṭṭhāsi. Atha
atk-s0102a:43_9: bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ osāresi. Taṃ sannipātaṃ sandhāya bhagavā – “aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatānī”ti
atk-s0102a:45_0: 11. Upaṭṭhākaparicchede pana ānandoti nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhagavato
atk-s0102a:45_1: hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ. Ekadā nāgasamālo pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0102a:45_2: vicari, ekadā nāgito, ekadā upavāno, ekadā sunakkhatto, ekadā cundo samaṇuddeso,
atk-s0102a:45_3: ekadā sāgato, ekadā meghiyo. Tattha ekadā bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggapaṭipanno
atk-s0102a:45_4: dvedhāpathaṃ patto. Thero maggā okkamma – “bhagavā, ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:45_5: āha. Atha naṃ bhagavā – “ehi bhikkhu, iminā maggena gacchāmā”ti āha. So – “handa,
atk-s0102a:45_6: bhagavā, tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0102a:45_7: chamāyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. Atha naṃ bhagavā – “āhara, bhikkhū”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0102a:45_8: gahetvā gato. Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu,
atk-s0102a:45_9: sīsañca bhindiṃsu. So – “bhagavā idāni me paṭisaraṇaṃ, na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena
atk-s0102a:45_10: gaḷitena bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0102a:45_11: Atha naṃ bhagavā – “mā cintayi, bhikkhu, etaṃyeva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti
atk-s0102a:46_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:46_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā – “bhagavā,
atk-s0102a:46_2: tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ tasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā
atk-s0102a:46_3: bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi upadduto anvāsatto. Paccāgantvā
atk-s0102a:46_4: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tampi bhagavā – “idameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti
atk-s0102a:46_5: vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0102a:46_6: nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi – “bhikkhave, idānimhi mahallako,
atk-s0102a:46_7: ‘ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti, ekacce mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0102a:46_8: nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasaṃvego
atk-s0102a:46_9: udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “ahaṃ, bhante, tumheyeva
atk-s0102a:46_10: patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūrayiṃ, nanu mādiso mahāpañño
atk-s0102a:46_11: upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati, ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā – “alaṃ sāriputta,
atk-s0102a:46_12: yassaṃ disāyaṃ tvaṃ viharasi, asuññāyeva me sā disā, tava ovādo buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso,
atk-s0102a:46_13: na me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi. Etenevupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0102a:46_14: katvā asītimahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Te sabbepi bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0102a:47_0: Ānandatthero pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu – “āvuso, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:47_1: bhikkhusaṅgho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tvampi yācāhī”ti. So āha – “yācitvā laddhupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:47_2: nāma āvuso kīdisaṃ hoti, kiṃ maṃ satthā na passati, sace rocissati, ānando maṃ upaṭṭhātūti
atk-s0102a:47_3: vakkhatī”ti. Atha bhagavā – “na, bhikkhave, ānando aññena ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā
atk-s0102a:47_4: maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti āha. Tato bhikkhū – “uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0102a:47_5: dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepe,
atk-s0102a:47_6: catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
atk-s0102a:48_0: Cattāro paṭikkhepā nāma – “sace me, bhante, bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0102a:48_1: na dassati, piṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati, nimantanaṃ
atk-s0102a:48_2: gahetvā na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā – “kiṃ panettha,
atk-s0102a:48_3: ānanda, ādīnavaṃ passasī”ti vutte – “sacāhaṃ, bhante, imāni vatthūni labhissāmi,
atk-s0102a:48_4: bhavissanti vattāro – ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0102a:48_5: paribhuñjati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasati, ekato nimantanaṃ gacchati, etaṃ lābhaṃ labhanto
atk-s0102a:48_6: tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhāti, ko evaṃ upaṭṭhahato bhāro’ti” ime cattāro paṭikkhepe yāci.
atk-s0102a:49_0: Catasso āyācanā nāma – “sace, bhante, bhagavā mayā gahitanimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ
atk-s0102a:49_1: tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataṃ parisaṃ āgatakkhaṇe eva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:49_2: dassetuṃ lacchāmi, yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
atk-s0102a:49_3: lacchāmi, yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhā dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0102a:49_4: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā – “kaṃ panettha, ānanda, ānisaṃsaṃ passasī”ti
atk-s0102a:49_5: vutte – “idha, bhante, saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ evaṃ vadanti
atk-s0102a:49_6: – ‘sve, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti, sace
atk-s0102a:49_7: bhante bhagavā tattha na gamissati, icchitakkhaṇeyeva parisaṃ dassetuṃ, kaṅkhañca
atk-s0102a:49_8: vinodetuṃ okāsaṃ na lacchāmi, bhavissanti vattāro – ‘kiṃ ānando dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0102a:49_9: ettakampissa anuggahaṃ bhagavā na karotī’ti. Bhagavato ca parammukhā maṃ pucchissanti
atk-s0102a:49_10: – ‘ayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, gāthā, idaṃ suttaṃ, idaṃ jātakaṃ, kattha desita’nti. Sacāhaṃ
atk-s0102a:49_11: taṃ na sampādayissāmi, bhavissanti vattāro – ‘ettakampi, āvuso, na jānāsi, kasmā
atk-s0102a:49_12: tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ avijahanto dīgharattaṃ vicarasī’ti. Tenāhaṃ parammukhā
atk-s0102a:49_13: desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti imā catasso āyācanā yāci. Bhagavāpissa adāsi.
atk-s0102a:50_0: Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tasseva ṭhānantarassatthāya kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0102a:50_1: pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇīti imassa nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya – “mayhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:50_2: bhikkhave, etarahi ānando bhikkhu upaṭṭhāko aggupaṭṭhāko”ti āha. Ayaṃ upaṭṭhākaparicchedo nāma.
atk-s0102a:52_0: Vihāraṃ pāvisīti kasmā vihāraṃ pāvisi? Bhagavā kira ettakaṃ kathetvā cintesi – “na
atk-s0102a:52_1: tāva mayā sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vaṃso nirantaraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathito, ajja mayi
atk-s0102a:52_2: pana vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe ime bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbha vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:52_3: kathayissanti. Athāhaṃ āgantvā nirantaraṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0102a:52_4: dassāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kathāvārassa okāsaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:53_0: Yañcetaṃ bhagavā tantiṃ kathesi, tattha kappaparicchedo, jātiparicchedo, gottaparicchedo,
atk-s0102a:53_2: upaṭṭhākaparicchedo, pitiparicchedoti navime vārā āgatā, sambahulavāro anāgato, ānetvā pana dīpetabbo.
atk-s0102a:55_0: Sabbabodhisattānañhi ekasmiṃ kulavaṃsānurūpe putte jāte nikkhamitvā pabbajitabbanti
atk-s0102a:55_1: ayameva vaṃso, ayaṃ paveṇī. Kasmā? Sabbaññubodhisattānañhi mātukucchiṃ okkamanato
atk-s0102a:55_2: paṭṭhāya pubbe vuttappakārāni anekāni pāṭihāriyāni honti, tatra nesaṃ yadi neva jātanagaraṃ,
atk-s0102a:55_3: na pitā, na mātā, na bhariyā, na putto paññāyeyya, “imassa neva jātanagaraṃ, na pitā,
atk-s0102a:55_4: na bhariyā, na putto paññāyati, devo vā sakko vā māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe, devānañca
atk-s0102a:55_5: īdisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ anacchariya”nti maññamāno jano neva sotabbaṃ, na saddhātabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:55_6: maññeyya. Tato abhisamayo na bhaveyya, abhisamaye asati niratthakova buddhuppādo,
atk-s0102a:55_7: aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ hoti. Tasmā sabbabodhisattānaṃ – “ekasmiṃ kulavaṃsānurūpe putte
atk-s0102a:55_8: jāte nikkhamitvā pabbajitabba”nti ayameva vaṃso ayaṃ paveṇī. Tasmā puttādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0102a:60: Ete tāva sattannampi bodhisattānaṃ anukkameneva satta puttā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:61_0: Tattha rāhulabhadde tāva jāte paṇṇaṃ āharitvā mahāpurisassa hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu. Athassa
atk-s0102a:61_1: tāvadeva sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā puttasineho aṭṭhāsi. So cintesi – “ekasmiṃ tāva
atk-s0102a:61_2: jāte evarūpo puttasineho, parosahassaṃ kira me puttā bhavissanti, tesu ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:61_3: jāte idaṃ sinehabandhanaṃ evaṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ dubbhejjaṃ bhavissati, rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ
atk-s0102a:61_4: jāta”nti āha. Taṃ divasameva ca rajjaṃ pahāya nikkhanto. Esa nayo sabbesaṃ puttuppattiyanti.
atk-s0102a:62: Sutanā sabbakāmā ca, sucittā atha rocinī;
atk-s0102a:63: Rucaggatī sunandā ca, bimbā bhavati sattamāti.
atk-s0102a:64: Etā tesaṃ sattannampi puttānaṃ mātaro ahesuṃ. Bimbādevī pana rāhulakumāre jāte rāhulamātāti paññāyittha. Ayaṃ bhariyaparicchedo.
atk-s0102a:65_0: Vipassī kakusandhoti ime pana dve bodhisattā payuttaājaññarathamāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0102a:65_1: nikkhamiṃsu. Sikhī koṇāgamanoti ime dve hatthikkhandhavaragatā hutvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:65_2: Vessabhū suvaṇṇasivikāya nisīditvā nikkhami. Kassapo uparipāsāde mahātale nisinnova
atk-s0102a:65_3: ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā uṭṭhāya taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā – “pāsādo
atk-s0102a:65_4: uggantvā bodhimaṇḍe otaratū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Pāsādo ākāsena gantvā bodhimaṇḍe otari.
atk-s0102a:65_5: Mahāpurisopi tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā – “pāsādo yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhātū”ti
atk-s0102a:65_6: cintesi. So yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhāsi. Mahāpurisopi satta divasāni padhānamanuyuñjitvā
atk-s0102a:65_7: bodhipallaṅke nisīditvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhi. Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto kaṇṭakaṃ
atk-s0102a:66_0: Vipassissa pana bhagavato yojanappamāṇe padese vihāro patiṭṭhāsi, sikhissa tigāvute,
atk-s0102a:66_1: vessabhussa aḍḍhayojane, kakusandhassa gāvute, koṇāgamanassa aḍḍhagāvute, kassapassa
atk-s0102a:66_2: vīsatiusabhe. Amhākaṃ bhagavato pakatimānena soḷasakarīse, rājamānena aṭṭhakarīse
atk-s0102a:67_0: Vipassissa pana bhagavato ekaratanāyāmā vidatthivitthārā aṭṭhaṅgulubbedhā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakā
atk-s0102a:67_1: kāretvā cūḷaṃsena chādetvā vihāraṭṭhānaṃ kiṇiṃsu. Sikhissa suvaṇṇayaṭṭhiphālehi chādetvā
atk-s0102a:67_2: kiṇiṃsu. Vessabhussa suvaṇṇahatthipādāni kāretvā tesaṃ cūḷaṃsena chādetvā kiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:67_3: Kakusandhassa vuttanayeneva suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi chādetvā kiṇiṃsu. Koṇāgamanassa vuttanayeneva
atk-s0102a:67_4: suvaṇṇakacchapehi chādetvā kiṇiṃsu. Kassapassa suvaṇṇakaṭṭīhiyeva chādetvā kiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:67_5: Amhākaṃ bhagavato salakkhaṇānaṃ kahāpaṇānaṃ cūḷaṃsena chādetvā kiṇiṃsu. Ayaṃ vihārabhūmiggahaṇadhanaparicchedo.
atk-s0102a:68_0: Tattha vipassissa bhagavato tathā bhūmiṃ kiṇitvā vihāraṃ katvā dinnupaṭṭhāko punabbasumitto
atk-s0102a:68_1: nāma ahosi, sikhissa sirivaḍḍhano nāma, vessabhussa sotthiyo nāma, kakusandhassa
atk-s0102a:68_2: accuto nāma, koṇāgamanassa uggo nāma, kassapassa sumano nāma, amhākaṃ bhagavato sudatto
atk-s0102a:68_3: nāma. Sabbe cete gahapatimahāsālā seṭṭhino ahesunti. Ayaṃ upaṭṭhākaparicchedo nāma.
atk-s0102a:69_0: Aparāni cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. Sabbabuddhānañhi bodhipallaṅko avijahito,
atk-s0102a:69_1: ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hoti. Dhammacakkappavattanaṃ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0102a:69_2: Devorohanakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre paṭhamapadagaṇṭhikā avijahitāva hoti. Jetavane
atk-s0102a:69_3: gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti. Vihāro pana khuddakopi
atk-s0102a:69_4: mahantopi hoti, vihāropi na vijahitoyeva, nagaraṃ pana vijahati. Yadā nagaraṃ pācīnato
atk-s0102a:69_5: hoti, tadā vihāro pacchimato; yadā nagaraṃ dakkhiṇato, tadā vihāro uttarato. Yadā
atk-s0102a:69_6: nagaraṃ pacchimato, tadā vihāro pācīnato; yadā nagaraṃ uttarato, tadā vihāro dakkhiṇato.
atk-s0102a:69_7: Idāni pana nagaraṃ uttarato, vihāro dakkhiṇato.
atk-s0102a:70_0: Sabbabuddhānañca āyuvemattaṃ, pamāṇavemattaṃ, kulavemattaṃ, padhānavemattaṃ, rasmivemattanti
atk-s0102a:70_1: pañca vemattāni honti. Āyuvemattaṃ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti, keci appāyukā. Tathā
atk-s0102a:70_2: hi dīpaṅkarassa vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi, amhākaṃ bhagavato vassasataṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:71: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro asītihattho ahosi, sumano navutihattho, amhākaṃ bhagavā aṭṭhārasahattho.
atk-s0102a:72_0: Kulavemattaṃ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti, keci brāhmaṇakule. Padhānavemattaṃ
atk-s0102a:72_1: nāma kesañci padhānaṃ ittarakālameva hoti, yathā kassapassa bhagavato. Kesañci addhaniyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:73_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrarasmi dasasahassilokadhātuppamāṇā ahosi.
atk-s0102a:73_1: Amhākaṃ bhagavato samantā byāmamattā. Tatra rasmivemattaṃ ajjhāsayappaṭibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:73_2: yo yattakaṃ icchati, tassa tattakaṃ sarīrappabhā pharati. Maṅgalassa pana niccampi
atk-s0102a:73_3: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharatūti ajjhāsayo ahosi. Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:74_0: Aparaṃ amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:74_1: Sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā, ānandatthero, channo, kaṇṭako, nidhikumbho,
atk-s0102a:74_2: mahābodhi, kāḷudāyīti imāni satta sahajātāni. Mahāpuriso ca uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva
atk-s0102a:74_3: mātukucchiṃ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami, dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:74_4: akāsi. Visākhānakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca. Māghanakkhattenassa
atk-s0102a:74_5: sāvakasannipāto ca ahosi, āyusaṅkhārossajjanañca, assayujanakkhattena devorohananti
atk-s0102a:74_6: ettakaṃ āharitvā dīpetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ sambahulaparicchedo nāma.
atk-s0102a:75_0: 13. Idāni atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnantiādīsu te bhikkhū – “āvuso, pubbenivāsassa nāma
atk-s0102a:75_1: ayaṃ gati, yadidaṃ cutito paṭṭhāya paṭisandhiārohanaṃ. Yaṃ pana idaṃ paṭisandhito
atk-s0102a:75_2: paṭṭhāya pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā cuti gantabbaṃ, idaṃ atigarukaṃ. Ākāse padaṃ
atk-s0102a:75_3: dassento viya bhagavā kathesī”ti ativimhayajātā hutvā – “acchariyaṃ, āvuso,”tiādīni
atk-s0102a:75_4: vatvā puna aparampi kāraṇaṃ dassento – “yatra hi nāma tathāgato”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0102a:75_5: yatra hi nāmāti acchariyatthe nipāto, yo nāma tathāgatoti attho. Chinnapapañceti
atk-s0102a:75_6: ettha papañcā nāma taṇhā māno diṭṭhīti ime tayo kilesā. Chinnavaṭumeti ettha vaṭumanti
atk-s0102a:75_7: kusalākusalakammavaṭṭaṃ vuccati. Pariyādinnavaṭṭeti tasseva vevacanaṃ, pariyādinnasabbakammavaṭṭeti
atk-s0102a:75_8: attho. Sabbadukkhavītivatteti sabbaṃ vipākavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhaṃ vītivatte. Anussarissatīti
atk-s0102a:75_9: idaṃ yatrāti nipātavasena anāgatavacanaṃ, attho panettha atītavasena veditabbo. Bhagavā
atk-s0102a:75_10: hi te buddhe anussari, na idāni anussarissati. Evaṃsīlāti maggasīlena phalasīlena
atk-s0102a:75_11: lokiyalokuttarasīlena evaṃsīlā. Evaṃdhammāti ettha samādhipakkhā dhammā adhippetā,
atk-s0102a:75_12: maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā lokiyalokuttarasamādhinā, evaṃsamādhayoti attho. Evaṃpaññāti
atk-s0102a:75_13: maggapaññādivaseneva evaṃpaññā. Evaṃvihārīti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0102a:75_14: gahitattā vihāro gahitova puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhātīti ce; na idaṃ gahitameva,
atk-s0102a:75_15: idañhi nirodhasamāpattidīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārī te bhagavanto
atk-s0102a:76_0: Evaṃvimuttāti ettha vikkhambhanavimutti, tadaṅgavimutti, samucchedavimutti, paṭippassaddhivimutti,
atk-s0102a:76_1: nissaraṇavimuttīti pañcavidhā vimutti. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi
atk-s0102a:76_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Aniccānupassanādikā
atk-s0102a:76_3: sattānupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkaṅgavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā
atk-s0102a:76_4: tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi
atk-s0102a:76_5: vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena
atk-s0102a:76_6: kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhante uppannattā paṭippassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:76_7: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0102a:76_8: gacchati. Iti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ vimuttīnaṃ vasena – “evaṃ vimuttā”ti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:78_0: 16. “Ito so, bhikkhave”ti ko anusandhi? Idañhi suttaṃ – “tathāgatassevesā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:78_1: dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā”ti ca “devatāpi tathāgatassa etamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti ca
atk-s0102a:78_2: imehi dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ. Tattha devatārocanapadaṃ suttantapariyosāne devacārikakolāhalaṃ
atk-s0102a:78_3: dassento vicāressati. Dhammadhātupadānusandhivasena pana ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Tattha
atk-s0102a:78_4: khattiyo jātiyātiādīni ekādasapadāni nidānakaṇḍe vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0102a:80_0: 17. Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassī bodhisattotiādīsu pana vipassīti tassa nāmaṃ, tañca
atk-s0102a:80_1: kho vividhe atthe passanakusalatāya laddhaṃ. Bodhisattoti paṇḍitasatto bujjhanakasatto.
atk-s0102a:80_2: Bodhisaṅkhātesu vā catūsu maggesu satto āsatto laggamānasoti bodhisatto. Sato sampajānoti
atk-s0102a:80_3: ettha satoti satiyeva. Sampajānoti ñāṇaṃ. Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-s0102a:80_4: mātukucchiṃ okkamīti attho. Okkamīti iminā cassa okkantabhāvo pāḷiyaṃ dassito, na
atk-s0102a:80_5: okkamanakkamo. So pana yasmā aṭṭhakathaṃ ārūḷho, tasmā evaṃ veditabbo –
atk-s0102a:81_0: Sabbabodhisattā hi samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā, pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā,
atk-s0102a:81_2: attabhāve ṭhatvā, satta mahādānāni datvā, sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā, kālaṅkatvā,
atk-s0102a:81_3: dutiyacittavāre tusitabhavane nibbattanti. Vipassī bodhisattopi tatheva katvā tusitapure
atk-s0102a:81_4: nibbattitvā saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā sattapaññāsa vassakoṭiyo tattha aṭṭhāsi. Aññadā
atk-s0102a:81_5: pana dīghāyukadevaloke nibbattā bodhisattā na yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā? Tattha
atk-s0102a:81_6: pāramīnaṃ duppūraṇīyattā. Te adhimuttikālakiriyaṃ katvā manussapatheyeva nibbattanti.
atk-s0102a:81_7: Pāramīnaṃ pūrento pana yathā idāni ekena attabhāvena sabbaññutaṃ upanetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0102a:81_8: evaṃ sabbaso pūritattā tadā vipassī bodhisatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:82_0: Devatānaṃ pana – “manussānaṃ gaṇanāvasena idāni sattahi divasehi cuti bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0102a:82_1: pañca pubbanimittāni uppajjanti – mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā
atk-s0102a:82_2: muccanti, kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, devo devāsane na saṇṭhāti. Tattha mālāti paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0102a:82_3: piḷandhanamālā, tā kira saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā sattapaṇṇāsa vassakoṭiyo amilāyitvā
atk-s0102a:82_4: tadā milāyanti. Vatthesupi eseva nayo. Ettakaṃ pana kālaṃ devānaṃ neva sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ
atk-s0102a:82_5: hoti, tasmiṃ kāle sarīrā bindubinduvasena sedā muccanti. Ettakañca kālaṃ tesaṃ sarīre
atk-s0102a:82_6: khaṇḍiccapāliccādivasena vivaṇṇatā na paññāyati, devadhītā soḷasavassuddesikā viya
atk-s0102a:82_7: khāyanti, devaputtā vīsativassuddesikā viya khāyanti, maraṇakāle pana tesaṃ kilantarūpo
atk-s0102a:82_8: attabhāvo hoti. Ettakañca tesaṃ kālaṃ devaloke ukkaṇṭhitā nāma natthi, maraṇakāle
atk-s0102a:82_9: pana nissasanti vijambhanti, sake āsane nābhiramanti.
atk-s0102a:83_0: Imāni pana pubbanimittāni yathā loke mahāpuññānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃyeva ukkāpātabhūmicālacandaggāhādīni
atk-s0102a:83_1: nimittāni paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ; evaṃ mahesakkhadevatānaṃyeva paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ.
atk-s0102a:83_2: Yathā ca manussesu pubbanimittāni nakkhattapāṭhakādayova jānanti, na sabbe; evaṃ
atk-s0102a:83_3: tānipi na sabbadevatā jānanti, paṇḍitā eva pana jānanti. Tattha ye mandena kusalakammena
atk-s0102a:83_4: nibbattā devaputtā, te tesu uppannesu – “idāni ko jānāti, ‘kuhiṃ nibbattessāmā’ti”
atk-s0102a:83_5: bhāyanti. Ye mahāpuññā, te “amhehi dinnaṃ dānaṃ, rakkhitaṃ sīlaṃ, bhāvitaṃ bhāvanaṃ
atk-s0102a:83_6: āgamma upari devalokesu sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā”ti na bhāyanti. Vipassī bodhisattopi
atk-s0102a:83_7: tāni pubbanimittāni disvā “idāni anantare attabhāve buddho bhavissāmī”ti na bhāyati.
atk-s0102a:83_8: Athassa tesu nimittesu pātubhūtesu dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā – “mārisa,
atk-s0102a:83_9: tumhehi dasa pāramiyo pūrentehi na sakkasampattiṃ, na mārasampattiṃ, na brahmasampattiṃ,
atk-s0102a:83_10: na cakkavattisampattiṃ patthentehi pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana buddhattaṃ patthayamānehi
atk-s0102a:83_11: pūritā. So vo, idāni kālo, mārisa, buddhattāya, samayo, mārisa, buddhattāyā”ti yācanti.
atk-s0102a:84_0: Atha mahāsatto tāsaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena
atk-s0102a:84_1: pañcamahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi. Tattha “kālo nu kho, na kālo”ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0102a:84_2: vilokesi. Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:84_3: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti, buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā
atk-s0102a:84_4: natthi. Te tesaṃ – “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti kathentānaṃ – “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti
atk-s0102a:84_5: neva sotuṃ, na saddahituṃ maññanti, tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0102a:84_6: sāsanaṃ hoti. Tasmā so akālo. Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā
atk-s0102a:84_7: hi sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0102a:84_8: udake daṇḍarāji viya khippaṃ vigacchati. Tasmā sopi akālova. Vassasatasahassato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0102a:84_9: heṭṭhā, vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma, tadā ca asītivassasahassāyukā
atk-s0102a:85: Tato dīpaṃ vilokento saparivāre cattāro dīpe oloketvā – “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpeyeva nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0102a:86_0: Tato – “jambudīpo nāma mahā, dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo, katarasmiṃ nu kho padese
atk-s0102a:86_1: buddhā nibbattantī”ti desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi. Majjhimadeso nāma – “puratthimāya
atk-s0102a:86_2: disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo”tiādinā nayena vinaye vuttova. So āyāmato tīṇi yojanasatāni,
atk-s0102a:86_3: vitthārato aḍḍhateyyāni, parikkhepato navayojanasatānīti. Etasmiñhi padese buddhā
atk-s0102a:86_4: paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahāsāvakā cakkavattirājāno aññe ca mahesakkhā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālā
atk-s0102a:86_5: uppajjanti. Idañcettha bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ, tattha mayā nibbattitabbanti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:87: Tato kulaṃ vilokento – “buddhā nāma lokasammate kule nibbattanti. Idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ, tattha nibbattissāmi, bandhumā nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0102a:88_0: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento – “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0102a:88_1: pūritapāramī, jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlā hoti, ayañca bandhumatī nāma devī
atk-s0102a:88_2: īdisā, ayaṃ me mātā bhavissati, “kittakaṃ panassā āyū”ti āvajjanto “dasannaṃ māsānaṃ
atk-s0102a:89_0: Iti imaṃ pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā “kālo, me mārisā, buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ
atk-s0102a:89_1: saṅgahaṃ karonto paṭiññaṃ datvā – “gacchatha, tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi
atk-s0102a:89_2: parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi. Sabbadevalokesu hi nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0102a:89_3: Tatra naṃ devatā ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchāti pubbekatakusalakammokāsaṃ sārayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0102a:89_4: So evaṃ devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tattha vicarantoyeva cavi.
atk-s0102a:90_0: Evaṃ cuto ca ‘cavāmī’ti jānāti, cuticittaṃ na jānāti. Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāpi jānāti,
atk-s0102a:90_1: paṭisandhicittameva na jānāti. “Imasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhiṃ gahitā”ti evaṃ pana
atk-s0102a:90_2: jānāti. Keci pana therā – “āvajjanapariyāyo nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, dutiyatatiyacittavāre
atk-s0102a:90_3: eva jānissatī”ti vadanti. Tipiṭakamahāsīvatthero pana āha – “mahāsattānaṃ paṭisandhi
atk-s0102a:90_4: na aññesaṃ paṭisandhisadisā, koṭippattaṃ pana tesaṃ satisampajaññaṃ. Yasmā pana teneva
atk-s0102a:90_5: cittena taṃ cittaṃ ñātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā cuticittaṃ na jānāti. Cutikkhaṇepi ‘cavāmī’ti
atk-s0102a:90_6: jānāti. Paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti. ‘Asukasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhi gahitā’ti jānāti,
atk-s0102a:90_7: tasmiṃ kāle dasasahassilokadhātu kampatī”ti. Evaṃ sato sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamanto
atk-s0102a:90_9: sadisamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhi gaṇhi. Mahāsīvatthero pana upekkhāsahagatenāti
atk-s0102a:90_10: āha. Yathā ca amhākaṃ bhagavā, evaṃ sopi āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva
atk-s0102a:91_0: Tadā kira pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ mālāgandhādivibhūtisampannaṃ
atk-s0102a:91_1: nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānā bodhisattamātā sattame divase pāto uṭṭhāya gandhodakena
atk-s0102a:91_2: nahāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0102a:91_3: pavisitvā sirisayane nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā idaṃ supinaṃ addasa – “cattāro kira
atk-s0102a:91_4: naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā anotattadahaṃ netvā nahāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:91_5: nivāsetvā dibbagandhehi vilimpetvā dibbapupphāni piḷandhitvā, tato avidūre rajatapabbato,
atk-s0102a:91_6: tassa anto kanakavimānaṃ atthi, tasmiṃ pācīnato sīsaṃ katvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Atha bodhisatto
atk-s0102a:91_7: setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato, tattha caritvā tato oruyha
atk-s0102a:91_8: rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā mātaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ
atk-s0102a:92_0: Atha pabuddhā devī taṃ supinaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā vibhātāya rattiyā catusaṭṭhimatte
atk-s0102a:92_1: brāhmaṇapāmokkhe pakkosāpetvā haritūpalittāya lājādīhi katamaṅgalasakkārāya bhūmiyā
atk-s0102a:92_2: mahārahāni āsanāni paññapetvā tattha nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sappimadhusakkarābhisaṅkhatassa
atk-s0102a:92_3: varapāyāsassa suvaṇṇarajatapātiyo pūretvā suvaṇṇarajatapātīheva paṭikujjitvā adāsi,
atk-s0102a:92_4: aññehi ca ahatavatthakapilagāvīdānādīhi nesaṃ santappesi. Atha nesaṃ sabbakāmasantappitānaṃ
atk-s0102a:92_5: taṃ supinaṃ ārocetvā – “kiṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi. Brāhmaṇā āhaṃsu – “mā cintayi,
atk-s0102a:92_6: mahārāja, deviyā te kucchimhi gabbho patiṭṭhito, so ca kho purisagabbho na itthigabbho,
atk-s0102a:92_7: putto te bhavissati. So sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissati, rājā bhavissati cakkavattī. Sace
atk-s0102a:92_8: agārā nikkhamma pabbajissati, buddho bhavissati loke vivaṭṭacchado”ti. Ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0102a:93_0: Ayamettha dhammatāti ayaṃ ettha mātukucchiokkamane dhammatā, ayaṃ sabhāvo, ayaṃ niyāmoti
atk-s0102a:93_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Niyāmo ca nāmesa kammaniyāmo, utuniyāmo, bījaniyāmo, cittaniyāmo, dhammaniyāmoti pañcavidho.
atk-s0102a:94_0: Tattha kusalassa iṭṭhavipākadānaṃ, akusalassa aniṭṭhavipākadānanti ayaṃ kammaniyāmo.
atk-s0102a:94_1: Tassa dīpanatthaṃ – “na antalikkhe”ti gāthāya vatthūni vattabbāni. Apica ekā kira
atk-s0102a:94_2: itthī sāmikena saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ubbandhitvā maritukāmā rajjupāse gīvaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0102a:94_3: Aññataro puriso vāsiṃ nisento taṃ itthikammaṃ disvā rajjuṃ chinditukāmo – “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0102a:94_4: mā bhāyī”ti taṃ samassāsento upadhāvi. Rajju āsīviso hutvā aṭṭhāsi. So bhīto palāyi.
atk-s0102a:94_5: Itarā tattheva mari. Evamādīni cettha vatthūni dassetabbāni.
atk-s0102a:95_0: Tesu tesu janapadesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle ekappahāreneva rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalagahaṇādīni,
atk-s0102a:95_1: vātassa vāyanaṃ avāyanaṃ, ātapassa tikkhatā mandatā, devassa vassanaṃ avassanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:95_2: padumānaṃ divā vikasanaṃ rattiṃ milāyananti evamādi utuniyāmo.
atk-s0102a:96: Yaṃ panetaṃ sālibījato sāliphalameva, madhurato madhurasaṃyeva, tittato tittarasaṃyeva phalaṃ hoti, ayaṃ bījaniyāmo.
atk-s0102a:97_0: Purimā purimā cittacetasikā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0102a:97_1: upanissayapaccayena paccayoti evaṃ yadetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:98_0: Yā panesā bodhisattānaṃ mātukucchiokkamanādīsu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīnaṃ pavatti,
atk-s0102a:98_1: ayaṃ dhammaniyāmo nāma. Tesu idha dhammaniyāmo adhippeto. Tasmā tamevatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0102a:99_0: 18. Tattha kucchiṃ okkamatīti ettha kucchiṃ okkanto hotīti ayamevattho. Okkante hi
atk-s0102a:99_1: tasmiṃ evaṃ hoti, na okkamamāne. Appamāṇoti vuḍḍhippamāṇo, vipuloti attho. Uḷāroti
atk-s0102a:99_2: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Uḷārāni uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantītiādīsu hi madhuraṃ uḷāranti
atk-s0102a:99_3: vuttaṃ. Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatītiādīsu
atk-s0102a:99_4: seṭṭhaṃ uḷāranti vuttaṃ. Idha pana vipulaṃ adhippetaṃ. Devānaṃ devānubhāvanti ettha
atk-s0102a:99_5: devānaṃ ayamānubhāvo nivatthavatthassa pabhā dvādasayojanāni pharati, tathā sarīrassa,
atk-s0102a:99_6: tathā alaṅkārassa, tathā vimānassa, taṃ atikkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0102a:100_0: Lokantarikāti tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekeko lokantariko hoti, tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ
atk-s0102a:100_1: vā tiṇṇaṃ pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhapitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya. So pana lokantarikanirayo
atk-s0102a:100_2: parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahasso hoti. Aghāti niccavivaṭā. Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā.
atk-s0102a:100_4: samannāgatā. Tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati. Evaṃmahiddhikāti candimasūriyā
atk-s0102a:100_5: kira ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti, evaṃ mahiddhikā. Ekekāya disāya nava
atk-s0102a:100_6: nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti, evaṃmahānubhāvā.
atk-s0102a:100_7: Ābhāya nānubhontīti attano pabhāya nappahonti. Te kira cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena
atk-s0102a:100_8: vicaranti, cakkavāḷapabbatañca atikkamma lokantarikanirayā. Tasmā te tattha ābhāya nappahonti.
atk-s0102a:101_0: Yepi tattha sattāti yepi tasmiṃ lokantarikamahāniraye sattā uppannā. Kiṃ pana kammaṃ
atk-s0102a:101_1: katvā tattha uppajjantīti. Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca
atk-s0102a:101_2: upari aparādhaṃ, aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:101_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya. Tesaṃ attabhāvo tigāvutiko hoti, vaggulīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:101_4: viya dīghanakhā honti. Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapabbate lagganti.
atk-s0102a:101_5: Yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsaṃ gatā honti, atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti
atk-s0102a:101_6: maññamānā tattha vāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti, vāte paharantepi
atk-s0102a:101_7: madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti, patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0102a:102_0: Aññepi kira bho santi sattāti bho yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma, evaṃ aññe kira
atk-s0102a:102_1: sattāpi imaṃ dukkhamanubhavanatthāya idhūpapannāti taṃ divasaṃ passanti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0102a:102_2: obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati, accharāsaṅghāṭamattameva vijjobhāso viya
atk-s0102a:102_3: niccharitvā – “kiṃ ida”nti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyati. Saṅkampatīti samantato
atk-s0102a:102_4: kampati. Itaradvayaṃ purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. Puna appamāṇo cātiādi nigamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:103_0: 19. Cattāro naṃ devaputtā cātuddisaṃ rakkhāya upagacchantīti ettha cattāroti catunnaṃ
atk-s0102a:103_1: mahārājānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Dasasahassacakkavāḷesu pana cattāro cattāro katvā cattālīsasahassāni
atk-s0102a:103_2: honti. Tattha imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe mahārājāno khaggahatthā bodhisattassa ārakkhatthāya
atk-s0102a:103_3: upagantvā sirigabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā, itare gabbhadvārato paṭṭhāya avaruddhake paṃsupisācakādiyakkhagaṇe
atk-s0102a:104_0: Kimatthāya panāyaṃ rakkhā? Nanu paṭisandhikkhaṇe kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi koṭisatasahassamārā
atk-s0102a:104_1: koṭisatasahassasineruṃ ukkhipitvā bodhisattassa vā bodhisattamātuyā vā antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:104_2: āgaccheyyuṃ, sabbe antarāva antaradhāyeyyuṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā ruhiruppādavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0102a:104_3: – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ parupakkamena tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
atk-s0102a:104_4: Anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathāgatā parinibbāyanti. Gacchatha, tumhe bhikkhave, yathāvihāraṃ,
atk-s0102a:104_5: arakkhiyā, bhikkhave tathāgatā”ti. Evameva, tena parupakkamena na tesaṃ jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0102a:104_6: atthi, santi kho pana amanussā virūpā duddasikā bheravarūpā migapakkhino, yesaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0102a:104_7: vā disvā saddaṃ vā sutvā bodhisattamātu bhayaṃ vā santāso vā uppajjeyya, tesaṃ nivāraṇatthāya
atk-s0102a:104_8: rakkhaṃ aggahesuṃ. Apica bodhisattassa puññatejena sañjātagāravā attano gāravacoditāpi te evamakaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:105_0: Kiṃ pana te antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā ṭhitā cattāro mahārājāno bodhisattassa mātuyā attānaṃ
atk-s0102a:105_1: dassenti, na dassentīti? Nahānamaṇḍanabhojanādisarīrakiccakāle na dassenti, sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0102a:105_2: pavisitvā varasayane nipannakāle pana dassenti. Tattha kiñcāpi amanussadassanaṃ nāma
atk-s0102a:105_3: manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ hoti, bodhisattassa mātā pana attano ceva puttassa ca puññānubhāvena
atk-s0102a:105_4: te disvā na bhāyati, pakatiantepurapālakesu viya assā etesu cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:106_0: 20. Pakatiyā sīlavatīti sabhāveneva sīlasampannā. Anuppanne kira buddhe manussā tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:106_1: santike vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sīlaṃ gaṇhanti. Bodhisattamātāpi kāladevilassa
atk-s0102a:106_2: isino santike sīlaṃ gaṇhāti. Bodhisatte pana kucchigate aññassa pādamūle nisīdituṃ
atk-s0102a:106_3: nāma na sakkā, samānāsane nisīditvā gahitasīlampi āvajjanakaraṇamattaṃ hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0102a:107_0: 21. Purisesūti bodhisattassa pitaraṃ ādiṃ katvā kesuci manussesu purisādhippāyacittaṃ
atk-s0102a:107_1: nuppajjati. Bodhisattamāturūpaṃ pana kusalā sippikā potthakammādīsupi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:107_2: Taṃ disvā purisassa rāgo nuppajjatīti na sakkā vattuṃ, sace pana taṃ rattacitto upasaṅkamitukāmo
atk-s0102a:107_3: hoti, pādā na vahanti, dibbasaṅkhalikā viya bajjhanti. Tasmā “anatikkamanīyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:108_0: 22. Pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānanti pubbe kāmaguṇūpasañhitanti iminā purisādhippāyavasena
atk-s0102a:108_1: vatthupaṭikkhepo kato, idha ārammaṇappaṭilābho dassito. Tadā kira deviyā evarūpo
atk-s0102a:108_2: putto kucchiṃ upapannoti sutvā samantato rājāno mahagghaābharaṇatūriyādivasena pañcadvārārammaṇavatthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0102a:108_3: paṇṇākāraṃ pesenti. Bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātu ca katakammassa ussannattā lābhasakkārassa
atk-s0102a:109_0: 23. Akilantakāyāti yathā aññā itthiyo gabbhabhārena kilamanti hatthapādā uddhumātatādīni
atk-s0102a:109_1: pāpuṇanti, evaṃ tassā koci kilamatho nāhosi. Tirokucchigatanti antokucchigataṃ. Passatīti
atk-s0102a:109_3: Kimatthaṃ passati? Sukhavāsatthaṃyeva. Yatheva hi mātā puttena saddhiṃ nipannā vā
atk-s0102a:109_4: nisinnā vā – “hatthaṃ vāssa pādaṃ vā olambantaṃ ukkhipitvā saṇṭhapessāmī”ti sukhavāsatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:109_5: puttaṃ oloketi, evaṃ bodhisattamātāpi yaṃ taṃ mātu uṭṭhānagamanaparivattananisajjādīsu
atk-s0102a:109_7: “atthi nu kho me taṃ puttassā”ti sukhavāsatthaṃ olokayamānā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnaṃ
atk-s0102a:109_8: bodhisattaṃ passati. Yathā hi aññe antokucchigatā pakkāsayaṃ avattharitvā āmāsayaṃ
atk-s0102a:109_9: ukkhipitvā udarapaṭalaṃ piṭṭhito katvā piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṃ nissāya ukkuṭikaṃ dvīsu muṭṭhīsu
atk-s0102a:109_10: hanukaṃ ṭhapetvā deve vassante rukkhasusire makkaṭā viya nisīdanti, na evaṃ bodhisatto,
atk-s0102a:109_11: bodhisatto pana piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṃ piṭṭhito katvā dhammāsane dhammakathiko viya pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0102a:109_12: ābhujitvā puratthābhimukho nisīdati. Pubbekatakammaṃ panassā vatthuṃ sodheti, suddhe
atk-s0102a:109_13: vatthumhi sukhumacchavilakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. Atha naṃ kucchitaco paṭicchādetuṃ na
atk-s0102a:109_14: sakkoti, olokentiyā bahiṭhito viya paññāyati. Tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento bhagavā
atk-s0102a:109_15: seyyathāpītiādimāha. Bodhisatto pana antokucchigato mātaraṃ na passati. Na hi antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0102a:110_0: 24. Kālaṅkarotīti na vijātabhāvapaccayā, āyuparikkhayeneva. Bodhisattena vasitaṭṭhānañhi
atk-s0102a:110_1: cetiyakuṭisadisaṃ hoti, aññesaṃ aparibhogārahaṃ, na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā
atk-s0102a:110_2: aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃyeva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti, tasmā
atk-s0102a:110_3: tadā kālaṅkaroti. Katarasmiṃ pana vaye kālaṃ karotīti? Majjhimavaye. Paṭhamavayasmiñhi
atk-s0102a:110_4: sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti, tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthī gabbhaṃ
atk-s0102a:110_5: anurakkhituṃ na sakkoti, gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0102a:110_6: atikkamma tatiye koṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti, visade vatthumhi nibbattadārakā arogā
atk-s0102a:110_7: honti, tasmā bodhisattamātāpi paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiye
atk-s0102a:110_8: koṭṭhāse vijāyitvā kālaṃ karotīti ayamettha dhammatā.
atk-s0102a:111_0: 25. Nava vā dasa vāti ettha vā saddassa vikappanavasena satta vā aṭṭha vā ekādasa
atk-s0102a:111_1: vā dvādasa vāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Tattha sattamāsajāto jīvati, sītuṇhakkhamo
atk-s0102a:111_2: pana na hoti. Aṭṭhamāsajāto na jīvati, avasesā jīvanti.
atk-s0102a:112_0: 27. Devā paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno paṭiggaṇhanti. Kathaṃ
atk-s0102a:112_1: paṭiggaṇhanti? “Sūtivesaṃ gaṇhitvā”ti eke. Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ – ‘tadā
atk-s0102a:112_2: bodhisattamātā suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā macchakkhisadisaṃ dukūlapaṭaṃ yāva
atk-s0102a:112_3: pādantā pārupitvā aṭṭhāsi. Athassā sallahukagabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi, dhamakaraṇato
atk-s0102a:112_4: udakanikkhamanasadisaṃ. Atha te pakatibrahmaveseneva upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇajālena
atk-s0102a:112_5: paṭiggahesuṃ. Tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā paṭiggahesuṃ. Tato
atk-s0102a:112_6: manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena paṭiggahesuṃ’. Tena vuttaṃ – “devā paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, pacchā manussā”ti.
atk-s0102a:113: 28. Cattāro naṃ devaputtāti cattāro mahārājāno. Paṭiggahetvāti ajinappaveṇiyā paṭiggahetvā. Mahesakkhoti mahātejo mahāyaso lakkhaṇasampanno.
atk-s0102a:114_0: 29. Visadova nikkhamatīti yathā aññe sattā yonimagge laggantā bhaggavibhaggā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0102a:114_1: na evaṃ nikkhamati, alaggo hutvā nikkhamatīti attho udenāti udakena. Kenaci asucināti
atk-s0102a:114_2: yathā aññe sattā kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā yonimagge pakkhittā sataporisaṃ
atk-s0102a:114_3: narakapapātaṃ patantā viya, tāḷacchiddena nikkaḍḍhiyamānā hatthī viya mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0102a:114_4: anubhavantā nānāasucimakkhitāva nikkhamanti, na evaṃ bodhisatto. Bodhisattañhi kammajavātā
atk-s0102a:114_5: uddhapādaṃ adhosiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti. So dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya,
atk-s0102a:114_6: nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca dve pāde ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena
atk-s0102a:115_0: Udakassa dhārāti udakavaṭṭiyo. Tāsu sītā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patati uṇhā rajatakaṭāhe.
atk-s0102a:115_1: Idañca pathavitale kenaci asucinā asammissaṃ tesaṃ pānīyaparibhojanīyaudakañceva
atk-s0102a:115_2: aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ kīḷāudakañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, aññassa pana suvaṇṇarajataghaṭehi
atk-s0102a:115_3: āhariyamānaudakassa ceva haṃsavattakādipokkharaṇīgatassa ca udakassa paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0102a:116_0: 31. Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto. Pāḷiyaṃ pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatto viya dassito,
atk-s0102a:116_1: na evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nikkhantamattañhi naṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:116_2: tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā, tesaṃ hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena.
atk-s0102a:116_3: Manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhito. Setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāneti
atk-s0102a:116_4: dibbasetacchatte anudhāriyamānamhi. Ettha ca chattassa parivārāni khaggādīni pañca
atk-s0102a:116_5: rājakakudhabhaṇḍānipi āgatāneva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana rājagamane rājā viya chattameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:116_6: Tesu chattameva paññāyati, na chattaggāhako. Tathā khaggatālavaṇṭamorahatthakavāḷabījanīuṇhīsamattāyeva
atk-s0102a:116_7: paññāyanti, na tesaṃ gāhakā. Sabbāni kira tāni adissamānarūpā devatā gaṇhiṃsu. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-s0102a:121_0: Sabbā ca disāti idaṃ sattapadavītihārūpari ṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0102a:121_1: na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā paṭhaviyaṃ patiṭṭhito
atk-s0102a:121_2: puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi. Anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā
atk-s0102a:121_3: gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā – “mahāpurisa, idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti
atk-s0102a:121_4: āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā, heṭṭhā, uparīti dasa disā anuviloketvā
atk-s0102a:121_5: attanā sadisaṃ adisvā – “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti
atk-s0102a:121_6: evamettha attho veditabbo. Āsabhinti uttamaṃ. Aggoti guṇehi sabbapaṭhamo. Itarāni
atk-s0102a:121_7: dve padāni etasseva vevacanāni. Ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti padadvayena
atk-s0102a:122_0: Ettha ca samehi pādehi pathaviyā patiṭṭhānaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:122_1: uttarābhimukhabhāvo mahājanaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:122_4: pañcahi vimuttīhi vimuccanassa pubbanimittaṃ, sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0102a:122_6: “ayamantimā jātī”ti sīhanādo anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānassa pubbanimittanti
atk-s0102a:122_7: veditabbaṃ. Ime vārā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā, sambahulavāro pana nāgato, āharitvā dīpetabbo.
atk-s0102a:123_0: Mahāpurisassa hi jātadivase dasasahassilokadhātu kampi. Dasasahassilokadhātumhi devatā
atk-s0102a:123_1: ekacakkavāḷe sannipatiṃsu. Paṭhamaṃ devā paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, pacchā manussā. Tantibaddhā
atk-s0102a:123_2: vīṇā cammabaddhā bheriyo ca kenaci avāditā sayameva vajjiṃsu. Manussānaṃ andubandhanādīni
atk-s0102a:123_3: khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ chijjiṃsu. Sabbarogā vūpasamiṃsu, ambilena dhotatambamalaṃ viya vigacchiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_4: Jaccandhā rūpāni passiṃsu. Jaccabadhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu. Pīṭhasappī javasampannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:123_5: Jātijaḷānampi eḷamūgānaṃ sati patiṭṭhāsi. Videsapakkhandā nāvā supaṭṭanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_6: Ākāsaṭṭhakabhūmaṭṭhakaratanāni sakatejobhāsitāni ahesuṃ. Verino mettacittaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_7: Avīcimhi aggi nibbāyi. Lokantaresu āloko udapādi. Nadīsu jalaṃ nappavattati. Mahāsamudde
atk-s0102a:123_8: madhurasaṃ udakaṃ ahosi. Vāto na vāyi. Ākāsapabbatarukkhagatā sakuṇā bhassitvā pathavigatā
atk-s0102a:123_9: ahesuṃ. Cando ativiroci. Sūriyo na uṇho, na sītalo, nimmalo utusampanno ahosi. Devatā
atk-s0102a:123_10: attano attano vimānadvāre ṭhatvā apphoṭanaseḷanacelukkhepādīhi mahākīḷakaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_11: Cātuddīpikamahāmegho vassi. Mahājanaṃ neva khudā na pipāsā pīḷesi. Dvārakavāṭāni
atk-s0102a:123_12: sayameva vivariṃsu. Pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā pupphaphalāni gaṇhiṃsu. Dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0102a:124_1: ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0102a:124_2: paṭiggaṇhanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0102a:124_3: paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ. Pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0102a:124_4: paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ. Tantibaddhavīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0102a:124_5: pubbanimittaṃ. Cammabaddhabherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ mahatiyā dhammabheriyā anussāvanassa
atk-s0102a:124_6: pubbanimittaṃ. Andubandhanādīnaṃ chedo asmimānasamucchedassa pubbanimittaṃ. Mahājanassa
atk-s0102a:124_7: rogavigamo catusaccapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ. Jaccandhānaṃ rūpadassanaṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa
atk-s0102a:124_9: Pīṭhasappīnaṃ javasampadā caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ. Jaḷānaṃ satipatiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:124_11: catupaṭisambhidādhigamassa pubbanimittaṃ. Ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ yaṃ lokassa
atk-s0102a:125_2: vidhamitvā ñāṇālokadassanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Mahāsamuddassa madhuratā nibbānarasena
atk-s0102a:125_3: ekarasabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. Vātassa avāyanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhindanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:125_4: Sakuṇānaṃ pathavigamanaṃ mahājanassa ovādaṃ sutvā pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:125_5: Candassa ativirocanaṃ bahujanakantatāya pubbanimittaṃ. Sūriyassa uṇhasītavivajjanautusukhatā
atk-s0102a:125_6: kāyikacetasikasukhappattiyā pubbanimittaṃ. Devatānaṃ vimānadvāresu ṭhatvā apphoṭanādīhi
atk-s0102a:125_7: kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānaṃ udānassa pubbanimittaṃ. Cātuddīpikamahāmeghavassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:125_8: mahato dhammameghavassanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Khudāpīḷanassa abhāvo kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0102a:125_9: pubbanimittaṃ. Pipāsāpīḷanassa abhāvo vimuttisukhena sukhitabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:125_11: Rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalaggahaṇaṃ vimuttipupphehi pupphitassa ca sāmaññaphalabhārabharitabhāvassa
atk-s0102a:126_0: Ettha pañhaṃ pucchanti – “yadā mahāpuriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho
atk-s0102a:126_1: padasā gantvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ abhāsi, tadā kiṃ pathaviyā gato, udāhu ākāsena; dissamāno
atk-s0102a:126_2: gato, udāhu adissamāno; acelako gato, udāhu alaṅkatapaṭiyatto; daharo hutvā gato,
atk-s0102a:126_3: udāhu mahallako; pacchāpi kiṃ tādisova ahosi, udāhu puna bāladārako”ti? Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0102a:126_4: pañho heṭṭhālohapāsāde samuṭṭhito tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherena vissajjitova. Thero kira
atk-s0102a:126_5: ettha niyatipubbekatakammaissaranimmānavādavasena taṃ taṃ bahuṃ vatvā avasāne evaṃ
atk-s0102a:126_6: byākari – “mahāpuriso pathaviyā gato, mahājanassa pana ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0102a:126_7: Dissamāno gato, mahājanassa pana adissamāno viya ahosi. Acelako gato, mahājanassa
atk-s0102a:126_8: pana alaṅkatapaṭiyatto viya upaṭṭhāsi. Daharova gato, mahājanassa pana soḷasavassuddesiko
atk-s0102a:126_9: viya ahosi. Pacchā pana bāladārakova ahosi, na tādiso”ti. Parisā cassa – “buddhena
atk-s0102a:126_10: viya hutvā bho therena pañho kathito”ti attamanā ahosi. Lokantarikavāro vuttanayo eva.
atk-s0102a:127: Imā ca pana ādito paṭṭhāya kathitā sabbadhammatā sabbabodhisattānaṃ hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:129_0: 33. Addasa khoti dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā ānītaṃ addasa. Mahāpurisassāti jātigottakulapadesādivasena
atk-s0102a:129_1: mahantassa purisassa. Dve gatiyoti dve niṭṭhā, dve nipphattiyo. Ayañhi gatisaddo
atk-s0102a:129_2: – “pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo”ti ettha nirayādibhedāya sattehi gantabbagatiyā
atk-s0102a:129_3: vattati. “Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ
atk-s0102a:129_4: vā gatiṃ vā”ti ettha ajjhāsaye. “Nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti ettha paṭissaraṇe. “Api
atk-s0102a:129_5: ca tyāhaṃ brahme gatiñca pajānāmi, jutiñca pajānāmi evaṃmahiddhiko bako brahmā”ti
atk-s0102a:129_6: ettha nipphattiyaṃ vattati. Svāyamidhāpi nipphattiyaṃ vattatīti veditabbo. Anaññāti
atk-s0102a:130_0: Dhammikoti dasakusaladhammasamannāgato agatigamanavirahito. Dhammarājāti idaṃ purimapadasseva
atk-s0102a:130_1: vevacanaṃ. Dhammena vā laddharajjattā dhammarājā. Cāturantoti puratthimasamuddādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:130_2: catunnaṃ samuddānaṃ vasena caturantāya pathaviyā issaro. Vijitāvīti vijitasaṅgāmo.
atk-s0102a:130_3: Janapado asmiṃ thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti janapadatthāvariyappatto. Caṇḍassa
atk-s0102a:130_4: hi rañño balidaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrādīni
atk-s0102a:130_5: nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti. Atimudukassa rañño corehi sāhasikadhanavilopapīḷitā
atk-s0102a:130_6: manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti, iti evarūpe rājini janapado
atk-s0102a:130_7: thirabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Imasmiṃ pana kumāre rajjaṃ kārayamāne etassa janapado pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0102a:130_8: ṭhapetvā ayopaṭṭena parikkhitto viya thiro bhavissatīti dassento – “janapadatthāvariyappatto”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:134_0: Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, sabbe gandhapupphādīhi
atk-s0102a:134_1: tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Cakkaratanassa
atk-s0102a:134_2: ca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatīti aggho natthi, iti mahagghaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ. Cakkaratanañca
atk-s0102a:134_3: aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ. Yasmā ca pana yasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:134_4: kappe buddhā uppajjanti, tasmiṃyeva cakkavattino uppajjanti, buddhā ca kadāci karahaci
atk-s0102a:134_5: uppajjanti, tasmā dullabhadassanaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ. Tadetaṃ jātirūpakulaissariyādīhi
atk-s0102a:134_6: anomassa uḷārasattasseva uppajjati, na aññassāti anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:134_7: Yathā cakkaratanaṃ, evaṃ sesānipīti. Imehi sattahi ratanehi parivārabhāvena ceva
atk-s0102a:135_0: Idāni tesaṃ sarūpato dassanatthaṃ tassimānītiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkaratanantiādīsu
atk-s0102a:135_1: ayaṃ saṅkhepādhippāyo – dvesahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavaṃ
atk-s0102a:135_2: gahetvā dātuṃ samatthaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavati. Tathā purebhattameva sāgarapariyantaṃ
atk-s0102a:135_3: pathaviṃ anusaṃyāyanasamatthaṃ vehāsaṅgamaṃ hatthiratanaṃ, tādisameva assaratanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:135_4: caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:135_5: maṇiratanaṃ, chabbidhadosavivajjitaṃ manāpacāri itthiratanaṃ, yojanappamāṇe antopathavigataṃ
atk-s0102a:135_6: nidhiṃ dassanasamatthaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ, aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā sakalarajjamanusāsanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:136_0: Parosahassanti atirekasahassaṃ. Sūrāti abhīrukā. Vīraṅgarūpāti vīrānaṃ aṅgaṃ vīraṅgaṃ,
atk-s0102a:136_1: vīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ, vīraṅgaṃ rūpametesanti vīraṅgarūpā, vīriyajātikā vīriyasabhāvā
atk-s0102a:136_2: vīriyamayā akilāsuno ahesuṃ. Divasampi yujjhantā na kilamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāgarapariyantanti
atk-s0102a:136_3: cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ katvā ṭhitasamuddapariyantaṃ. Adaṇḍenāti ye katāparādhe satte
atk-s0102a:136_4: satampi sahassampi gaṇhanti, te dhanadaṇḍena rajjaṃ kārenti. Ye chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsanti,
atk-s0102a:136_5: te satthadaṇḍena. Ayaṃ pana duvidhampi daṇḍaṃ pahāya adaṇḍena ajjhāvasati. Asatthenāti
atk-s0102a:136_6: ye ekatodhārādinā satthena paraṃ vihesanti, te satthena rajjaṃ kārenti nāma. Ayaṃ
atk-s0102a:136_7: pana satthena khuddamakkhikāyapi pivanamattaṃ lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā dhammeneva
atk-s0102a:136_8: – “ehi kho mahārājā”ti evaṃ paṭirājūhi sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ
atk-s0102a:136_9: abhivijinitvā ajjhāvasati, abhibhavitvā sāmī hutvā vasatīti attho.
atk-s0102a:137_0: Evaṃ ekaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā dutiyaṃ kathetuṃ sace kho panātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0102a:137_2: vivaṭakaṃ etenāti vivaṭacchado. “Vivaṭṭacchadā”tipi pāṭho, ayameva attho.
atk-s0102a:138_0: 35. Evaṃ dutiyaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā tāsaṃ nimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni dassetuṃ ayañhi,
atk-s0102a:138_1: deva, kumārotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suppatiṭṭhitapādoti yathā aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pādaṃ
atk-s0102a:138_2: ṭhapentānaṃ aggapādatalaṃ vā paṇhi vā passaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ phusati, vemajjhe vā pana
atk-s0102a:138_3: chiddaṃ hoti, ukkhipantānaṃ aggatalādīsu ekakoṭṭhāsova paṭhamaṃ uṭṭhahati, na evamassa.
atk-s0102a:138_4: Assa pana suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati,
atk-s0102a:138_5: ekappahāreneva bhūmito uṭṭhahati. Tasmā ayaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādo.
atk-s0102a:139_0: Cakkānīti dvīsu pādatalesu dve cakkāni, tesaṃ arā ca nemi ca nābhi ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttāva.
atk-s0102a:139_1: Sabbākāraparipūrānīti iminā pana ayaṃ viseso veditabbo, tesaṃ kira cakkānaṃ pādatalassa
atk-s0102a:139_2: majjhe nābhi dissati, nābhiparicchinnā vaṭṭalekhā dissati, nābhimukhaparikkhepapaṭṭo
atk-s0102a:139_3: dissati, panāḷimukhaṃ dissati, arā dissanti, aresu vaṭṭilekhā dissanti, nemimaṇikā
atk-s0102a:139_4: dissanti. Idaṃ tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Sambahulavāro pana anāgato, so evaṃ daṭṭhabbo
atk-s0102a:139_5: – satti, sirivaccho, nandi, sovattiko, vaṭaṃsako, vaḍḍhamānakaṃ, macchayugaḷaṃ, bhaddapīṭhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:139_6: aṅkusako, pāsādo, toraṇaṃ, setacchattaṃ, khaggo, tālavaṇṭaṃ, morahatthako, vāḷabījanī,
atk-s0102a:139_7: uṇhīsaṃ, maṇi, patto, sumanadāmaṃ, nīluppalaṃ, rattuppalaṃ, setuppalaṃ, padumaṃ,
atk-s0102a:139_8: puṇḍarīkaṃ, puṇṇaghaṭo, puṇṇapāti, samuddo, cakkavāḷo, himavā, sineru, candimasūriyā,
atk-s0102a:139_9: nakkhattāni, cattāro mahādīpā, dviparittadīpasahassāni, antamaso cakkavattirañño
atk-s0102a:140_0: Āyatapaṇhīti dīghapaṇhi, paripuṇṇapaṇhīti attho. Yathā hi aññesaṃ aggapādo dīgho
atk-s0102a:140_1: hoti, paṇhimatthake jaṅghā patiṭṭhāti, paṇhiṃ tacchetvā ṭhapitā viya hoti, na evaṃ
atk-s0102a:140_2: mahāpurisassa. Mahāpurisassa pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā aggapādo hoti, tatiye
atk-s0102a:140_3: koṭṭhāse jaṅghā patiṭṭhāti, catutthakoṭṭhāse āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitā viya rattakambalageṇḍukasadisā paṇhi hoti.
atk-s0102a:141_0: Dīghaṅgulīti yathā aññesaṃ kāci aṅguliyo dīghā honti, kāci rassā, na evaṃ mahāpurisassa.
atk-s0102a:141_1: Mahāpurisassa pana makkaṭasseva dīghā hatthapādaṅguliyo mūle thūlā, anupubbena gantvā
atk-s0102a:141_2: agge tanukā, niyyāsatelena madditvā vaṭṭitaharitālavaṭṭisadisā honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “dīghaṅgulī”ti.
atk-s0102a:142_1: viya mudu. Yathā ca idāni jātamattassa, evaṃ vuḍḍhakālepi mudutalunāyeva bhavissanti,
atk-s0102a:143_0: Jālahatthapādoti na cammena paṭibaddhaaṅgulantaro. Ediso hi phaṇahatthako purisadosena
atk-s0102a:143_1: upahato pabbajjaṃ na paṭilabhati. Mahāpurisassa pana catasso hatthaṅguliyo pañcapi
atk-s0102a:143_2: pādaṅguliyo ekappamāṇā honti, tāsaṃ ekappamāṇatāya yavalakkhaṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0102a:143_3: tiṭṭhati. Athassa hatthapādā kusalena vaḍḍhakinā yojitajālavātapānasadisā honti.
atk-s0102a:144_0: Uddhaṃ patiṭṭhitagopphakattā ussaṅkhā pādā assāti ussaṅkhapādo. Aññesañhi piṭṭhipāde
atk-s0102a:144_1: gopphakā honti, tena tesaṃ pādā āṇibaddhā viya baddhā honti, na yathāsukhaṃ parivaṭṭanti,
atk-s0102a:144_2: gacchantānaṃ pādatalānipi na dissanti. Mahāpurisassa pana āruhitvā upari gopphakā
atk-s0102a:144_3: patiṭṭhahanti, tenassa nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya
atk-s0102a:144_4: niccalo hoti, adhokāyova iñjati, sukhena pādā parivaṭṭanti, puratopi pacchatopi ubhayapassesupi
atk-s0102a:144_5: ṭhatvā passantānaṃ pādatalāni paññāyanti, na hatthīnaṃ viya pacchatoyeva.
atk-s0102a:145_0: Eṇijaṅghoti eṇimigasadisajaṅgho maṃsussadena paripuṇṇajaṅgho, na ekato baddhapiṇḍikamaṃso,
atk-s0102a:145_1: samantato samasaṇṭhitena maṃsena parikkhittāhi suvaṭṭitāhi sāligabbhayavagabbhasadisāhi
atk-s0102a:146_0: Anonamantoti anamanto, etenassa akhujjaavāmanabhāvo dīpito. Avasesajanā hi khujjā
atk-s0102a:146_1: vā honti vāmanā vā. Khujjānaṃ uparimakāyo aparipuṇṇo hoti, vāmanānaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo.
atk-s0102a:146_2: Te aparipuṇṇakāyattā na sakkonti anonamantā jaṇṇukāni parimajjituṃ. Mahāpuriso pana
atk-s0102a:147_1: ohitaṃ paṭicchannaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ assāti kosohitavatthaguyho. Vatthaguyhanti vatthena
atk-s0102a:148_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā dīpidāṭhāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0102a:148_2: chavivaṇṇadassanatthaṃ kañcanasannibhattacoti vuttaṃ. Purimassa vā vevacanametaṃ.
atk-s0102a:149_0: Rajojallanti rajo vā malaṃ vā. Na upalimpatīti na laggati padumapalāsato udakabindu
atk-s0102a:149_1: viya vivaṭṭati. Hatthadhovanādīni pana utuggahaṇatthāya ceva dāyakānaṃ puññaphalatthāya
atk-s0102a:149_2: ca buddhā karonti, vattasīsenāpi ca karontiyeva. Senāsanaṃ pavisantena hi bhikkhunā
atk-s0102a:150: Uddhaggalomoti āvaṭṭapariyosāne uddhaggāni hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamānāni viya ṭhitāni lomāni assāti uddhaggalomo.
atk-s0102a:151_0: Brahmujugattoti brahmā viya ujugatto, ujumeva uggatadīghasarīro bhavissati. Yebhuyyena
atk-s0102a:151_1: hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti, te kaṭiyaṃ namantā pacchato
atk-s0102a:151_2: namanti, itaresu dvīsu ṭhānesu purato. Dīghasarīrā pana eke passavaṅkā honti, eke
atk-s0102a:151_3: mukhaṃ unnametvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti, eke appamaṃsalohitā sūlasadisā
atk-s0102a:151_4: honti, eke purato pabbhārā honti, pavedhamānā gacchanti. Ayaṃ pana ujumeva uggantvā
atk-s0102a:151_5: dīghappamāṇo devanagare ussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya bhavissatīti dīpenti. Yathā cetaṃ,
atk-s0102a:151_6: evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ jātamattassa sabbaso aparipuṇṇaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ āyatiṃ
atk-s0102a:152_0: Sattussadoti dve hatthapiṭṭhiyo dve pādapiṭṭhiyo dve aṃsakūṭāni khandhoti imesu sattasu
atk-s0102a:152_1: ṭhānesu paripuṇṇo maṃsussado assāti sattussado. Aññesaṃ pana hatthapādapiṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0102a:152_2: sirājālaṃ paññāyati, aṃsakūṭakkhandhesu aṭṭhikoṭiyo. Te manussā petā viya khāyanti,
atk-s0102a:152_3: na tathā mahāpuriso, mahāpuriso pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadattā nigūḷhasirājālehi
atk-s0102a:152_4: hatthapiṭṭhādīhi vaṭṭetvā suṭṭhapitasuvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadisena khandhena silārūpakaṃ viya
atk-s0102a:153_0: Sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo. Sīhassa hi puratthimakāyova
atk-s0102a:153_1: paripuṇṇo hoti, pacchimakāyo aparipuṇṇo. Mahāpurisassa pana sīhassa pubbaddhakāyo
atk-s0102a:153_2: viya sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo. Sopi sīhasseva tattha tattha vinatunnatādivasena dussaṇṭhitavisaṇṭhito
atk-s0102a:154_0: “Manāpiyeva kho, bhikkhave, kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite yehi aṅgehi dīghehi sobhati,
atk-s0102a:154_1: tāni aṅgāni dīghāni saṇṭhanti. Yehi aṅgehi rassehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni rassāni saṇṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:154_2: Yehi aṅgehi thūlehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni thūlāni saṇṭhanti. Yehi aṅgehi kisehi sobhati,
atk-s0102a:154_3: tāni aṅgāni kisāni saṇṭhanti. Yehi aṅgehi puthulehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni puthulāni
atk-s0102a:154_4: saṇṭhanti. Yehi aṅgehi vaṭṭehi sobhati, tāni aṅgāni vaṭṭāni saṇṭhantī”ti.
atk-s0102a:155: Iti nānācittena puññacittena cittito dasahi pāramīhi sajjito mahāpurisassa attabhāvo, loke sabbasippino vā sabbaiddhimanto vā patirūpakampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:156_0: Citantaraṃsoti antaraṃsaṃ vuccati dvinnaṃ koṭṭānaṃ antaraṃ, taṃ citaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:156_1: antaraṃsaṃ assāti citantaraṃso. Aññesañhi taṃ ṭhānaṃ ninnaṃ hoti, dve piṭṭhikoṭṭā
atk-s0102a:156_2: pāṭiyekkā paññāyanti. Mahāpurisassa pana kaṭito paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ yāva khandhā
atk-s0102a:156_3: uggamma samussitasuvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya piṭṭhiṃ chādetvā patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:157_0: Nigrodhaparimaṇḍaloti nigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo. Yathā paññāsahatthatāya vā satahatthatāya
atk-s0102a:157_1: vā samakkhandhasākho nigrodho dīghatopi vitthāratopi ekappamāṇova hoti, evaṃ kāyatopi
atk-s0102a:157_2: byāmatopi ekappamāṇo. Yathā aññesaṃ kāyo dīgho vā hoti byāmo vā, na evaṃ visamappamāṇoti
atk-s0102a:157_3: attho. Teneva yāvatakvassa kāyotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yāvatako assāti yāvatakvassa.
atk-s0102a:158_0: Samavaṭṭakkhandhoti samavaṭṭitakkhandho. Yathā eke koñcā viya ca bakā viya ca varāhā
atk-s0102a:158_1: viya ca dīghagalā vaṅkagalā puthulagalā ca honti, kathanakāle sirājālaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:158_2: mando saro nikkhamati, na evaṃ mahāpurisassa. Mahāpurisassa pana suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadiso
atk-s0102a:158_3: khandho hoti, kathanakāle sirājālaṃ na paññāyati, meghassa viya gajjito saro mahā hoti.
atk-s0102a:159_0: Rasaggasaggīti ettha rasaṃ gasanti harantīti rasaggasā. Rasaharaṇīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:159_1: tā aggā assāti rasaggasaggī. Mahāpurisassa kira sattarasaharaṇīsahassāni uddhaggāni
atk-s0102a:159_2: hutvā gīvāyameva paṭimukkāni. Tilaphalamattopi āhāro jivhagge ṭhapito sabbakāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:159_3: anupharati. Teneva mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa ekataṇḍulādīhipi kaḷāyayūsapasatamattenāpi
atk-s0102a:159_4: kāyassa yāpanaṃ ahosi. Aññesaṃ pana tathā abhāvā na sakalaṃ kāyaṃ ojā pharati. Tena
atk-s0102a:160_0: Sīhasseva hanu assāti sīhahanu. Tattha sīhassa heṭṭhimahanumeva paripuṇṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:160_1: na uparimaṃ. Mahāpurisassa pana sīhassa heṭṭhimaṃ viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā
atk-s0102a:160_2: pakkhassa candasadisāni honti. Atha nemittakā hanukapariyantaṃ olokentāva imesu hanukesu
atk-s0102a:160_3: heṭṭhime vīsati uparime vīsatīti cattālīsadantā samā aviraḷā patiṭṭhahissantīti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0102a:160_4: ayañhi deva, kumāro cattālīsadanto hotītiādimāhaṃsu. Tatrāyamattho, aññesañhi paripuṇṇadantānampi
atk-s0102a:160_5: dvattiṃsa dantā honti. Imassa pana cattālīsaṃ bhavissanti. Aññesañca keci dantā uccā,
