atk-s0102a:160_6: keci nīcāti visamā honti, imassa pana ayapaṭṭakena chinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viya samā
atk-s0102a:160_7: bhavissanti. Aññesaṃ kumbhilānaṃ viya dantā viraḷā honti, macchamaṃsāni khādantānaṃ
atk-s0102a:160_8: dantantaraṃ pūrenti. Imassa pana kanakaphalakāyaṃ samussitavajirapanti viya aviraḷā
atk-s0102a:160_9: tūlikāya dassitaparicchedā viya dantā bhavissanti. Aññesañca pūtidantā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0102a:160_10: Tena kāci dāṭhā kāḷāpi vivaṇṇāpi honti. Ayaṃ pana suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho osadhitārakampi
atk-s0102a:161_0: Pahūtajivhoti puthulajivho. Aññesaṃ jivhā thūlāpi honti kisāpi rassāpi thaddhāpi
atk-s0102a:161_1: visamāpi, mahāpurisassa pana jivhā mudu dīghā puthulā vaṇṇasampannā hoti. So hi etaṃ
atk-s0102a:161_2: lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ āgatānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ mudukattā taṃ jivhaṃ kathinasūciṃ
atk-s0102a:161_3: viya vaṭṭetvā ubho nāsikasotāni parāmasati, dīghattā ubho kaṇṇasotāni parāmasati,
atk-s0102a:161_4: puthulattā kesantapariyosānaṃ kevalampi nalāṭaṃ paṭicchādeti. Evamassa mududīghaputhulabhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:161_5: pakāsento tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodeti. Evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ jivhaṃ sandhāya “pahūtajivho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:162_0: Brahmassaroti aññe chinnassarāpi bhinnassarāpi kākassarāpi honti, ayaṃ pana mahābrahmuno
atk-s0102a:162_1: sarasadisena sarena samannāgato bhavissati, mahābrahmuno hi pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā
atk-s0102a:162_2: saro visado hoti. Mahāpurisenāpi katakammaṃ tassa vatthuṃ sodheti. Vatthuno suddhattā
atk-s0102a:162_3: nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saro visado aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatova samuṭṭhāti. Karavīko
atk-s0102a:163_0: Abhinīlanettoti na sakalanīlanetto, nīlayuttaṭṭhāne panassa umāpupphasadisena ativisuddhena
atk-s0102a:163_1: nīlavaṇṇena samannāgatāni nettāni honti, pītayuttaṭṭhāne kaṇikārapupphasadisena pītavaṇṇena,
atk-s0102a:163_3: setavaṇṇena, kāḷayuttaṭṭhāne addāriṭṭhakasadisena kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatāni. Suvaṇṇavimāne
atk-s0102a:164_0: Gopakhumoti ettha pakhumanti sakalacakkhubhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ, taṃ kāḷavacchakassa
atk-s0102a:164_2: attho. Aññesañhi cakkhubhaṇḍā aparipuṇṇā honti, hatthimūsikādīnaṃ akkhisadisehi viniggatehipi
atk-s0102a:164_3: gambhīrehipi akkhīhi samannāgatā honti. Mahāpurisassa pana dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā
atk-s0102a:165_0: Uṇṇāti uṇṇalomaṃ. Bhamukantareti dvinnaṃ bhamukānaṃ vemajjhe nāsikamatthakeyeva jātā,
atk-s0102a:165_1: uggantvā pana nalāṭavemajjhe jātā. Odātāti parisuddhā, osadhitārakasamānavaṇṇā. Mudūti
atk-s0102a:165_3: ayamassa odātatāya upamā. Sā panesā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānā upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā
atk-s0102a:165_4: hoti, vissaṭṭhā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭavasena āvaṭṭitvā uddhaggā hutvā santiṭṭhati. Suvaṇṇaphalakamajjhe
atk-s0102a:165_5: ṭhapitarajatapubbuḷakaṃ viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhamamānā khīradhārā viya, aruṇappabhārañjite
atk-s0102a:165_6: gaganappadese osadhitārakā viya ca atimanoharāya siriyā virocati.
atk-s0102a:166_0: Uṇhīsasīsoti idaṃ paripuṇṇanalāṭatañca paripuṇṇasīsataṃ cāti dve atthavase paṭicca
atk-s0102a:166_1: vuttaṃ. Mahāpurisassa hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalanalāṭaṃ
atk-s0102a:166_2: chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ rañño bandhauṇhīsapaṭṭo
atk-s0102a:166_3: viya virocati. Mahāpurisassa kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ disvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:166_4: Ayaṃ tāva eko attho. Aññe pana janā aparipuṇṇasīsā honti, keci kapisīsā, keci phalasīsā,
atk-s0102a:166_5: keci aṭṭhisīsā, keci hatthisīsā, keci tumbasīsā, keci pabbhārasīsā. Mahāpurisassa
atk-s0102a:166_6: pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapubbuḷasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:166_7: Tattha purimanaye uṇhīsaveṭhitasīso viyāti uṇhīsasīso. Dutiyanaye uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha
atk-s0102a:168_0: 37. Sabbakāmehīti idaṃ lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhāpetvā pacchā kataṃ viya vuttaṃ, na panevaṃ
atk-s0102a:168_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭhamañhi te nemittake santappetvā pacchā lakkhaṇapariggaṇhanaṃ katanti
atk-s0102a:168_2: veditabbaṃ. Tassa vitthāro gabbhokkantiyaṃ vuttoyeva. Pāyentīti thaññaṃ pāyenti.
atk-s0102a:168_3: Tassa kira niddosena madhurena khīrena samannāgatā saṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi, tathā
atk-s0102a:168_4: sesāpi tesu tesu kammesu kusalā saṭṭhisaṭṭhiyeva. Tāsaṃ pesanakārake saṭṭhi purise,
atk-s0102a:168_5: tassa tassa katākatabhāvaṃ sallakkhaṇe saṭṭhi amacce upaṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ cattāri saṭṭhiyo
atk-s0102a:168_6: itthīnaṃ, dve saṭṭhiyo purisānanti cha saṭṭhiyo upaṭṭhakānaṃyeva ahesuṃ. Setacchattanti
atk-s0102a:168_7: dibbasetacchattaṃ. Kuladattiyaṃ pana sirigabbheyeva tiṭṭhati. Mā naṃ sītaṃ vātiādīsu
atk-s0102a:168_8: mā abhibhavīti attho veditabbo. Svāssudanti so assudaṃ. Aṅkeneva aṅkanti aññassa
atk-s0102a:168_9: bāhunāva aññassa bāhuṃ. Aññassa ca aṃsakūṭeneva aññassa aṃsakūṭaṃ. Parihariyatīti
atk-s0102a:169_0: 38. Mañjussaroti akharassaro. Vaggussaroti chekanipuṇassaro. Madhurassaroti sātassaro.
atk-s0102a:169_1: Pemaniyassaroti pemajanakassaro. Tatridaṃ karavīkānaṃ madhurassaratāya – karavīkasakuṇe
atk-s0102a:169_2: kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitarasaṃ pivitvā pakkhena
atk-s0102a:169_3: tālaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā mattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti. Gocarapasutāpi catuppadā
atk-s0102a:169_4: mukhagatāni tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇanti. Vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā
atk-s0102a:169_5: ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvāva tiṭṭhanti. Anubaddhamigā ca maraṇabhayaṃ jahitvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:169_6: Ākāse pakkhandā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānāva tiṭṭhanti. Udake
atk-s0102a:169_7: macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ papphoṭetvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānāva tiṭṭhanti. Evaṃ madhurassarā karavīkā.
atk-s0102a:170_0: Asandhimittāpi dhammāsokassa devī – “atthi nu kho, bhante, buddhassarena sadiso kassaci
atk-s0102a:170_1: saro”ti saṅghaṃ pucchi. Atthi karavīkasakuṇassāti. Kuhiṃ, bhante, te sakuṇāti? Himavanteti.
atk-s0102a:170_2: Sā rājānaṃ āha – “deva, ahaṃ karavīkasakuṇaṃ passitukāmāmhī”ti. Rājā – “imasmiṃ pañjare
atk-s0102a:170_3: nisīditvā karavīko āgacchatū”ti suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi. Pañjaro gantvā ekassa
atk-s0102a:170_4: karavīkassa purato aṭṭhāsi. So – “rājāṇāya āgato pañjaro, na sakkā na gantu”nti tattha
atk-s0102a:170_5: nisīdi. Pañjaro āgantvā rañño purato aṭṭhāsi. Na karavīkasaddaṃ kārāpetuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:170_6: Atha rājā – “kathaṃ, bhaṇe, ime saddaṃ na karontī”ti āha. Ñātake adisvā devāti. Atha
atk-s0102a:170_7: naṃ rājā ādāsehi parikkhipāpesi. So attano chāyaṃ disvā – “ñātakā me āgatā”ti maññamāno
atk-s0102a:170_8: pakkhena tālaṃ datvā madhurassarena maṇivaṃsaṃ dhamamāno viya viravi. Sakalanagare
atk-s0102a:170_9: manussā mattā viya laḷiṃsu. Asandhimittā cintesi – “imassa tāva tiracchānagatassa
atk-s0102a:170_10: evaṃ madhuro saddo, kīdiso nu kho sabbaññutaññāṇasiripattassa bhagavato saddo ahosī”ti
atk-s0102a:170_11: pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-s0102a:170_12: patiṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ madhuro kira karavīkasaddoti. Tato pana satabhāgena sahassabhāgena
atk-s0102a:170_13: ca madhurataro vipassissa kumārassa saddo ahosīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:171_0: 39. Kammavipākajanti na bhāvanāmayaṃ, kammavipākavasena pana devatānaṃ cakkhusadisameva
atk-s0102a:171_1: maṃsacakkhu ahosi, yena nimittaṃ katvā tilavāhe pakkhittaṃ ekatilampi ayaṃ soti uddharitvā dātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0102a:172_0: 40. Vipassīti ettha ayaṃ vacanattho, antarantarā nimīlajanitandhakāravirahena visuddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:172_1: passati, vivaṭehi ca akkhīhi passatīti vipassī; dutiyavāre viceyya viceyya passatīti
atk-s0102a:173_0: Atthe panāyatīti atthe jānāti passati, nayati vā pavattetīti attho. Ekadivasaṃ kira
atk-s0102a:173_1: vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā atthe anusāsantassa rañño alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahāpurisaṃ
atk-s0102a:173_2: ānetvā hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu. Tassa taṃ aṅkekatvā upalāḷayamānasseva amaccā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ
atk-s0102a:173_3: akaṃsu. Bodhisatto anattamanasaddaṃ nicchāresi. Rājā – “kimetaṃ, upadhārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:173_4: Upadhāriyamānā aññaṃ adisvā – “aḍḍassa dubbinicchitattā evaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0102a:173_5: puna sāmikaṃyeva sāmikaṃ katvā “ñatvā nu kho kumāro evaṃ karotī”ti vīmaṃsantā puna
atk-s0102a:173_6: sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ akaṃsu. Punapi bodhisatto tatheva saddaṃ nicchāresi. Atha rājā
atk-s0102a:173_7: – “jānāti mahāpuriso”ti tato paṭṭhāya appamatto ahosi. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “viceyya
atk-s0102a:174_0: 42. Vassikantiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti vassakāle vasituṃ, ayaṃ vassiko. Itaresupi
atk-s0102a:174_1: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho vassāvāso vassaṃ, vassaṃ arahatīti vassiko.
atk-s0102a:175_0: Tattha vassiko pāsādo nātiucco hoti, nātinīco, dvāravātapānānipissa nātibahūni nātitanūni,
atk-s0102a:175_2: bhittiyopi nīcā honti, dvāravātapānāni tanukāni sukhumacchiddāni, uṇhappavesanatthāya
atk-s0102a:175_4: uṇhaviriyāni kambalādīni vaṭṭanti. Khajjabhojjaṃ siniddhaṃ kaṭukasannissitaṃ nirudakasannissitañca.
atk-s0102a:175_5: Gimhike thambhāpi bhittiyopi uccā honti, dvāravātapānāni panettha bahūni vipulajātāni
atk-s0102a:175_6: honti, bhūmattharaṇādīni dukūlamayāni vaṭṭanti. Khajjabhojjāni madhurasasannissitabharitāni.
atk-s0102a:175_7: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0102a:175_8: Tesu tesu padesesu udakayantāni karonti, yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0102a:176_0: Nippurisehīti purisavirahitehi. Na kevalañcettha tūriyāneva nippurisāni, sabbaṭṭhānānipi
atk-s0102a:176_1: nippurisāneva, dovārikāpi itthiyova, nahāpanādiparikammakarāpi itthiyova. Rājā kira
atk-s0102a:176_2: – “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā purisāsaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:176_3: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0102a:179_0: 43. Dutiyabhāṇavāre gopānasivaṅkanti gopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ. Bhogganti khandhe, kaṭiyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:179_1: jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu bhoggavaṅkaṃ. Daṇḍaparāyananti daṇḍagatikaṃ daṇḍapaṭisaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:179_2: Āturanti jarāturaṃ. Gatayobbananti atikkantayobbanaṃ pacchimavaye ṭhitaṃ. Disvāti
atk-s0102a:179_3: aḍḍhayojanappamāṇena balakāyena parivuto susaṃvihitārakkhopi gacchanto yadā ratho
atk-s0102a:179_4: purato hoti, pacchā balakāyo, tādise okāse suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavabrahmehi attano ānubhāvena
atk-s0102a:179_5: rathassa puratova dassitaṃ, taṃ purisaṃ passitvā. Suddhāvāsā kira – “mahāpuriso paṅke
atk-s0102a:179_6: gajo viya pañcasu kāmaguṇesu laggo, satimassa uppādessāmā”ti taṃ dassesuṃ. Evaṃ dassitañca
atk-s0102a:179_7: taṃ bodhisatto ceva passati sārathi ca. Brahmāno hi bodhisattassa appamādatthaṃ sārathissa
atk-s0102a:179_8: ca kathāsallāpatthaṃ taṃ dassesuṃ. Kiṃ panesoti “eso jiṇṇoti kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti, nāhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:179_9: bho ito pubbe evarūpaṃ addasa”nti pucchi.
atk-s0102a:180_0: Tena hīti yadi mayhampi evarūpehi kesehi evarūpena ca kāyena bhavitabbaṃ, tena hi
atk-s0102a:180_1: samma sārathi. Alaṃ dānajja uyyānabhūmiyāti – “ajja uyyānabhūmiṃ passissāmā”ti gacchāma,
atk-s0102a:180_2: alaṃ tāya uyyānabhūmiyāti saṃviggahadayo saṃvegānurūpamāha. Antepuraṃ gatoti itthijanaṃ
atk-s0102a:180_3: vissajjetvā sirigabbhe ekakova nisinno. Yatra hi nāmāti yāya jātiyā sati jarā paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:180_4: sā jāti dhiratthu dhikkatā atthu, jigucchāmetaṃ jātinti, jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdi,
atk-s0102a:181_0: 45. Sārathiṃ āmantāpetvāti rājā kira nemittakehi kathitakālato paṭṭhāya ohitasoto
atk-s0102a:181_1: vicarati, so “kumāro uyyānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge nivatto”ti sutvā sārathiṃ āmantāpesi.
atk-s0102a:181_2: Mā heva khotiādīsu rajjaṃ kāretu, mā pabbajatu, brāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ mā saccaṃ hotūti
atk-s0102a:183_0: 47. Addasa khoti pubbe vuttanayeneva suddhāvāsehi dassitaṃ addasa. Ābādhikanti iriyāpathabhañjanakena
atk-s0102a:183_1: visabhāgabādhena ābādhikaṃ. Dukkhitanti rogadukkhena dukkhitaṃ. Bāḷhagilānanti adhimattagilānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:183_2: Palipannanti nimuggaṃ. Jarā paññāyissati byādhi paññāyissatīti idhāpi yāya jātiyā
atk-s0102a:183_3: sati idaṃ dvayaṃ paññāyati, dhikkatā sā jāti, ajātaṃ khemanti jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto
atk-s0102a:185_0: 50. Vilātanti sivikaṃ. Petanti ito paṭigataṃ. Kālaṅkatanti katakālaṃ, yattakaṃ tena
atk-s0102a:185_1: kālaṃ jīvitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ katvā niṭṭhapetvā matanti attho. Imampissa purimanayeneva
atk-s0102a:185_2: brahmāno dassesuṃ. Yatra hi nāmāti idhāpi yāya jātiyā sati idaṃ tayaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:185_3: dhikkatā sā jāti, ajātaṃ khemanti jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdi, tatiyena sallena viddho viya.
atk-s0102a:187_0: 52. Bhaṇḍunti muṇḍaṃ. Imampissa purimanayeneva brahmāno dassesuṃ. Sādhu dhammacariyātiādīsu
atk-s0102a:187_1: ayaṃ deva dhammacaraṇabhāvo sādhūti cintetvā pabbajitoti evaṃ ekamekassa padassa
atk-s0102a:187_2: yojanā veditabbā. Sabbāni cetāni dasakusalakammapathavevacanāneva. Avasāne pana avihiṃsāti
atk-s0102a:187_3: karuṇāya pubbabhāgo. Anukampāti mettāya pubbabhāgo. Tenahīti uyyojanatthe nipāto.
atk-s0102a:187_4: Pabbajitaṃ hissa disvā cittaṃ pabbajjāya ninnaṃ jātaṃ. Atha tena saddhiṃ kathetukāmo
atk-s0102a:189_0: 54. Atha kho, bhikkhaveti – “pabbajitassa sādhu dhammacariyā”tiādīni ca aññañca bahuṃ
atk-s0102a:189_1: mahājanakāyena rakkhiyamānassa puttadārasambādhe ghare vasato ādīnavapaṭisaṃyuttañceva
atk-s0102a:189_2: migabhūtena cetasā yathāsukhaṃ vane vasato pabbajitassa vivekānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttañca
atk-s0102a:189_3: dhammiṃ kathaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā – atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro sārathiṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0102a:190_0: Imāni cattāri disvā pabbajitaṃ nāma sabbabodhisattānaṃ vaṃsova tantiyeva paveṇīyeva.
atk-s0102a:190_1: Aññepi ca bodhisattā yathā ayaṃ vipassī kumāro, evaṃ cirassaṃ cirassaṃ passanti.
atk-s0102a:190_2: Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto cattāripi ekadivasaṃyeva disvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0102a:190_3: anomānadītīre pabbajito. Teneva rājagahaṃ patvā tattha raññā bimbisārena – “kimatthaṃ,
atk-s0102a:196_0: 55. Sutvāna tesanti tesaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ sutvā etadahosi. Orakoti ūnako
atk-s0102a:196_1: lāmako. Anupabbajiṃsūti anupabbajitāni. Kasmā panettha yathā parato khaṇḍatissānaṃ
atk-s0102a:196_2: anupabbajjāya – “bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā nikkhamitvā”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ na vuttanti?
atk-s0102a:196_3: Nikkhamitvā sutattā. Ete kira sabbepi vipassissa kumārassa upaṭṭhākaparisāva, te
atk-s0102a:196_4: pātova upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kumāraṃ adisvā pātarāsatthāya gantvā bhuttapātarāsā āgamma
atk-s0102a:196_5: “kuhiṃ kumāro”ti pucchitvā “uyyānabhūmiṃ gato”ti sutvā “tattheva naṃ dakkhissāmā”ti
atk-s0102a:196_6: nikkhamantā nivattamānaṃ sārathiṃ disvā – “kumāro pabbajito”ti cassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0102a:196_7: sutaṭṭhāneyeva sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā antarāpaṇato kāsāvapītāni vatthāni āharāpetvā
atk-s0102a:196_8: kesamassuṃ ohāretvā pabbajiṃsu. Iti nagarato nikkhamitvā bahinagare sutattā ettha
atk-s0102a:197: Cārikaṃ caratīti gatagataṭṭhāne mahāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ sajjetvā āgamma svātanāya nimantito janassa āyācitabhikkhameva paṭiggaṇhanto cattāro māse cārikaṃ cari.
atk-s0102a:198_0: Ākiṇṇoti iminā gaṇena parivuto. Ayaṃ pana vitakko bodhisattassa kadā uppannoti? Sve
atk-s0102a:198_1: visākhapuṇṇamā bhavissatīti cātuddasīdivase. Tadā kira so – “yatheva maṃ ime pubbe
atk-s0102a:198_2: gihibhūtaṃ parivāretvā caranti, idānipi tatheva, kiṃ iminā gaṇenā”ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0102a:198_3: ukkaṇṭhitvā “ajjeva gacchāmī”ti cintetvā puna “ajja avelā, sace idāni gamissāmi,
atk-s0102a:198_4: sabbeva ime jānissanti, sveva gamissāmī”ti cintesi. Taṃ divasañca uruvelagāmasadise
atk-s0102a:198_5: gāme gāmavāsino svātanāya nimantayiṃsu. Te caturāsītisahassānampi tesaṃ pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0102a:198_6: mahāpurisassa ca pāyāsameva paṭiyādayiṃsu. Atha mahāpuriso punadivase tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0102a:198_7: gāme tehi pabbajitehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Tattha
atk-s0102a:198_8: te pabbajitā mahāpurisassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0102a:200: Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, taṃ bhayaṃ paṭibhāti ma”nti. ;
atk-s0102a:201_0: Evarūpe avivekārāmānaṃ bhayakāle sabbasattānaṃ sadarathakāleyeva – “ayaṃ kālo”ti
atk-s0102a:201_1: nikkhamitvā paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ pidahitvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukho pāyāsi. Aññadāpi ca tasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:201_2: ṭhāne vicaranto bodhimaṇḍaṃ passati, nisīdituṃ panassa cittaṃ na namitapubbaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0102a:201_3: divasaṃ panassa ñāṇaṃ paripākagataṃ, tasmā alaṅkataṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ disvā ārohanatthāya
atk-s0102a:201_4: cittaṃ uppannaṃ. So dakkhiṇadisābhāgena upagamma padakkhiṇaṃ katvā puratthimadisābhāge
atk-s0102a:201_5: cuddasahatthaṃ pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā – “yāva buddho
atk-s0102a:201_6: na homi, na tāva ito vuṭṭhahāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā nisīdi. Idamassa vūpakāsaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0102a:202_0: Aññeneva tānīti te kira sāyaṃ bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0102a:202_1: nisinnā “ativikālo jāto, upadhārethā”ti vatvā paṇṇasālaṃ vivaritvā taṃ apassantāpi
atk-s0102a:202_2: “kuhiṃ gato”ti nānubandhiṃsu, “gaṇavāse nibbinno eko viharitukāmo maññe mahāpuriso,
atk-s0102a:202_3: buddhabhūtaṃyeva naṃ passissāmā”ti vatvā antojambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkantā.
atk-s0102a:204_0: 57. Vāsūpagatassāti bodhimaṇḍe ekarattivāsaṃ upagatassa. Rahogatassāti rahasi gatassa.
atk-s0102a:204_1: Paṭisallīnassāti ekībhāvavasena nilīnassa. Kicchanti dukkhaṃ. Cavati ca upapajjati
atk-s0102a:204_2: cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ pana aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Jarāmaraṇassāti
atk-s0102a:204_3: ettha yasmā pabbajanto jiṇṇabyādhimatteyeva disvā pabbajito, tasmāssa jarāmaraṇameva
atk-s0102a:204_4: upaṭṭhāti. Tenevāha – “jarāmaraṇassā”ti. Iti jarāmaraṇaṃ mūlaṃ katvā abhiniviṭṭhassa
atk-s0102a:204_5: bhavaggato otarantassa viya – atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi.
atk-s0102a:205_0: Yonisomanasikārāti upāyamanasikārā pathamanasikārā. Aniccādīni hi aniccāditova manasikaroto
atk-s0102a:205_1: yonisomanasikāro nāma hoti. Ayañca – “kismiṃ nu kho satijātiādīni honti, kismiṃ asati
atk-s0102a:205_2: na hontī”ti udayabbayānupassanāvasena pavattattā tesaṃ aññataro. Tasmāssa ito yonisomanasikārā
atk-s0102a:205_3: iminā upāyamanasikārena ahu paññāya abhisamayo, bodhisattassa paññāya yasmiṃ sati
atk-s0102a:205_4: jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, tena jarāmaraṇakāraṇena saddhiṃ samāgamo ahosi. Kiṃ pana tanti?
atk-s0102a:205_5: Jāti. Tenāha – “jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”ti. Yā cāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā
atk-s0102a:205_6: paññā, tāya saddhiṃ bodhisattassa samāgamo ahosīti ayamettha attho. Etenupāyena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0102a:206_0: Nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha pana saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇanti ca, avijjāya sati
atk-s0102a:206_1: saṅkhārāti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, tadubhayampi na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Avijjāsaṅkhārā
atk-s0102a:206_2: hi atīto bhavo tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭiyati. Mahāpuriso hi paccuppannavasena
atk-s0102a:206_3: abhiniviṭṭhoti. Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhārehi adiṭṭhehi na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti.
atk-s0102a:206_4: Saccaṃ na sakkā, iminā pana te bhavaupādānataṇhāvaseneva diṭṭhāti. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0102a:206_5: vitthārato paṭiccasamuppādakathā kathetabbā. Sā panesā visuddhimagge kathitāva.
atk-s0102a:207_0: 58. Paccudāvattatīti paṭinivattati. Katamaṃ panettha viññāṇaṃ paccudāvattatīti? Paṭisandhiviññāṇampi
atk-s0102a:207_1: vipassanāñāṇampi. Tattha paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ paccayato paṭinivattati, vipassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:207_2: ārammaṇato. Ubhayampi nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamati, nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchati. Ettāvatā
atk-s0102a:207_3: jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte, nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa paccaye
atk-s0102a:207_4: honte, dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā…pe… upapajjetha vā,
atk-s0102a:207_5: ito hi paraṃ kiṃ aññaṃ jāyeyya vā…pe… upapajjeyya vā. Nanu etadeva jāyati ca…pe…
atk-s0102a:207_6: upapajjati cāti? Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna
atk-s0102a:207_7: taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento – “yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā
atk-s0102a:207_8: nāmarūpa”nti vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlaṃ
atk-s0102a:207_9: āyatimpi jātijarāmaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādimāha. Tattha kevalassa
atk-s0102a:207_11: dukkharāsissa nibbatti hoti. Iti mahāpuriso sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbattiṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:208_0: 59. Samudayo samudayoti khoti nibbatti nibbattīti kho. Pubbe ananussutesūti na anussutesu
atk-s0102a:208_1: assutapubbesu. Cakkhuṃ udapādītiādīsu udayadassanapaññāvesā. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu,
atk-s0102a:208_2: ñātakaraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā uppannaṭṭhena
atk-s0102a:208_3: vijjā, obhāsaṭṭhena ca ālokoti vuttā. Yathāha – “cakkhuṃ udapādīti dassanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0102a:208_4: Ñāṇaṃ udapādīti ñātaṭṭhena. Paññā udapādīti pajānanaṭṭhena. Vijjā udapādīti paṭivedhaṭṭhena.
atk-s0102a:208_5: Āloko udapādīti obhāsaṭṭhena. Cakkhudhammo dassanaṭṭho attho. Ñāṇadhammo ñātaṭṭho
atk-s0102a:208_6: attho. Paññādhammo pajānanaṭṭho attho. Vijjādhammo paṭivedhaṭṭho attho. Āloko dhammo
atk-s0102a:208_7: obhāsaṭṭho attho”ti. Ettakehi padehi kiṃ kathitanti? Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti paccayasañjānanamattaṃ
atk-s0102a:209_0: 61. Adhigato kho myāyanti adhigato kho me ayaṃ. Maggoti vipassanāmaggo. Bodhāyāti
atk-s0102a:209_1: catusaccabujjhanatthāya, nibbānabujjhanatthāya eva vā. Api ca bujjhatīti bodhi, ariyamaggassetaṃ
atk-s0102a:209_2: nāmaṃ, tadatthāyātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Vipassanāmaggamūlako hi ariyamaggoti. Idāni taṃ
atk-s0102a:209_3: maggaṃ niyyātento – “yadidaṃ nāmarūpanirodhātiādimāha. Ettha ca viññāṇanirodhotiādīhi
atk-s0102a:209_4: paccattapadehi nibbānameva kathitaṃ. Iti mahāpuriso sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anibbattinirodhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:210_0: 62. Nirodho nirodhoti khoti anibbatti anibbattiti kho. Cakkhuntiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0102a:210_1: Idha pana sabbeheva etehi padehi – “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotī”ti nirodhasañjānanamattameva
atk-s0102a:211_0: 63. Aparena samayenāti evaṃ paccayañca paccayanirodhañca viditvā tato aparabhāge.
atk-s0102a:211_1: Upādānakkhandhesūti upādānassa paccayabhūtesu khandhesu. Udayabbayānupassīti tameva
atk-s0102a:211_2: paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhaṃ udayañca vayañca anupassamāno. Vihāsīti sikhāpattaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:211_3: vahanto vihari. Idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ? Sabbeyeva hi pūritapāramino bodhisattā pacchimabhave
atk-s0102a:211_4: puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā padhānamanuyuñjitvā
atk-s0102a:211_5: bodhipallaṅkamāruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dutiyayāme
atk-s0102a:211_6: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhenti, tatiyayāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato
atk-s0102a:211_7: uṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā
atk-s0102a:211_8: yāva gotrabhuñāṇā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena sakale buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0102a:211_9: Ayampi mahāpuriso pūritapāramī. So yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ anukkamaṃ katvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0102a:211_10: ānāpānacatutthajjhānato uṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā vuttappakāraṃ udayabbayavipassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:212_0: Tattha iti rūpanti idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthīti ruppanasabhāvañceva
atk-s0102a:212_2: vutto. Iti rūpassa samudayoti iminā evaṃ pariggahitassa rūpassa samudayadassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:212_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho. Tassa vitthāro – “avijjāsamudayā
atk-s0102a:212_4: rūpasamudayo, taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, kammasamudayā rūpasamudayo, āhārasamudayā
atk-s0102a:212_5: rūpasamudayoti, nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0102a:213_0: Iti vedanātiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā, ito uddhaṃ vedanā natthi. Ayaṃ saññā,
atk-s0102a:213_1: ime saṅkhārā, idaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ettakaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ito uddhaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti vedayitasañjānanaabhisaṅkharaṇavijānanasabhāvañceva
atk-s0102a:213_2: sukhādirūpasaññādi phassādi cakkhuviññāṇādi bhedañca ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0102a:213_4: pana evaṃ pariggahitānaṃ vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ samudayadassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāpi
atk-s0102a:213_5: itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho. Tesampi vitthāro – “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti
atk-s0102a:213_6: rūpe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tīsu khandhesu “āhārasamudayā”ti
atk-s0102a:213_8: tesaṃyeva vasena yojetabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana udayabbayavinicchayo
atk-s0102a:213_9: sabbākāraparipūro visuddhimagge vutto. Tassa pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino
atk-s0102a:213_10: viharatoti tassa vipassissa bodhisattassa imesu rūpādīsu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-s0102a:213_11: samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasena udayabbayānupassino viharato yathānukkamena vaḍḍhite vipassanāñāṇe
atk-s0102a:213_12: anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānehi āsavasaṅkhātehi kilesehi anupādāya aggahetvāva cittaṃ
atk-s0102a:213_13: vimuccati, tadetaṃ maggakkhaṇe vimuccati nāma, phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ nāma; maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0102a:213_14: vā vimuttañceva vimuccati ca, phalakkhaṇe vimuttameva.
atk-s0102a:214_0: Ettāvatā ca mahāpuriso sabbabandhanā vippamutto sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhamiva padumaṃ
atk-s0102a:214_1: suvikasitacittasantāno cattāri maggañāṇāni, cattāri phalañāṇāni, catasso paṭisambhidā,
atk-s0102a:214_3: ca buddhaguṇe hatthagate katvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhipallaṅke nisinnova –
atk-s0102a:217: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi;
atk-s0102a:218: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0102a:223: Paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0102a:224: Evaṃ manasi karonto sarade sūriyo viya, puṇṇacando viya ca virocitthāti.
atk-s0102a:227_0: 64. Tatiyabhāṇavāre yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti yadi panāhaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ.
atk-s0102a:227_1: Ayaṃ pana vitakko kadā uppannoti? Buddhabhūtassa aṭṭhame sattāhe. So kira buddho
atk-s0102a:227_2: hutvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisīdi, sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅkaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi, sattāhaṃ
atk-s0102a:227_3: ratanacaṅkame caṅkami, sattāhaṃ ratanagabbhe dhammaṃ vicinanto nisīdi, sattāhaṃ ajapālanigrodhe
atk-s0102a:227_4: nisīdi, sattāhaṃ mucalinde nisīdi, sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi. Tato uṭṭhāya aṭṭhame
atk-s0102a:227_5: sattāhe puna āgantvā ajapālanigrodhe nisinnamattasseva sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo
atk-s0102a:227_6: ayañceva ito anantaro ca vitakko uppannoti.
atk-s0102a:228_0: Tattha adhigatoti paṭividdho. Dhammoti catusaccadhammo. Gambhīroti uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0102a:228_1: Duddasoti gambhīrattāva duddaso dukkhena daṭṭhabbo, na sakkā sukhena daṭṭhuṃ. Duddasattāva
atk-s0102a:228_2: duranubodho dukkhena avabujjhitabbo, na sakkā sukhena avabujjhituṃ. Santoti nibbuto.
atk-s0102a:228_3: Paṇītoti atappako. Idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atakkāvacaroti takkena
atk-s0102a:228_4: avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti, ñāṇeneva avacaritabbo. Nipuṇoti saṇho. Paṇḍitavedanīyoti
atk-s0102a:228_5: sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipannehi paṇḍitehi veditabbo. Ālayarāmāti sattā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0102a:228_6: allīyanti, tasmā te ālayāti vuccanti. Aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni ālayanti, tasmā ālayāti
atk-s0102a:228_7: vuccanti. Tehi ālayehi ramantīti ālayarāmā. Ālayesu ratāti ālayaratā. Ālayesu suṭṭhu
atk-s0102a:228_8: muditāti ālayasammuditā. Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ
atk-s0102a:228_9: uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati, pamudito āmodito hoti, na ukkaṇṭhati,
atk-s0102a:228_10: sāyaṃ nikkhamituṃ na icchati, evamimehipi kāmālayataṇhālayehi sattā ramanti, saṃsāravaṭṭe
atk-s0102a:228_11: pamuditā anukkaṇṭhitā vasanti. Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0102a:229_0: Yadidanti nipāto, tassa ṭhānaṃ sandhāya – “yaṃ ida”nti, paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0102a:229_1: – “yo aya”nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādoti imesaṃ paccayā
atk-s0102a:229_2: idappaccayā, idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā, idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo
atk-s0102a:229_3: cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo. Saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:229_4: Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabbaṃ nibbānameva. Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni
atk-s0102a:229_5: sammanti vūpasammanti tasmā – “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti vuccati. Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma
atk-s0102a:229_6: sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti, sabbā taṇhā khīyanti, sabbe kilesarāgā virajjanti,
atk-s0102a:229_7: sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā “sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho”ti
atk-s0102a:229_8: vuccati. Sā panesā taṇhā bhavena bhavaṃ, phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti
atk-s0102a:229_9: katvā vānanti vuccati. Tato vānato nikkhantanti nibbānaṃ. So mamassa kilamathoti
atk-s0102a:229_10: yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assa, sā mama vihesā assāti attho.
atk-s0102a:229_11: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti, citte pana ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi.
atk-s0102a:230_0: 65. Apissūti anubrūhanatthe nipāto. So – “na kevalaṃ etadahosi, imāpi gāthā paṭibhaṃsū”ti
atk-s0102a:230_1: dīpeti. Vipassintiādīsu vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassāti attho. Anacchariyāti
atk-s0102a:230_2: anuacchariyā. Paṭibhaṃsūti paṭibhānasaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa gocarā ahesuṃ, parivitakkayitabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:231_0: Kicchenāti dukkhena, na dukkhāya paṭipadāya. Buddhānañhi cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadāva
atk-s0102a:231_1: honti. Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:231_2: alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā
atk-s0102a:231_3: kulavaṃsapadīpakaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu
atk-s0102a:231_4: attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:231_5: Halanti ettha hakāro nipātamatto, alanti attho. Pakāsitunti desetuṃ; evaṃ kicchena
atk-s0102a:231_6: adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desetuṃ; ko attho desitenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rāgadosaparetehīti
atk-s0102a:232_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāsubhanti evaṃ gataṃ catusaccadhammaṃ.
atk-s0102a:232_1: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā. Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ
atk-s0102a:232_2: dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti, te apassante ko sakkhissati
atk-s0102a:232_3: evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ? Tamokhandhena āvuṭāti avijjārāsinā ajjhotthaṭā.
atk-s0102a:233: Appossukkatāyāti nirussukkabhāvena, adesetukāmatāyāti attho. Kasmā panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami? Nanu esa – “mutto mocessāmī, tiṇṇo tāressāmi”,
atk-s0102a:236_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti. Saccametaṃ, paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena
atk-s0102a:236_1: panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami. Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ dhammassa
atk-s0102a:236_2: ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena
atk-s0102a:236_3: pākaṭā jātā. Athassa – “ime sattā kañjikapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasātelapītapilotikā
atk-s0102a:236_4: viya añjanamakkhitahatthā viya kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā
atk-s0102a:236_5: mohamūḷhā, te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0102a:237_0: “Ayañca dhammo pathavīsandhārakaudakakkhandho viya gambhīro, pabbatena paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0102a:237_1: ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso, satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya
atk-s0102a:237_2: duranubodho, nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma
atk-s0102a:237_3: natthi, arakkhitaṃ sīlaṃ nāma natthi, aparipūritā kāci pāramī nāma natthi. Tassa
atk-s0102a:237_4: me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha, paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:237_5: anussarantassāpi na kampittha, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhentassāpi na kampittha,
atk-s0102a:237_6: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0102a:237_7: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ
atk-s0102a:237_8: paṭivijjhissantī”ti dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ namīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:238_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami. Jānāti hi bhagavā – “mama
atk-s0102a:238_1: appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati, ime ca sattā
atk-s0102a:238_2: brahmagarukā, te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi, atha naṃ mahābrahmā yācitvā
atk-s0102a:238_3: desāpesi, santo vata bho dhammo, paṇīto vata bho dhammo’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti.
atk-s0102a:238_4: Imampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami, no dhammadesanāyāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:239_0: 66. Aññatarassāti ettha kiñcāpi “aññataro”ti vuttaṃ, atha kho imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jeṭṭhakamahābrahmā
atk-s0102a:239_1: esoti veditabbo. Nassati vata bho lokoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi, yathā
atk-s0102a:239_2: dasasahassilokadhātubrahmāno sutvā sabbe sannipatiṃsu. Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma
atk-s0102a:239_3: loke. Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi. Apparajakkhajātikāti
atk-s0102a:239_4: paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ, evaṃ sabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā.
atk-s0102a:239_6: katādhikārā paripākagatā padumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ, dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā
atk-s0102a:239_7: catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve, anekasatasahassā
atk-s0102a:240_0: 69. Ajjhesananti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācanaṃ. Buddhacakkhunāti indriyaparopariyattañāṇena
atk-s0102a:240_1: ca āsayānusayañāṇena ca. Imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassa
atk-s0102a:240_3: vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ, te apparajakkhā. Yesaṃ taṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0102a:240_4: te mahārajakkhā. Yesaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni tikkhāni, te tikkhindriyā. Yesaṃ tāni
atk-s0102a:240_5: mudūni, te mudindriyā. Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā sundarā, te svākārā. Ye kathitakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:240_6: sallakkhenti, sukhena sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ, te suviññāpayā. Ye paralokañceva vajjañca
atk-s0102a:241_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷi – “saddho puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahārajakkho.…
atk-s0102a:241_1: Āraddhavīriyo…pe… kusīto… upaṭṭhitassati… muṭṭhassati… samāhito… asamāhito… paññavā…
atk-s0102a:241_2: duppañño puggalo mahārajakkho. Tathā saddho puggalo tikkhindriyo…pe… paññavā puggalo
atk-s0102a:241_3: paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, duppañño puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī. Lokoti
atk-s0102a:241_4: khandhaloko, dhātuloko, āyatanaloko, sampattibhavaloko, vipattibhavaloko, sampattisambhavaloko,
atk-s0102a:241_5: vipattisambhavaloko. Eko loko – sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Dve lokā – nāmañca rūpañca.
atk-s0102a:241_6: Tayo lokā – tisso vedanā. Cattāro lokā – cattāro āhārā. Pañca lokā – pañcupādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0102a:241_7: Cha lokā – cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni. Satta lokā – satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Aṭṭha
atk-s0102a:241_8: lokā – aṭṭha lokadhammā. Nava lokā – nava sattāvāsā. Dasa lokā – dasāyatanāni. Dvādasa
atk-s0102a:241_9: lokā – dvādasāyatanāni. Aṭṭhārasa lokā – aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo. Vajjanti sabbe kilesā
atk-s0102a:241_10: vajjaṃ, sabbe duccaritā vajjaṃ, sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajjaṃ.
atk-s0102a:241_11: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti, seyyathāpi
atk-s0102a:241_12: ukkhittāsike vadhake. Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati
atk-s0102a:241_13: aññāti paṭivijjhati, idaṃ tathāgatassa indriyaparopariyatte ñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0102a:242_0: Uppaliniyanti uppalavane. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni aññānipi
atk-s0102a:242_1: padumāni antonimuggāneva posayanti. Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0102a:242_2: ṭhitāni. Tattha yāni accuggamma ṭhitāni, tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni
atk-s0102a:242_3: ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni. Yāni samodakaṃ ṭhitāni, tāni sve pupphanakāni. Yāni udakānuggatāni
atk-s0102a:242_4: antoudakaposīni, tāni tatiyadivase pupphanakāni. Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarojauppalādīni
atk-s0102a:242_5: nāma atthi, yāni neva pupphissanti, macchakacchapabhakkhāneva bhavissanti, tāni pāḷiṃ
atk-s0102a:242_6: nārūḷhāni. Āharitvā pana dīpetabbānīti dīpitāni. Yatheva hi tāni catubbidhāni pupphāni,
atk-s0102a:242_7: evameva ugghaṭitaññū, vipañcitaññū, neyyo, padaparamoti cattāro puggalā. Tattha yassa
atk-s0102a:242_8: puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū.
atk-s0102a:242_9: Yassa puggalassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0102a:242_10: hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū. Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto
atk-s0102a:242_11: kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0102a:242_12: puggalo neyyo. Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi gaṇhato bahumpi
atk-s0102a:242_13: dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamo.
atk-s0102a:243_0: Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento – “ajja pupphanakāni
atk-s0102a:243_1: viya ugghaṭitaññū, sve pupphanakāni viya vipañcitaññū, tatiyadivase pupphanakāni
atk-s0102a:243_2: viya neyyo, macchakacchapabhakkhāni viya padaparamo”ti addasa. Passanto ca – “ettakā
atk-s0102a:243_3: apparajakkhā, ettakā mahārajakkhā. Tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0102a:243_4: addasa. Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ
atk-s0102a:244_0: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ
atk-s0102a:244_1: uppādetvā puna te sabbesupi tīsu bhavesu sabbe satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0102a:244_2: akāsi. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, vipākāvaraṇena
atk-s0102a:244_3: samannāgatā, kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ
atk-s0102a:244_4: okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ, ime te sattā abhabbā. Katame sattā bhabbā?
atk-s0102a:244_5: Ye te sattā na kammāvaraṇena…pe…ime te sattā bhabbā”ti.
atk-s0102a:245_0: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā – “ettakā
atk-s0102a:245_1: rāgacaritā, ettakā dosamohavitakkasaddhābuddhicaritā”ti cha koṭṭhāse akāsi. Evaṃ
atk-s0102a:245_2: katvā – “dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti cintesi. Brahmā taṃ ñatvā somanassajāto bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:245_3: gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi. Idaṃ sandhāya – “atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahābrahmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:246: 70. Tattha ajjhabhāsīti adhiabhāsi, adhikicca ārabbha abhāsīti attho.
atk-s0102a:247_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova,
atk-s0102a:247_1: na hi tattha ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi. Tathūpamanti
atk-s0102a:247_2: tappaṭibhāgaṃ selapabbatūpamaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho, yathā selapabbatamuddhani
atk-s0102a:247_3: yathāṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya, tathā tvampi sumedha, sundarapaññasabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0102a:247_4: samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:248_0: Ayamettha adhippāyo – yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha
atk-s0102a:248_1: kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ. Caturaṅgasamannāgatañca andhakāraṃ
atk-s0102a:248_2: assa. Athassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva
atk-s0102a:248_3: khettaṃ, na kedārapāḷiyo, na kuṭiyo, na tattha sayitamanussā paññāyeyyuṃ, kuṭikāsu
atk-s0102a:248_4: pana aggijālamattameva paññāyeyya. Evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato
atk-s0102a:248_5: tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā, te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa
atk-s0102a:248_6: āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti, rattiṃ khittasarā viya honti. Ye pana katakalyāṇā veneyyapuggalā,
atk-s0102a:248_7: te tassa dūre ṭhitāpi āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0102a:250: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:251_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati. Vīrātiādīsu
atk-s0102a:251_1: bhagavā vīriyavantatāya vīro, devaputtamaccukilesamārānaṃ vijitattā vijitasaṅgāmo,
atk-s0102a:252_0: 71. Apārutāti vivaṭā. Amatassa dvārāti ariyamaggo. So hi amatasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa
atk-s0102a:252_1: dvāraṃ. So mayā vivaritvā ṭhapitoti dasseti. Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:252_2: pamuñcantu vissajjentu. Pacchimapadadvaye ayamattho, ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi
atk-s0102a:252_3: imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ, idāni pana sabbe
atk-s0102a:252_4: janā saddhābhājanaṃ upanentu, pūressāmi tesaṃ saṅkappanti.
atk-s0102a:254_0: 73. Bodhirukkhamūleti bodhirukkhassa avidūre ajapālanigrodhe antarahitoti attho.
atk-s0102a:254_1: Kheme migadāyeti isipatanaṃ tena samayena khemaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ hoti, migānaṃ pana
atk-s0102a:254_2: abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “kheme migadāye”ti.
atk-s0102a:254_3: Yathā ca vipassī bhagavā, evaṃ aññepi buddhā paṭhamaṃ dhammadesanatthāya gacchantā
atk-s0102a:254_4: ākāsena gantvā tattheva otaranti. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavā upakassa ājīvakassa upanissayaṃ
atk-s0102a:254_5: disvā – “upako imaṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno, so maṃ disvā sallapitvā gamissati. Atha puna
atk-s0102a:254_6: nibbindanto āgamma arahattaṃ sacchikarissatī”ti ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ padasāva
atk-s0102a:254_7: agamāsi. Dāyapālaṃ āmantesīti disvāva punappunaṃ oloketvā – “ayyo no, bhante, āgato”ti
atk-s0102a:255_0: 75-6. Anupubbiṃ kathanti dānakathaṃ, dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ saggaṃ, saggānantaraṃ
atk-s0102a:255_1: magganti evaṃ anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ kathesi. Tattha dānakathanti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:255_2: nidānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ, bhogānaṃ patiṭṭhā, visamagatassa tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ,
atk-s0102a:255_3: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:255_4: natthi. Idañhi avassayaṭṭhena ratanamayasīhāsanasadisaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena mahāpathavīsadisaṃ,
atk-s0102a:255_5: ārammaṇaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisaṃ. Idañhi dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena nāvā, samassāsanaṭṭhena
atk-s0102a:255_7: padumaṃ, tesaṃ nidahanaṭṭhena aggi, durāsadaṭṭhena āsīviso, asantāsanaṭṭhena sīho,
atk-s0102a:255_9: valāhakaassarājā. Dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0102a:255_10: sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ abhisambodhiñāṇaṃ detīti evamādidānaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0102a:256_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:256_1: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:256_2: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:256_3: gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi, sīlasadiso alaṅkāro natthi, sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthi,
atk-s0102a:256_4: sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthi, sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhanaṃ
atk-s0102a:256_5: sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādisīlaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0102a:257_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:257_1: Saggakathanti ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo, niccamettha kīḷā, niccaṃ sampattiyo
atk-s0102a:257_2: labbhanti, cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0102a:257_3: paṭilabhanti, tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0102a:257_4: kathaṃ. Saggasampattiṃ kathayantānañhi buddhānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ
atk-s0102a:258_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya
atk-s0102a:258_1: – “ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo, na ettha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ – “appassādā
atk-s0102a:258_2: kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0102a:258_3: okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi. Tattha ādīnavoti doso. Okāroti avakāro lāmakabhāvo. Saṃkilesoti
atk-s0102a:258_4: tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Yathāha – “kilissanti vata bho sattā”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0102a:258_5: kāmādīnavena tejjatvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi, pabbajjāya guṇaṃ pakāsesīti attho.
atk-s0102a:259_0: 77. Alatthunti kathaṃ alatthuṃ? Ehibhikkhubhāvena. Bhagavā kira tesaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0102a:259_1: olokento anekāsu jātīsu cīvaradānādīni disvā etha bhikkhavotiādimāha. Te tāvadeva
atk-s0102a:259_2: bhaṇḍū kāsāyavasanā aṭṭhahi bhikkhuparikkhārehi sarīrapaṭimukkeheva vassasatikattherā
atk-s0102a:260_0: Sandassesītiādīsu idhalokatthaṃ sandassesi, paralokatthaṃ sandassesi. Idhalokatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:260_1: dassento aniccanti dassesi, dukkhanti dassesi, anattāti dassesi, khandhe dassesi,
atk-s0102a:260_2: dhātuyo dassesi, āyatanāni dassesi, paṭiccasamuppādaṃ dassesi, rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ
atk-s0102a:260_3: dassento pañca lakkhaṇāni dassesi, tathā vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ, tathā vayaṃ dassentopi
atk-s0102a:260_4: udayabbayavasena paññāsalakkhaṇāni dassesi, paralokatthaṃ dassento nirayaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0102a:260_5: tiracchānayoniṃ, pettivisayaṃ, asurakāyaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākaṃ, channaṃ devalokānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:262_0: Samuttejesīti suṭṭhu uttejesi, abbhussāhesi. Idhalokatthañceva paralokatthañca tāsetvā
atk-s0102a:262_2: idhalokatthaṃ buddhe bhagavati tāsetvā tāsetvā kathayante pacchābāhaṃ, gāḷhabandhanaṃ
atk-s0102a:262_3: bandhitvā cātumahāpathe pahārasatena tāḷetvā dakkhiṇadvārena niyyamāno viya āghātanabhaṇḍikāya
atk-s0102a:262_4: ṭhapitasīso viya sūle uttāsito viya mattahatthinā maddiyamāno viya ca saṃviggo hoti.
atk-s0102a:262_5: Paralokatthañca kathayante nirayādīsu nibbatto viya devalokasampattiṃ anubhavamāno viya ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:263: Sampahaṃsesīti paṭiladdhaguṇena codesi, mahānisaṃsaṃ katvā kathesīti attho.
atk-s0102a:264_0: Saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavanti heṭṭhā paṭhamamaggādhigamatthaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0102a:264_1: idha pana uparimaggādhigamatthaṃ – “aniccā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā addhuvā anassāsikā,
atk-s0102a:264_2: yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitu”ntiādinā
atk-s0102a:264_3: nayena saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavañca lāmakabhāvañca tappaccayañca kilamathaṃ pakāsesi. Yathā
atk-s0102a:264_4: ca tattha nekkhamme, evamidha – “santamidaṃ, bhikkhave, nibbānaṃ nāma paṇītaṃ tāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:267: 80. Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma, dhammañcāti saṅghassa aparipuṇṇattā dvevācikameva saraṇamagamaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:268: 81. Alatthunti pubbe vuttanayeneva ehibhikkhubhāveneva alatthuṃ. Ito anantare pabbajitavārepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0102a:270_0: 85. Parivitakko udapādīti kadā udapādi? Sambodhito satta saṃvaccharāni satta māse
atk-s0102a:270_1: satta divase atikkamitvā udapādi. Bhagavā kira pitusaṅgahaṃ karonto vihāsi. Rājāpi
atk-s0102a:270_2: cintesi – “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhaputto nikkhamitvā buddho jāto, dutiyaputto me nikkhamitvā
atk-s0102a:270_3: aggasāvako jāto, purohitaputto dutiyaaggasāvako, ime ca avasesā bhikkhū gihikālepi
atk-s0102a:270_4: mayhaṃ puttameva parivāretvā vicariṃsu. Ime sabbe idānipi mayhaṃyeva bhāro, ahameva
atk-s0102a:270_5: ca ne catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmi, aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na dassāmī”ti vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato
atk-s0102a:270_6: paṭṭhāya yāva rājagehadvārā ubhayato khadirapākāraṃ kārāpetvā kilañjehi chādāpetvā
atk-s0102a:270_7: vatthehi paṭicchādāpetvā upari ca chādāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakavicittaṃ samolambitatālakkhandhamattaṃ
atk-s0102a:270_8: vividhapupphadāmavitānaṃ kārāpetvā heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ cittattharaṇehi santharāpetvā
atk-s0102a:270_9: anto ubhosu passesu mālāvacchake puṇṇaghaṭe, sakalamaggavāsatthāya ca gandhantare
atk-s0102a:270_10: pupphāni pupphantare gandhe ca ṭhapāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0102a:271_0: Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto antosāṇiyāva rājagehaṃgantvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0102a:271_1: paccāgacchati. Añño koci daṭṭhumpi na labhati, kuto pana bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ, pūjaṃ
atk-s0102a:271_2: vā kātuṃ, dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ. Nāgarā cintesuṃ – “ajja satthu loke uppannassa sattamāsādhikāni
atk-s0102a:271_3: sattasaṃvaccharāni, mayañca daṭṭhumpi na labhāma, pageva bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ, pūjaṃ
atk-s0102a:271_4: vā kātuṃ, dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ. Rājā – ‘mayhameva buddho, mayhameva dhammo, mayhameva
atk-s0102a:271_5: saṅgho’ti mamāyitvā sayameva upaṭṭhahi. Satthā ca uppajjamāno sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0102a:271_6: atthāya hitāya uppanno. Na hi raññoyeva nirayo uṇho assa, aññesaṃ nīluppalavanasadiso.
atk-s0102a:271_7: Tasmā rājānaṃ vadāma. Sace no satthāraṃ deti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce deti, raññā
atk-s0102a:271_8: saddhiṃ yujjhitvāpi saṅghaṃ gahetvā dānādīni puññāni karoma. Na sakkā kho pana suddhanāgareheva
atk-s0102a:272_0: Te senāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassetamatthaṃ ārocetvā – “sāmi, kiṃ amhākaṃ pakkho hosi,
atk-s0102a:272_1: udāhu rañño”ti āhaṃsu. So – “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pakkho homi, api ca kho pana paṭhamadivaso
atk-s0102a:272_2: mayhaṃ dātabbo”ti. Te sampaṭicchiṃsu. So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “nāgarā, deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0102a:272_3: kupitā”ti āha. Kimatthaṃ tātāti? Satthāraṃ kira tumheyeva upaṭṭhahatha, amhe na labhāmāti.
atk-s0102a:272_4: Sace idānipi labhanti, na kuppanti, alabhantā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhitukāmā devāti.
atk-s0102a:272_5: Yujjhāmi, tāta, nāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ demīti. Deva tumhākaṃ dāsā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmāti
atk-s0102a:272_6: vadanti, tumhe kaṃ gaṇhitvā yujjhissathāti? Nanu tvaṃ senāpatīti? Nāgarehi vinā na
atk-s0102a:272_7: samattho ahaṃ devāti. Tato rājā – “balavanto nāgarā, senāpatipi tesaññeva pakkho”ti
atk-s0102a:272_8: ñatvā “aññānipi sattamāsādhikāni sattasaṃvaccharāni mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ dadantū”ti
atk-s0102a:272_9: āha. Nāgarā na sampaṭicchiṃsu. Rājā – “cha vassāni, pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekavassa”nti
atk-s0102a:272_10: hāpesi. Evaṃ hāpentepi na sampaṭicchiṃsu. Aññe satta divase yāci. Nāgarā – “atikakkhaḷaṃ
atk-s0102a:272_11: dāni raññā saddhiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:273_0: Rājā sattamāsādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ sajjitaṃ dānamukhaṃ sattannameva
atk-s0102a:273_1: divasānaṃ vissajjetvā cha divase kesañci apassantānaṃyeva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase
atk-s0102a:273_2: nāgare pakkosāpetvā – “sakkhissatha, tāta, evarūpaṃ dānaṃ dātu”nti āha. Tepi – “nanu
atk-s0102a:273_3: amheyeva nissāya taṃ devassa uppanna”nti vatvā – “sakkhissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā piṭṭhihatthena
atk-s0102a:273_4: assūni puñchamāno bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “bhante, ahaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ
atk-s0102a:273_5: aññassa vāraṃ akatvā yāvajīvaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmīti cintesiṃ. Nāgarā
atk-s0102a:273_6: na dāni me anuññātā, nāgarā hi ‘mayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhāmā’ti kuppanti. Bhagavā
atk-s0102a:273_7: sve paṭṭhāya tesaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:274_0: Atha dutiyadivase senāpati mahādānaṃ sajjetvā – “ajja yathā añño koci ekabhikkhampi
atk-s0102a:274_1: na deti, evaṃ rakkhathā”ti samantā purise ṭhapesi. Taṃ divasaṃ seṭṭhibhariyā rodamānā
atk-s0102a:274_2: dhītaraṃ āha – “sace, amma, tava pitā jīveyya, ajjāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ dasabalaṃ bhojeyya”nti.
atk-s0102a:274_3: Sā taṃ āha – “amma, mā cintayi, ahaṃ tathā karissāmi yathā buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0102a:274_4: paṭhamaṃ amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ paribhuñjissatī”ti. Tato satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0102a:274_5: nirudakapāyāsassa pūretvā sappimadhusakkarādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā aññāya pātiyā paṭikujjitvā
atk-s0102a:274_6: taṃ sumanamālāguḷehi parikkhipitvā mālāguḷasadisaṃ katvā bhagavato gāmaṃ pavisanavelāya
atk-s0102a:274_7: sayameva ukkhipitvā dāsigaṇaparivutā nagarā nikkhami. Antarāmagge senāpatiupaṭṭhākā
atk-s0102a:274_8: – “amma, mā ito agamā”ti vadanti. Mahāpuññā nāma manāpakathā honti, na ca tesaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0102a:274_9: bhaṇantānaṃ kathā paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā hoti. Sā – “cūḷapitā mahāpitā mātulā kissa
atk-s0102a:274_10: tumhe gantuṃ na dethā”ti āha. Senāpatinā – “aññassa kassaci khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0102a:274_11: mā dethā”ti ṭhapitamha ammāti. Kiṃ pana me hatthe khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passathāti?
atk-s0102a:274_12: Mālāguḷaṃ passāmāti. Kiṃ tumhākaṃ senāpati mālāguḷapūjampi kātuṃ na detīti? Deti,
atk-s0102a:274_13: ammāti. Tena hi, apetha, apethāti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhāpetha
atk-s0102a:274_14: bhagavāti āha. Bhagavā ekaṃ senāpatissupaṭṭhākaṃ oloketvā mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhāpesi. Sā
atk-s0102a:274_15: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “bhagavā, bhavābhave nibbattiyaṃ me sati paritassanajīvitaṃ
atk-s0102a:274_16: nāma mā hotu, ayaṃ sumanamālā viya nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne piyāva homi, nāmena ca
atk-s0102a:274_17: sumanā yevā”ti patthanaṃ katvā satthārā – “sukhinī hohī”ti vuttā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0102a:275_0: Bhagavā senāpatissa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi. Senāpati yāguṃ gahetvā upagañchi,
atk-s0102a:275_1: satthā pattaṃ pidahi. Nisinno, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghoti. Atthi no eko antarā piṇḍapāto
atk-s0102a:275_2: laddhoti. So mālaṃ apanetvā piṇḍapātaṃ addasa. Cūḷupaṭṭhāko āha – “sāmi, mālāti maṃ
atk-s0102a:275_3: vatvā mātugāmo vañcesī”ti. Pāyāso bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahoti.
atk-s0102a:275_4: Senāpatipi attano deyyadhammaṃ adāsi. Satthā bhattakiccaṃ katvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0102a:275_5: Senāpati – “kā nāma sā piṇḍapātamadāsī”ti pucchi. Seṭṭhidhītā, sāmīti. Sappaññā sā
atk-s0102a:275_6: itthī, evarūpāya ghare vasantiyā purisassa saggasampatti nāma na dullabhāti taṃ ānetvā
atk-s0102a:276_0: Punadivase nāgarā dānamadaṃsu, punadivase rājāti ekantarikāya dānaṃ dātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:276_1: Rājāpi carapurise ṭhapetvā nāgarehi dinnadānato atirekataraṃ deti, nāgarāpi tatheva
atk-s0102a:276_2: katvā raññā dinnadānato atirekataraṃ. Rājagehe nāṭakitthiyo daharasāmaṇere vadanti
atk-s0102a:276_3: – “gaṇhatha, tātā, na gahapatikānaṃ gattavatthādīsu puñchitvā bāḷadārakānaṃ kheḷasiṅghāṇikādidhovanahatthehi
atk-s0102a:276_4: kataṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ kata”nti. Punadivase nāgarāpi dadamānā vadanti – “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0102a:276_5: tātā, na nagaragāmanigamādīsu saṅkaḍḍhitataṇḍulakhīradadhisappiādīhi, na aññesaṃ
atk-s0102a:276_6: jaṅghasīsapiṭṭhiādīni bhañjitvā āharāpitehi kataṃ, jātisappikhīrādīhiyeva kata”nti.
atk-s0102a:276_7: Evaṃ sattasu saṃvaccharesu sattasu māsesu sattasu divasesu ca atikkantesu atha bhagavato
atk-s0102a:276_8: ayaṃ vitakko udapādi. Tena vuttaṃ – “sambodhito satta saṃvaccharāni satta māsāni
atk-s0102a:278: 89. Caturāsīti āvāsasahassānīti caturāsīti vihārasahassāni. Te sabbepi dvādasasahassabhikkhugaṇhanakā mahāvihārā abhayagiricetiyapabbatacittalapabbatamahāvihārasadisāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:279_0: 90. Khantī paramaṃ tapoti adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo. Titikkhāti khantiyā
atk-s0102a:279_1: eva vevacanaṃ. Titikkhā saṅkhātā adhivāsanakhanti uttamaṃ tapoti attho. Nibbānaṃ
atk-s0102a:279_2: paramanti sabbākārena pana nibbānaṃ paramanti vadanti buddhā. Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti
atk-s0102a:279_3: yo adhivāsanakhantivirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādheti hiṃsati, so pabbajito nāma
atk-s0102a:279_4: na hoti. Catutthapādo pana tasseva vevacanaṃ. “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi na samaṇo
atk-s0102a:279_5: hotīti vevacanaṃ. Parūpaghātīti etassa paraṃ viheṭhayantoti vevacanaṃ. Atha vā parūpaghātīti
atk-s0102a:279_6: sīlūpaghātī. Sīlañhi uttamaṭṭhena paranti vuccati. Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ
atk-s0102a:279_7: viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti, attano sīlaṃ vināsako, so pabbajito nāma na hotīti
atk-s0102a:279_8: attho. Athavā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvato parūpaghātī hoti, paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi
atk-s0102a:279_9: sañcicca jīvitā voropeti, so na hi pabbajito. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Malassa apabbājitattā.
atk-s0102a:279_10: “Pabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā pabbajitoti vuccatī”ti idañhi pabbajitalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:279_11: Yopi na heva kho upaghāteti, na māreti, api ca daṇḍādīhi viheṭheti, so paraṃ viheṭhayanto
atk-s0102a:279_12: samaṇo na hoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Vihesāya asamitattā. “Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ, samaṇoti
atk-s0102a:280_0: Dutiyagāthāya sabbapāpassāti sabbākusalassa. Akaraṇanti anuppādanaṃ. Kusalassāti
atk-s0102a:280_1: catubhūmikakusalassa. Upasampadāti paṭilābho. Sacittapariyodapananti attano cittajotanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:280_2: taṃ pana arahattena hoti. Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya samathavipassanāhi
atk-s0102a:280_3: kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena cittaṃ pariyodāpetabbanti etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhī ti.
atk-s0102a:281_0: Tatiyagāthāya anūpavādoti vācāya kassaci anupavadanaṃ. Anūpaghātoti kāyena upaghātassa
atk-s0102a:281_1: akaraṇaṃ. Pātimokkheti yaṃ taṃ paatimokkhaṃ, atipamokkhaṃ, uttamasīlaṃ, pāti vā agativisesehi
atk-s0102a:281_2: mokkheti duggatibhayehi, yo vā naṃ pāti, taṃ mokkhetīti “pātimokkha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:281_3: Tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro. Mattaññutāti paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena pamāṇaññutā.
atk-s0102a:281_4: Pantañca sayanāsananti sayanāsanañca saṅghaṭṭanavirahitanti attho. Tattha dvīhiyeva
atk-s0102a:281_5: paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpito hotīti veditabbo. Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ
atk-s0102a:281_6: parassa anupavadanaṃ anupaghātanaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu mattaññutā
atk-s0102a:281_7: aṭṭhasamāpattivasibhāvāya vivittasenāsanasevanañca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti.
atk-s0102a:281_8: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:283_0: 91. Ettāvatā ca iminā vipassissa bhagavato apadānānusārena vitthārakathanena – “tathāgatassevesā,
atk-s0102a:283_1: bhikkhave, dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā”ti evaṃ vuttāya dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:283_2: pakāsetvā idāni – “devatāpi tathāgatassa etamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti vuttaṃ devatārocanaṃ
atk-s0102a:284_0: Tattha subhagavaneti evaṃnāmake vane. Sālarājamūleti vanappatijeṭṭhakassa mūle. Kāmacchandaṃ
atk-s0102a:284_1: virājetvāti anāgāmimaggena mūlasamugghātavasena virājetvā. Yathā ca vipassissa, evaṃ
atk-s0102a:284_2: sesabuddhānampi sāsane vutthabrahmacariyā devatā ārocayiṃsu, pāḷi pana vipassissa
atk-s0102a:285_0: Tattha attano sampattiyā na hāyanti, na vihāyantīti avihā. Na kañci sattaṃ tapantīti
atk-s0102a:285_1: atappā. Sundaradassanā abhirūpā pāsādikāti sudassā. Suṭṭhu passanti, sundarametesaṃ
atk-s0102a:285_2: vā dassananti sudassī. Sabbeheva ca saguṇehi bhavasampattiyā ca jeṭṭhā, natthettha
atk-s0102a:286_0: Idha ṭhatvā bhāṇavārā samodhānetabbā. Imasmiñhi sutte vipassissa bhagavato apadānavasena
atk-s0102a:286_1: tayo bhāṇavārā vuttā. Yathā ca vipassissa, evaṃ sikhīādīnampi apadānavasena vuttāva.
atk-s0102a:286_2: Pāḷi pana saṅkhittā. Iti sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vasena amhākaṃ bhagavatā ekavīsati bhāṇavārā
atk-s0102a:286_3: kathitā. Tathā avihehi. Tathā atappehi. Tathā sudassehi. Tathā sudassīhi. Tathā akaniṭṭhehīti
atk-s0102a:286_4: sabbampi chabbīsatibhāṇavārasataṃ hoti. Tepiṭake buddhavacane aññaṃ suttaṃ chabbīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:286_5: nāma natthi, suttantarājā nāma ayaṃ suttantoti veditabbo. Ito paraṃ anusandhidvayampi
atk-s0102a:286_6: niyyātento iti kho bhikkhavetiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0102a:293_0: 95. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kurūsūti mahānidānasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā. Kurūsu
atk-s0102a:293_1: viharatīti kurū nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena
atk-s0102a:293_2: “kurū”ti vuccati. Tasmiṃ kurūsu janapade. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāhu – mandhātukāle
atk-s0102a:293_4: uttamamanussānaṃ uppattibhūmi uttamadīpo atiramaṇīyo”ti sutvā raññā mandhātucakkavattinā
atk-s0102a:293_5: cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā cattāro dīpe anusaṃyāyantena saddhiṃ āgamaṃsu. Tato rājā
atk-s0102a:293_6: pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pucchi – “atthi nu kho manussalokato ramaṇīyataraṃ ṭhāna”nti. Kasmā
atk-s0102a:293_7: deva evaṃ bhaṇasi? Kiṃ na passasi candimasūriyānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ, nanu etesaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:293_8: ito ramaṇīyataranti? Rājā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā tattha agamāsi. Cattāro mahārājāno
atk-s0102a:293_9: – “mandhātumahārājā āgato”ti sutvāva “mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo rājā, na sakkā yuddhena
atk-s0102a:293_10: paṭibāhitu”nti sakaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ. So taṃ gahetvā puna pucchi – “atthi nu kho
atk-s0102a:294_0: Athassa tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ kathayiṃsu. “Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ, deva, ito ramaṇīyataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:294_1: Tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno paricārakā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0102a:294_2: sakko devarājā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo, tassimāni upabhogaṭṭhānāni – yojanasahassubbedho
atk-s0102a:294_3: vejayanto pāsādo, pañcayojanasatubbedhā sudhammā devasabhā, diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko
atk-s0102a:294_4: vejayantaratho tathā erāvaṇo hatthī, dibbarukkhasahassappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nandanavanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:294_5: cittalatāvanaṃ, phārusakavanaṃ, missakavanaṃ, yojanasatubbedho pāricchattako koviḷāro,
atk-s0102a:294_6: tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthatā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayakusumapupphavaṇṇā
atk-s0102a:294_7: paṇḍukambalasilā, yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anupavisatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:295_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri. Taṃ ākāse patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ
atk-s0102a:295_1: caturaṅginiyā senāya. Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0102a:295_2: patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanapamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya. Rājā ekakova tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0102a:295_3: agamāsi. Sakko – “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvāva tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā – “svāgataṃ,
atk-s0102a:295_4: te mahārāja, sakaṃ te mahārāja, anusāsa mahārājā”ti vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ
atk-s0102a:295_5: dve bhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi. Rañño tāvatiṃsabhavane patiṭṭhitamattasseva manussabhāvo
atk-s0102a:295_6: vigacchi, devabhāvo pāturahosi. Tassa kira sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinnassa
atk-s0102a:295_7: akkhinimisamattena nānattaṃ paññāyati. Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca
atk-s0102a:295_8: nānatte muyhanti. So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno yāva chattiṃsa sakkā uppajjitvā
atk-s0102a:295_9: cutā, tāva rajjaṃ kāretvā atittova kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patiṭṭhito vātātapena
atk-s0102a:296_0: Cakkaratane pana puna pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhite pariṇāyakaratanaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe mandhātu
atk-s0102a:296_1: upāhanaṃ likhāpetvā idaṃ mandhātu rajjanti rajjamanusāsi. Tepi tīhi dīpehi āgatamanussā
atk-s0102a:296_2: puna gantuṃ asakkontā pariṇāyakaratanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “deva, mayaṃ rañño ānubhāvena
atk-s0102a:296_3: āgatā, idāni gantuṃ na sakkoma, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ no dehī”ti yāciṃsu. So tesaṃ ekamekaṃ
atk-s0102a:296_4: janapadamadāsi. Tattha pubbavidehato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso tāyeva purimasaññāya
atk-s0102a:296_6: nāmaṃ labhi, uttarakuruto āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso “kururaṭṭha”nti nāmaṃ labhi,
atk-s0102a:296_7: bahuke pana gāmanigamādayo upādāya bahuvacanena vohariyati. Tena vuttaṃ – “kurūsu viharatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:297_0: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti kammāsadhammanti ettha keci dha-kārassa da-kārena
atk-s0102a:297_1: atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Kammāso ettha damitoti kammāsadammo. Kammāsoti kammāsapādo porisādo
atk-s0102a:297_2: vuccati. Tassa kira pāde khāṇukena viddhaṭṭhāne vaṇo ruhanto cittadārusadiso hutvā
atk-s0102a:297_3: ruhi. Tasmā kammāsapādoti paññāyittha. So ca tasmiṃ okāse damito porisādabhāvato
atk-s0102a:297_4: paṭisedhito. Kena? Mahāsattena. Katarasmiṃ jātaketi? Mahāsutasomajātaketi eke. Ime
atk-s0102a:297_5: pana therā jayaddisajātaketi vadanti. Tadā hi mahāsattena kammāsapādo damito. Yathāha –
atk-s0102a:302_0: Keci pana dha-kāreneva atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Kurūraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ kira kuruvattadhammo,
atk-s0102a:302_1: tasmiṃ kammāso jāto, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ kammāso ettha dhammo jātoti kammāsadhammanti
atk-s0102a:302_2: vuccati. Tattha niviṭṭhanigamassāpi etadeva nāmaṃ. Bhummavacanena kasmā na vuttanti.
atk-s0102a:302_3: Avasanokāsato. Bhagavato kira tasmiṃ nigame vasanokāso koci vihāro nāma nāhosi. Nigamato
atk-s0102a:302_4: pana apakkamma aññatarasmiṃ udakasampanne ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge mahāvanasaṇḍo ahosi
atk-s0102a:302_5: tattha bhagavā vihāsi, taṃ nigamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo
atk-s0102a:302_6: – “kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā”ti.
atk-s0102a:303_0: Āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ, gāravavacanametaṃ. Ānandoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Ekamantanti
atk-s0102a:303_1: bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso – “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā yathā
atk-s0102a:303_2: nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti, tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Bhummatthe
atk-s0102a:303_3: vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ nisīdīti upāvisi. Paṇḍitā hi garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya
atk-s0102a:303_4: ekamantaṃ nisīdanti. Ayañca tesaṃ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:304_0: Kathaṃ nisinno kho pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0102a:304_1: – atidūraṃ, accāsannaṃ, uparivātaṃ, unnatappadesaṃ, atisammukhaṃ, atipacchāti. Atidūre
atk-s0102a:304_2: nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno
atk-s0102a:304_3: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno
atk-s0102a:304_4: agāravaṃ pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca
atk-s0102a:304_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ parivattetvā daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:304_6: hoti. Tasmā ayampi tikkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ vanditvā ete
atk-s0102a:304_7: cha nisajjadose vajjetvā dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:304_8: anto pavisitvā pasannalākhārasaṃ vigāhanto viya suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya rattuppalamālāvitānamajjhaṃ
atk-s0102a:304_9: pavisanto viya ca dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0102a:305_0: Kāya pana velāya, kena kāraṇena ayamāyasmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantoti? Sāyanhavelāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:305_1: paccayākārapañhapucchanakāraṇena. Taṃ divasaṃ kirāyamāyasmā kulasaṅgahatthāya gharadvāre
atk-s0102a:305_2: gharadvāre sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya kammāsadhammagāmaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0102a:305_3: satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe satthāraṃ vanditvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:305_4: gantvā antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ paṭisammajjitvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0102a:305_5: paññapetvā udakatumbato udakaṃ gahetvā udakena hatthapāde sītale katvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0102a:305_6: ābhujitvā nisinno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajji. Atha paricchinnakālavasena
atk-s0102a:305_7: samāpattito uṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāresi. So – “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādito
atk-s0102a:305_8: paṭṭhāya antaṃ, antato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ, ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjhaṃ, majjhato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0102a:305_9: ubho ante pāpento tikkhattuṃ dvādasapadaṃ paccayākāraṃ sammasi. Tassevaṃ sammasantassa
atk-s0102a:305_10: paccayākāro vibhūto hutvā uttānakuttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:306_0: Tato cintesi – “ayaṃ paccayākāro sabbabuddhehi – ‘gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cā’ti
atk-s0102a:306_1: kathito, mayhaṃ kho pana padesañāṇe ṭhitassa sāvakassa sato uttāno vibhūto pākaṭo
atk-s0102a:306_2: hutvā upaṭṭhāti, mayhaṃyeva nu kho esa uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāti, udāhu aññesampī”ti?
atk-s0102a:306_3: Athassa etadahosi – “handāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ pucchāmi, addhā me
atk-s0102a:306_4: bhagavā imaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā sālindaṃ sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya ekaṃ suttantakathaṃ
atk-s0102a:306_5: kathetvā dassessati. Buddhānañhi vinayapaññattiṃ, bhummantaraṃ, paccayākāraṃ, samayantaranti
atk-s0102a:306_6: imāni cattāri ṭhānāni patvā gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, ñāṇaṃ anupavisati, buddhañāṇassa
atk-s0102a:306_7: mahantabhāvo paññāyati, desanā gambhīrā hoti tilakkhaṇabbhāhatā suññatapaṭisaṃyuttā”ti.
atk-s0102a:307_0: So kiñcāpi pakatiyāva ekadivase satavārampi sahassavārampi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto
atk-s0102a:307_1: na ahetuakāraṇena upasaṅkamati, taṃ divasaṃ pana imaṃ pañhaṃ gahetvā – “imaṃ buddhagandhahatthiṃ
atk-s0102a:307_2: āpajja ñāṇakoñcanādaṃ sossāmi, buddhasīhaṃ āpajja ñāṇasīhanādaṃ sossāmi, buddhasindhavaṃ
atk-s0102a:307_3: āpajja ñāṇapadavikkamaṃ passissāmī”ti cintetvā divāṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya cammakkhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā
atk-s0102a:307_4: ādāya sāyanhasamaye bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. Tena vuttaṃ – “sāyanhavelāyaṃ paccayākārapañhapucchanakāraṇena upasaṅkamanto”ti.
atk-s0102a:308_0: Yāva gambhīroti ettha yāvasaddo pamāṇātikkame, atikkamma pamāṇaṃ gambhīro, atigambhīroti
atk-s0102a:308_1: attho. Gambhīrāvabhāsoti gambhīrova hutvā avabhāsati, dissatīti attho. Ekañhi uttānameva
atk-s0102a:308_2: gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti pūtipaṇṇādivasena kāḷavaṇṇapurāṇaudakaṃ viya. Tañhi jāṇuppamāṇampi
atk-s0102a:308_3: sataporisaṃ viya dissati. Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti maṇigaṅgāya vippasannaudakaṃ
atk-s0102a:308_4: viya. Tañhi sataporisampi jāṇuppamāṇaṃ viya khāyati. Ekaṃ uttānaṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:308_5: hoti cāṭiādīsu udakaṃ viya. Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti sinerupādakamahāsamudde
atk-s0102a:308_6: udakaṃ viya. Evaṃ udakameva cattāri nāmāni labhati. Paṭiccasamuppāde panetaṃ natthi.
atk-s0102a:308_7: Ayañhi gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cāti ekameva nāmaṃ labhati. Evarūpo samānopi
atk-s0102a:308_8: atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyati, yadidaṃ acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ
atk-s0102a:308_9: bhanteti. Evaṃ attano vimhayaṃ pakāsento pañhaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:309_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā – “ānando bhavaggaggahaṇāya hatthaṃ pasārento viya, sineruṃ
atk-s0102a:309_1: chinditvā miñjaṃ nīharituṃ vāyamamāno viya, vinā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya,
atk-s0102a:309_2: pathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamamāno viya buddhavisayapañhaṃ attano
atk-s0102a:309_3: uttānaṃ vadati. Handassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti cintetvā mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:310: Tattha mā hevanti ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho. Mā hevanti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādentopi bhaṇati apasādentopi.
atk-s0102a:312_0: Tattha ussādento – ānanda, tvaṃ mahāpañño visadañāṇo, tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo
atk-s0102a:312_1: uttānako viya khāyati. Aññesaṃ panesa uttānakoti na sallakkhetabbo, gambhīroyeva
atk-s0102a:312_2: ca gambhīrāvabhāso ca. Tattha catasso upamā vadanti. Chamāse subhojanarasapuṭṭhassa
atk-s0102a:312_3: kira katayogassa mahāmallassa samajjasamaye katamallapāsāṇaparicayassa yuddhabhūmiṃ
atk-s0102a:312_4: gacchantassa antarā mallapāsāṇaṃ dassesuṃ, so – kiṃ etanti āha. Mallapāsāṇoti. Āharatha
atk-s0102a:312_5: nanti. Ukkhipituṃ na sakkomāti vutte sayaṃ gantvā kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhānanti vatvā
atk-s0102a:312_6: dvīhi hatthehi dve pāsāṇe ukkhipitvā kīḷāguḷe viya khipitvā agamāsi. Tattha mallassa
atk-s0102a:312_7: mallapāsāṇo lahukopi na aññesaṃ lahukoti vattabbo. Chamāse subhojanarasapuṭṭho mallo
atk-s0102a:312_8: viya hi kappasatasahassaṃ abhinīhārasampanno āyasmā ānando, yathā mallassa mahābalatāya
atk-s0102a:312_9: mallapāsāṇo lahuko, evaṃ therassa mahāpaññatāya paṭiccasamuppādo uttāno, so aññesaṃ
atk-s0102a:313_0: Mahāsamudde ca timināma maccho dviyojanasatiko timiṅgalo tiyojanasatiko, timipiṅgalo
atk-s0102a:313_1: catuyojanasatiko timirapiṅgalo pañcayojanasatiko, ānando timinando ajjhāroho mahātimīti
atk-s0102a:313_2: ime cattāro yojanasahassikā. Tattha timirapiṅgaleneva dīpenti. Tassa kira dakkhiṇakaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:313_3: cālentassa pañcayojanasate padese udakaṃ calati. Tathā vāmakaṇṇaṃ. Tathā naṅguṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:313_4: tathā sīsaṃ. Dve pana kaṇṇe cāletvā naṅguṭṭhena udakaṃ paharitvā sīsaṃ aparāparaṃ
atk-s0102a:313_5: katvā kīḷituṃ āraddhassa sattaṭṭhayojanasate padese bhājane pakkhipitvā uddhane āropitaṃ
atk-s0102a:313_6: viya udakaṃ pakkuthati, tiyojanasatamatte padese udakaṃ piṭṭhiṃ chādetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0102a:313_7: So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ mahāsamuddo gambhīro gambhīroti vadanti kutassa gambhīratā,
atk-s0102a:313_8: mayaṃ piṭṭhipaṭicchādanamattampi udakaṃ na labhāmā”ti. Tattha kāyupapannassa timirapiṅgalassa
atk-s0102a:313_9: mahāsamuddo uttānoti, aññesaṃ khuddakamacchānaṃ uttānoti na vattabbo, evameva ñāṇupapannassa
atk-s0102a:313_10: therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti, aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0102a:314_0: Supaṇṇarājā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko, tassa dakkhiṇapakkho paññāsayojaniko hoti tathā
atk-s0102a:314_1: vāmapakkho, piñchavaṭṭi saṭṭhiyojanikā, gīvā tiṃsayojanikā, mukhaṃ navayojanaṃ, pādā
atk-s0102a:314_2: dvādasayojanikā. Tasmiṃ supaṇṇavātaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhe sattaṭṭhayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:314_3: nappahoti. So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ ākāso ananto anantoti vadanti, kutassa anantatā,
atk-s0102a:314_4: mayaṃ pakkhavātappasāraṇokāsampi na labhāmā”ti. Tattha kāyupapannassa supaṇṇarañño
atk-s0102a:314_5: ākāso parittoti, aññesaṃ khuddakapakkhīnaṃ parittoti na vattabbo, evameva ñāṇupapannassa
atk-s0102a:314_6: therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti, aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0102a:315_0: Rāhu asurindo pana pādantato yāva kesantā yojanānaṃ cattāri sahassāni aṭṭha ca satāni
atk-s0102a:315_1: hoti. Tassa dvinnaṃ bāhānaṃ antaraṃ dvādasayojanasatikaṃ. Bahalattena chayojanasatikaṃ.
atk-s0102a:315_2: Hatthapādatalāni tiyojanasatikāni, tathā mukhaṃ. Ekekaṃ aṅgulipabbaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:315_3: tathā bhamukantaraṃ. Nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ. Sīsaṃ navayojanasatikaṃ. Tassa mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0102a:315_4: otiṇṇassa gambhīraṃ udakaṃ jāṇuppamāṇaṃ hoti. So evaṃ vadeyya – “ayaṃ mahāsamuddo
atk-s0102a:315_5: gambhīro gambhīroti vadanti, kutassa gambhīratā, mayaṃ jāṇuppaṭicchādanamattampi
atk-s0102a:315_6: udakaṃ na labhāmā”ti. Tattha kāyupapannassa rāhuno mahāsamuddo uttānoti, aññesaṃ
atk-s0102a:315_7: uttānoti na vattabbo, evameva ñāṇupapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti,
atk-s0102a:315_8: aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo. Etamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavā – “mā hevaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:315_9: avaca; mā hevaṃ, ānanda avacā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:316: Therassa hi catūhi kāraṇehi gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti upaṭṭhāti. Katamehi catūhi? Pubbūpanissayasampattiyā, titthavāsena, sotāpannatāya, bahussutabhāvenāti.
atk-s0102a:318_0: Ito kira satasahassime kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji. Tassa haṃsavatī
atk-s0102a:318_1: nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, ānando nāma rājā pitā, sumedhā nāma devī mātā, bodhisatto uttarakumāro
atk-s0102a:318_2: nāma ahosi. So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0102a:318_3: anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā – “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke
atk-s0102a:318_4: vītināmetvā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapessāmīti pādaṃ abhinīhari. Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0102a:318_5: padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi. Tassa dhurapattāni navutihatthāni, kesaraṃ tiṃsahatthaṃ, kaṇṇikā
atk-s0102a:319_0: Satthā pana ubbedhato aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedho ahosi. Tassa ubhinnaṃ bāhānamantaraṃ
atk-s0102a:319_1: aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ, nalāṭaṃ pañcahatthaṃ, hatthapādā ekādasahatthā. Tassa ekādasahatthena
atk-s0102a:319_2: pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇo reṇu uṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:319_3: padesaṃ uggantvā okiṇṇamanosilācuṇṇaṃ viya paccokiṇṇo. Tadupādāya bhagavā padumuttarotveva
atk-s0102a:319_4: paññāyittha. Tassa devilo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ. Amitā ca asamā ca dve
atk-s0102a:319_5: aggasāvikā. Sumano nāma upaṭṭhāko. Padumuttaro bhagavā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro
atk-s0102a:320_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa sumanakumāro nāma. Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsatiyojanasate
atk-s0102a:320_1: ṭhāne bhogagāmaṃ adāsi. So kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_2: paccanto kupito. Sumano rañño pesesi – “paccanto kupito”ti. Rājā “mayā tvaṃ tattha
atk-s0102a:320_3: kasmā ṭhapito”ti paṭipesesi. So nikkhamma core vūpasametvā – “upasanto, deva, janapado”ti
atk-s0102a:320_4: rañño pesesi. Rājā tuṭṭho – “sīghaṃ mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha. Tassa sahassamattā
atk-s0102a:320_5: amaccā honti. So tehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge mantesi – “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho, sace me
atk-s0102a:320_6: varaṃ deti, kiṃ gaṇhāmī”ti. Atha naṃ ekacce “hatthiṃ gaṇhatha, assaṃ gaṇhatha, rathaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_7: gaṇhatha, janapadaṃ gaṇhatha, sattaratanāni gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu. Apare – “tumhe pathavissarassa
atk-s0102a:320_8: puttā, tumhākaṃ dhanaṃ na dullabhaṃ, laddhampi cetaṃ sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, puññameva
atk-s0102a:320_9: ekaṃ ādāya gamanīyaṃ; tasmā te deve varaṃ dadamāne temāsaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_10: upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. So – “tumhe mayhaṃ kalyāṇamittā, na mametaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_11: atthi, tumhehi pana uppāditaṃ, evaṃ karissāmī”ti gantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā pitarāpi
atk-s0102a:320_12: āliṅgetvā tassa matthake cumbitvā – “varaṃ te putta, demī”ti vutte “sādhu mahārāja,
atk-s0102a:320_13: icchāmahaṃ mahārāja bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_14: kātuṃ, imameva varaṃ dehī”ti āha. “Na sakkā tāta, aññaṃ varehī”ti vutte “deva, khattiyānaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_15: nāma dve kathā natthi, etameva dehi, na me aññenattho”ti. Tāta buddhānaṃ nāma cittaṃ
atk-s0102a:320_16: dujjānaṃ, sace bhagavā na icchissati, mayā dinnepi kiṃ bhavissatīti? So – “sādhu,
atk-s0102a:320_17: deva, ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0102a:321_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti. So maṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0102a:321_1: sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Te taṃ āhaṃsu – “rājaputta, kasmā āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0102a:321_2: Bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, dassetha me bhagavantanti. Na mayaṃ, rājaputta, icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0102a:321_3: satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmāti. Ko pana, bhante, labhatīti? Sumanatthero nāma rājaputtāti.
atk-s0102a:321_4: “So kuhiṃ, bhante, thero”ti. Therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā vanditvā –
atk-s0102a:321_5: “icchāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ passituṃ, dassetha me”ti āha. Thero – “ehi rājaputtā”ti
atk-s0102a:321_6: taṃ gahetvā taṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhapetvā gandhakuṭiṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0102a:321_7: – “sumana, kasmā āgatosī”ti āha. Rājaputto, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgatoti.
atk-s0102a:321_8: Tena hi bhikkhu āsanaṃ paññāpehīti. Thero āsanaṃ paññāpesi, nisīdi bhagavā paññatte
atk-s0102a:321_9: āsane. Rājaputto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. Kadā āgatosi rājaputtāti?
atk-s0102a:321_10: Bhante, tumhesu gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhesu. Bhikkhū pana – “na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0102a:321_11: bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ. Thero pana ekavacaneneva
atk-s0102a:321_12: dassesi. Thero, bhante, tumhākaṃ sāsane vallabho maññeti. Āma rājakumāra, vallabho
atk-s0102a:321_13: esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante, buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabho hotīti?
atk-s0102a:321_14: Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā kumārāti. Bhagavā, ahaṃ thero
atk-s0102a:321_15: viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo, temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethāti. Bhagavā
atk-s0102a:321_16: – “atthi nu kho tattha gatena attho”ti oloketvā atthīti disvā “suññāgāre, kho rājakumāra
atk-s0102a:321_17: tathāgatā abhiramantī”ti āha. Kumāro “aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugatā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ,
atk-s0102a:321_18: bhante, purimataraṃ gantvā vihāraṃ kāremi, mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ
atk-s0102a:321_19: āgacchathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitusantikaṃ gantvā “dinnā me, deva, bhagavatā paṭiññā,
atk-s0102a:321_20: mayā pahite bhagavantaṃ peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane
atk-s0102a:321_21: vihāraṃ kāretvā vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gantvā attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto
atk-s0102a:321_22: sobhanaṃ nāma kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0102a:321_23: vihāraṃ kāresi. Tattha bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya
atk-s0102a:321_24: kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kārāpetvā pākāraparikkhepe katvā dvārakoṭṭhakañca niṭṭhapetvā pitusantikaṃ
atk-s0102a:322_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā – “bhagavā, sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, tumhākaṃ gamanaṃ
atk-s0102a:322_1: paccāsīsatī”ti āha. Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno
atk-s0102a:322_2: agamāsi. Kumāro “satthā āgato”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā mālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0102a:325_0: Vihāraṃ niyyātesi. So vassūpanāyikadivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce
atk-s0102a:325_1: ca pakkosāpetvā āha – “ayaṃ satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūrato āgato, buddhā ca nāma
atk-s0102a:325_2: dhammagaruno na āmisagarukā. Tasmā ahaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni
atk-s0102a:325_3: samādiyitvā idheva vasissāmi, tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:326_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ
atk-s0102a:326_1: karoti, taṃ sabbaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantavallabho esa thero, etasseva me ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0102a:326_2: patthetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0102a:326_3: datvā sattame divase bhikkhusatasahassassa pādamūle ticīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ
