atk-s0102a:483_3: tīṇi sucaritāni samādāya vattissāma, salākabhattādīni dassāma, vassavāsikaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0102a:483_4: ajja saṅghassa cattāro paccaye dassāma, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā khādanīyādīni saṃvidahatha,
atk-s0102a:483_5: āsanāni paññāpetha, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetha, saṅghaṃ paccuggantvā ānetha, paññattāsane
atk-s0102a:483_6: nisīdāpetha, chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothātiādikathanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:484_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ, cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane
atk-s0102a:484_1: nisīditvā imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjāti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ
atk-s0102a:484_2: nāma. Gihīnaṃ ‘ayyā sukhī hontu, averā abyāpajjā’ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:485_0: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca. Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ
atk-s0102a:485_1: sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanavandanabījanadānādibhedaṃ
atk-s0102a:485_2: sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:485_3: tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:486_0: Devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Vihāre
atk-s0102a:486_1: asantaṃ pana paṭipucchantassa kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero, kuhiṃ amhākaṃ tissatthero,
atk-s0102a:486_2: kadā nu kho āgamissatīti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:487_0: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā pasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā
atk-s0102a:487_1: mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. Devatthero tissatthero arogo hotu, appābādhoti samannāharaṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:488_0: Lābhāti cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā. Dhammikāti kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā
atk-s0102a:488_1: dhammena samena bhikkhācāravattena uppannā. Antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampīti pacchimakoṭiyā
atk-s0102a:488_2: patte pariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvitikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi. Appaṭivibhattabhogīti
atk-s0102a:488_3: ettha dve paṭivibhattā nāma – āmisappaṭivibhattañca, puggalappaṭivibhattañca. Tattha
atk-s0102a:488_4: – “ettakaṃ dassāmi, ettakaṃ na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ āmisappaṭivibhattaṃ
atk-s0102a:488_5: nāma. “Asukassa dassāmi, asukassa na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalappaṭivibhattaṃ
atk-s0102a:488_6: nāma. Tadubhayampi akatvā yo appaṭivibhattaṃ bhuñjati, ayaṃ appaṭivibhattabhogī nāma.
atk-s0102a:489_0: Sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogīti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0102a:489_1: yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ labbhati, taṃ taṃ neva lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāmukhena gihīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:489_2: deti, na attanā bhuñjati, paṭiggaṇhanto ca – “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotū”ti gahetvā
atk-s0102a:489_3: ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati.
atk-s0102a:490_0: Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammaṃ ko pūreti, ko na pūretīti? Dussīlo tāva na pūreti. Na hi
atk-s0102a:490_1: tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā gaṇhanti. Parisuddhasīlo pana vattaṃ akhaṇḍento pūreti.
atk-s0102a:490_2: Tatridaṃ vattaṃ – yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti,
atk-s0102a:490_3: so dātabbaṃ deti, sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti, palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hoti. Sāraṇīyadhammo
atk-s0102a:490_4: hi muttapalibodhasseva vaṭṭati. Tena pana odissakaṃ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākaāgantukagamikānañceva
atk-s0102a:490_5: navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ. Etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ
atk-s0102a:490_6: therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa tattakaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:490_7: Avasiṭṭhe asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ datvā
atk-s0102a:490_8: sesaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. “Sīlavantehī”ti vacanato dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0102a:491_0: Ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti, no asikkhitāya parisāya.
atk-s0102a:491_1: Susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati, so na gaṇhāti. Aññato alabhantopi pamāṇayuttameva
atk-s0102a:491_2: gaṇhāti, nātirekaṃ. Ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:491_3: laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūrati, na tato oraṃ. Sace hi dvādasame vasse
atk-s0102a:491_4: sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nahāyituṃ gacchati
atk-s0102a:491_5: saṅghatthero ca kasseso pattoti, “sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassā”ti vutte “āharatha na”nti
atk-s0102a:491_6: sabbaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvā bhuñjitvā ca rittaṃ pattaṃ ṭhapeti, atha so bhikkhu rittaṃ
atk-s0102a:491_7: pattaṃ disvā “mayhaṃ anavasesetvāva paribhuñjiṃsū”ti domanassaṃ uppādeti, sāraṇīyadhammo
atk-s0102a:491_8: bhijjati, puna dvādasavassāni pūretabbo hoti. Titthiyaparivāsasadiso hesa, sakiṃ
atk-s0102a:491_9: khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. Yo pana – “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa
atk-s0102a:491_10: me pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī”ti somanassaṃ janeti, tassa puṇṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0102a:492_0: Evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassa pana neva issā, na macchariyaṃ hoti. So manussānaṃ piyo
atk-s0102a:492_1: hoti, sulabhapaccayo ca, pattagatamassa diyyamānampi na khīyati, bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:492_2: aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati, bhaye vā chātake vā sampatte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0102a:493_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – senagirivāsī tissatthero kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0102a:493_1: Paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0102a:493_2: kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu. Thero pana pavisanto te disvā pucchi – “laddhaṃ, bhante”ti?
atk-s0102a:493_3: Vicarimha āvusoti. So tesaṃ aladdhabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “bhante yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi,
atk-s0102a:493_4: tāva idheva hothā”ti. Mayaṃ, āvuso, paññāsa janā pattatemanamattampi na labhimhāti.
atk-s0102a:493_5: Bhante, nevāsikā nāma paṭibalā honti, alabhantāpi bhikkhācāramaggasabhāgaṃ jānantīti.
atk-s0102a:493_6: Therā āgamesuṃ. Thero gāmaṃ pāvisi. Dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā
atk-s0102a:493_7: theraṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā. Atha therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi,
atk-s0102a:493_8: so taṃ ādāya therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā gaṇhatha, bhanteti, saṅghattheraṃ āha. Thero
atk-s0102a:493_9: – “amhehi ettakehi kiñci na laddhaṃ, ayaṃ sīghameva gahetvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho”ti
atk-s0102a:493_10: sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi. Thero olokanākāreneva ñatvā “bhante, dhammena samena laddhapiṇḍapāto,
atk-s0102a:493_11: nikkukkuccā gaṇhathā”tiādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0102a:494_0: Atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu – “kadā, āvuso, lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhī”ti?
atk-s0102a:494_1: Natthi me, bhante, lokuttaradhammoti. Jhānalābhīsi, āvusoti? Etampi me, bhante, natthīti.
atk-s0102a:494_2: Nanu, āvuso, pāṭihāriyanti? Sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito, tassa me dhammassa
atk-s0102a:494_3: pūritakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti, pattagataṃ na khīyatīti. Te
atk-s0102a:494_4: sutvā – “sādhu sādhu sappurisa, anucchavikamidaṃ tuyha”nti āhaṃsu. Idaṃ tāva – “pattagataṃ
atk-s0102a:495_0: Ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:495_1: ṭhāne kiṃ varabhaṇḍanti pucchi. Dve sāṭakā, bhanteti. Ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantīti.
atk-s0102a:495_2: Taṃ sutvā amacco rañño ārocesi – “eko daharo evaṃ vadatī”ti. Daharassa evaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:495_3: mahātherānaṃ pana sukhumasāṭakā vaṭṭantīti vatvā mahātherānaṃ dassāmīti ṭhapeti.
atk-s0102a:495_4: Tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:495_5: nārohanti. Aññe ārohanti. Daharassa dānakāle pana hatthaṃ āruḷhā. So tassa hatthe
atk-s0102a:495_6: pātetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0102a:495_7: daharassa santike nisīditvā – “bhante, imaṃ dhammaṃ kadā paṭivijjhitthā”ti āha. So
atk-s0102a:495_8: pariyāyenāpi asantaṃ avadanto – “natthi mayhaṃ mahārāja lokuttaradhammo”ti āha. Nanu,
atk-s0102a:495_9: bhante, pubbe avacutthāti. Āma, mahārāja, sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahaṃ, tassa me dhammassa
atk-s0102a:495_10: pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti. “Sādhu sādhu,
atk-s0102a:495_11: bhante, anucchavikamidaṃ tuyha”nti vanditvā pakkāmi. Idaṃ – “bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:496_0: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu. Therī
atk-s0102a:496_1: paccūsasamaye – “ativiya appanigghoso gāmo, upadhāretha tāvā”ti daharabhikkhuniyo
atk-s0102a:496_2: āha. Tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. Sā sutvā “mā tumhe
atk-s0102a:496_3: tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayittha, attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ
atk-s0102a:496_4: karothā”ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodhamūle
atk-s0102a:496_5: aṭṭhāsi. Rukkhe adhivatthādevatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā “ayye,
atk-s0102a:496_6: mā aññattha gacchatha, niccaṃ idheva ethā”ti āha. Theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā nāgatthero
atk-s0102a:496_7: nāma atthi, so – “mahantaṃ bhayaṃ, na sakkā idha yāpetuṃ, paratīraṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:496_8: attadvādasamova attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā gamissāmīti bhātaragāmaṃ
atk-s0102a:496_9: āgato. Therī – “therā āgatā”ti sutvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā kiṃ ayyāti pucchi. So
atk-s0102a:496_10: taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Sā – “ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreyeva vasitvā sve gamissathā”ti
atk-s0102a:497_0: Therī punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0102a:497_1: paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Thero – “vaṭṭissati therī”ti vatvā tuṇhī aṭṭhāsi. Dhammiko
atk-s0102a:497_2: tāta piṇḍapāto, kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti. “Vaṭṭissati therī”ti. Sā pattaṃ
atk-s0102a:497_3: gahetvā ākāse khipi. Patto ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Thero – “sattatālamatte ṭhitampi bhikkhunibhattameva
atk-s0102a:497_4: therī”ti vatvā – “bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti, bhaye vūpasante ariyavaṃsaṃ kathayamāno,
atk-s0102a:497_5: ‘bho piṇḍapātika, bhikkhunibhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā’ti cittena anuvadiyamāno
atk-s0102a:497_6: santhambhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, appamattā hotha theriyo”ti maggaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0102a:498_0: Rukkhadevatāpi – “sace thero theriyā hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjissati, na naṃ
atk-s0102a:498_1: nivattessāmi. Sace na paribhuñjissati, nivattessāmī”ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa
atk-s0102a:498_2: gamanaṃ disvā rukkhā oruyha pattaṃ, bhante, dethāti pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva
atk-s0102a:498_3: ānetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa
atk-s0102a:498_4: bhikkhuniyo dvādasa bhikkhū ca sattavassāni upaṭṭhahi. Idaṃ – “devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantī”ti
atk-s0102a:498_5: ettha vatthu. Tatra hi therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi.
atk-s0102a:499_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ
atk-s0102a:499_1: hoti, tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma. Yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ,
atk-s0102a:499_2: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi
atk-s0102a:499_3: bhinnāni, tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:499_4: aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana antarantarā visabhāgabinducitrā
atk-s0102a:499_5: gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana sabbenasabbaṃ abhinnāni, tassa tāni sīlāni
atk-s0102a:499_6: akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma honti. Tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato
atk-s0102a:499_7: mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato bhujissāni. Buddhādīhi viññūhi pasatthattā viññupasatthāni,
atk-s0102a:499_8: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā – “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpannapubbo”ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0102a:499_9: asakkuṇeyyattā ca aparāmaṭṭhāni, upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti
atk-s0102a:500_0: Sīlasāmaññagatā viharissantīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0102a:500_1: samānabhāvūpagatasīlā viharissanti. Sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi
atk-s0102a:500_2: vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ sīlena samānameva hoti, natthi maggasīle nānattaṃ.
atk-s0102a:501_0: Yāyaṃ diṭṭhīti maggasampayuttā sammādiṭṭhi. Ariyāti niddosā. Niyyātīti niyyānikā.
atk-s0102a:501_1: Takkarassāti yo tathākārī hoti. Sabbadukkhakkhayāyāti sabbadukkhakkhayatthaṃ. Diṭṭhisāmaññagatāti
atk-s0102a:501_2: samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ upagatā hutvā viharissanti. Vuddhiyevāti evaṃ viharantānaṃ vuddhiyeva
atk-s0102a:502_0: 142. Etadeva bahulanti āsannaparinibbānattā bhikkhu ovadanto punappunaṃ etaṃyeva
atk-s0102a:502_1: dhammiṃ kathaṃ karoti. Iti sīlanti evaṃ sīlaṃ, ettakaṃ sīlaṃ. Ettha catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
atk-s0102a:502_2: sīlaṃ cittekaggatā samādhi, vipassanāpaññā paññāti veditabbā. Sīlaparibhāvitoti ādīsu
atk-s0102a:502_3: yasmiṃ sīle ṭhatvāva maggasamādhiṃ phalasamādhiṃ nibbattenti. Eso tena sīlena paribhāvito
atk-s0102a:502_4: mahapphalo hoti, mahānisaṃso. Yamhi samādhimhi ṭhatvā maggapaññaṃ phalapaññaṃ nibbattenti,
atk-s0102a:502_5: sā tena samādhinā paribhāvitā mahapphalā hoti, mahānisaṃsā. Yāya paññāya ṭhatvā maggacittaṃ
atk-s0102a:502_6: phalacittaṃ nibbattenti, taṃ tāya paribhāvitaṃ sammadeva āsavehi vimuccati.
atk-s0102a:503_0: Yathābhirantanti buddhānaṃ anabhiratiparitassitaṃ nāma natthi, yathāruci yathāajjhāsayanti
atk-s0102a:503_1: pana vuttaṃ hoti. Āyāmāti ehi yāma. “Ayāmā”tipi pāṭho, gacchāmāti attho. Ānandāti
atk-s0102a:503_2: bhagavā santikāvacarattā theraṃ ālapati. Thero pana – “gaṇhathāvuso pattacīvarāni,
atk-s0102a:504: 144. Ambalaṭṭhikāgamanaṃ uttānameva. Atha kho āyasmā sāriputtotiādi sampasādanīye vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0102a:506_0: 148. Pāṭaligamane āvasathāgāranti āgantukānaṃ āvasathagehaṃ. Pāṭaligāme kira niccakālaṃ
atk-s0102a:506_1: dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ sahāyakā āgantvā kulāni gehato nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti.
atk-s0102a:506_2: Te manussā niccupaddutā – “etesaṃ āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti nagaramajjhe
atk-s0102a:506_3: mahatiṃ sālaṃ karitvā tassā ekasmiṃ padese bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ, ekasmiṃ padese
atk-s0102a:506_4: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ akaṃsu. Te – “bhagavā āgato”ti sutvāva – “amhehi gantvāpi bhagavā ānetabbo
atk-s0102a:506_5: siyā, so sayameva amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto, ajja bhagavantaṃ āvasathe maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0102a:506_6: vadāpessāmā”ti etadatthameva upasaṅkamantā. Tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Yena āvasathāgāranti
atk-s0102a:506_7: te kira – “buddhā nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vasituṃ iccheyyuṃ vā no
atk-s0102a:506_8: vā”ti bhagavato manaṃ ajānantā āvasathāgāraṃ appaṭijaggitvāva āgamaṃsu. Idāni bhagavato
atk-s0102a:506_9: manaṃ ñatvā puretaraṃ gantvā paṭijaggissāmāti yenāvasathāgāraṃ, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:506_10: Sabbasantharinti yathā sabbaṃ santhataṃ hoti, evaṃ santhariṃ.
atk-s0102a:507: 149. Dussīloti asīlo nissīlo. Sīlavipannoti vipannasīlo bhinnasaṃvaro. Pamādādhikaraṇanti pamādakāraṇā.
atk-s0102a:508_0: Idañca suttaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vasena āgataṃ pabbajitānampi pana labbhateva. Gahaṭṭho
atk-s0102a:508_1: hi yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvitaṃ kappeti – yadi kasiyā, yadi vaṇijjāya, pāṇātipātādivasena
atk-s0102a:508_2: pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, athassa mūlampi vinassati. Māghātakāle
atk-s0102a:508_3: pāṇātipātaṃ pana adinnādānādīni ca karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0102a:508_4: Pabbajito dussīlo ca pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato
atk-s0102a:509_0: Gahaṭṭhassa – “asuko nāma asukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko
atk-s0102a:509_1: salākabhattamattampi na detī”ti catuparisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0102a:509_2: Pabbajitassa vā – “asuko nāma nāsakkhi sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ, na buddhavacanaṃ uggahetuṃ,
atk-s0102a:509_3: vejjakammādīhi jīvati, chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0102a:510_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva – “avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne keci mama kammaṃ jānissanti,
atk-s0102a:510_1: atha maṃ niggaṇhissantī”ti vā, “rājakulassa vā dassantī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0102a:510_2: maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho aṅgulikena bhūmiṃ kasanto nisīdati, visārado hutvā
atk-s0102a:510_3: kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Pabbajitopi – “bahū bhikkhū sannipatitā, avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ
atk-s0102a:510_4: jānissati, atha me uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissantī”ti
atk-s0102a:510_5: sabhayo upasaṅkamati, visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Ekacco pana dussīlopi dappito
atk-s0102a:510_6: viya vicarati, sopi ajjhāsayena maṅku hotiyeva.
atk-s0102a:511_0: Sammūḷho kālaṅkarotīti tassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlakamme samādāya pavattitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:511_1: āpāthamāgacchati, so ummīletvā idhalokaṃ passati, nimīletvā paralokaṃ passati, tassa
atk-s0102a:511_2: cattāro apāyā upaṭṭhahanti, sattisatena sīse pahariyamāno viya hoti. So – “vāretha,
atk-s0102a:511_3: vārethā”ti viravanto marati. Tena vuttaṃ – “sammūḷho kālaṃ karotī”ti. Pañcamapadaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0102a:513_0: 151. Bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāya pāḷimuttakāya dhammikathāya ceva āvasathānumodanāya
atk-s0102a:513_1: ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya yojanappamāṇaṃ mahāmadhuṃ pīḷetvā madhupānaṃ pāyento
atk-s0102a:513_2: viya bahudeva rattiṃ sandassetvā sampahaṃsetvā uyyojesi. Abhikkantāti atikkantā khīṇā
atk-s0102a:513_3: khayavayaṃ upetā. Suññāgāranti pāṭiyekkaṃ suññāgāraṃ nāma natthi, tattheva pana ekapasse
atk-s0102a:513_4: sāṇipākārena parikkhipitvā – “idha satthā vissamissatī”ti mañcakaṃ paññapesuṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0102a:513_5: – “catūhipi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ etesaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti tattha sīhaseyyaṃ
atk-s0102a:515_0: 152. Sunidhavassakārāti sunidho ca vassakāro ca dve brāhmaṇā. Magadhamahāmattāti
atk-s0102a:515_1: magadharañño mahāmattā mahāamaccā, magadharaṭṭhe vā mahāmattā mahatiyā issariyamattāya
atk-s0102a:515_2: samannāgatāti magadhamahāmattā. Pāṭaligāme nagaranti pāṭaligāmaṃ nagaraṃ katvā māpenti.
atk-s0102a:515_3: Vajjīnaṃ paṭibāhāyāti vajjirājakulānaṃ āyamukhapacchindanatthaṃ. Sahassevāti ekekavaggavasena
atk-s0102a:515_4: sahassaṃ sahassaṃ hutvā. Vatthūnīti gharavatthūni. Cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetunti
atk-s0102a:515_5: raññañca rājamahāmattānañca nivesanāni māpetuṃ vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ cittāni namanti.
atk-s0102a:515_6: Te kira attano sippānubhāvena heṭṭhā pathaviyaṃ tiṃsahatthamatte ṭhāne – “idha nāgaggāho,
atk-s0102a:515_7: idha yakkhaggāho, idha bhūtaggāho, pāsāṇo vā khāṇuko vā atthī”ti passanti. Te tadā
atk-s0102a:515_8: sippaṃ jappitvā devatāhi saddhiṃ mantayamānā viya māpenti. Athavā nesaṃ sarīre devatā
atk-s0102a:515_9: adhimuccitvā tattha tattha nivesanāni māpetuṃ cittaṃ nāmenti. Tā catūsu koṇesu khāṇuke
atk-s0102a:515_10: koṭṭetvā vatthumhi gahitamatte paṭivigacchanti. Saddhānaṃ kulānaṃ saddhā devatā tathā
atk-s0102a:515_11: karonti, assaddhānaṃ kulānaṃ assaddhā devatāva. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Saddhānañhi evaṃ hoti
atk-s0102a:515_12: – “idha manussā nivesanaṃ māpetvā paṭhamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhāpessanti.
atk-s0102a:515_13: Atha mayaṃ sīlavantānaṃ dassanaṃ, dhammakathaṃ, pañhāvissajjanaṃ, anumodanañca sotuṃ
atk-s0102a:515_14: labhissāma, manussā dānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ pattiṃ dassantī”ti.
atk-s0102a:516_0: Tāvatiṃsehīti yathā hi ekasmiṃ kule ekaṃ paṇḍitamanussaṃ, ekasmiṃ vā vihāre ekaṃ
atk-s0102a:516_1: bahussutabhikkhuṃ upādāya – “asukakule manussā paṇḍitā, asukavihāre bhikkhū bahussutā”ti
atk-s0102a:516_2: saddo abbhuggacchati, evameva sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ vissakammañca devaputtaṃ upādāya
atk-s0102a:516_3: – “tāvatiṃsā paṇḍitā”ti saddo abbhuggato. Tenāha – “tāvatiṃsehī”ti. Tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0102a:517_0: Yāvatā ariyaṃ āyatananti yattakaṃ ariyakamanussānaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthi. Yāvatā
atk-s0102a:517_1: vaṇippathoti yattakaṃ vāṇijānaṃ ābhatabhaṇḍassa rāsivaseneva kayavikkayaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0102a:517_2: vāṇijānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā atthi. Idaṃ agganagaranti tesaṃ ariyāyatanavaṇippathānaṃ
atk-s0102a:517_3: idaṃ agganagaraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pāmokkhaṃ bhavissatīti. Puṭabhedananti bhaṇḍapuṭabhedanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:517_4: bhaṇḍabhaṇḍikānaṃ mocanaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sakalajambudīpe aladdhabhaṇḍampi hi
atk-s0102a:517_5: idheva labhissanti, aññattha vikkayena agacchantampi ca idheva gamissati. Tasmā idheva
atk-s0102a:517_6: puṭaṃ bhindissantīti attho. Catūsu hi dvāresu cattāri sabhāyaṃ ekanti evaṃ divase
atk-s0102a:518_0: Aggito vātiādīsu cakārattho vā-saddo. Agginā ca udakena ca mithubhedena ca nassissatīti
atk-s0102a:518_1: attho. Ekakoṭṭhāso agginā nassissati, nibbāpetuṃ na sakkhissanti. Ekaṃ gaṅgā gahetvā
atk-s0102a:518_2: gamissati. Eko – “iminā akathitaṃ amussa, amunā akathitaṃ imassā”ti vadantānaṃ pisuṇavācānaṃ
atk-s0102a:518_3: vasena bhinnānaṃ manussānaṃ aññamaññabhedeneva nassissatīti attho. Iti vatvā bhagavā
atk-s0102a:518_4: paccūsakāle gaṅgāya tīraṃ gantvā katamukhadhovano bhikkhācāravelaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:519_0: 153. Sunidhavassakārāpi – “amhākaṃ rājā samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhāko, so amhe pucchissati,
atk-s0102a:519_1: ‘satthā kira pāṭaligāmaṃ agamāsi, tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamittha, na upasaṅkamitthā’ti.
atk-s0102a:519_2: Upasaṅkamimhāti ca vutte – ‘nimantayittha, na nimantayitthā’ti ca pucchissati. Na
atk-s0102a:519_3: nimantayimhāti ca vutte amhākaṃ dosaṃ āropetvā niggaṇhissati. Idaṃ cāpi mayaṃ āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:519_4: nagaraṃ māpema, samaṇassa kho pana gotamassa gatagataṭṭhāne kāḷakaṇṇisattā paṭikkamanti,
atk-s0102a:519_5: taṃ mayaṃ nagaramaṅgalaṃ vadāpessāmā”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:520_0: Pubbaṇhasamayanti pubbaṇhakāle. Nivāsetvāti gāmappavesananīhārena nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0102a:520_1: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā. Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattañca cīvarañca ādiyitvā kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0102a:521: Sīlavantetthāti sīlavante ettha. Saññateti kāyavācāmanehi saññate.
atk-s0102a:522_0: Tāsaṃ dakkhiṇamādiyeti saṅghassa dinne cattāro paccaye tāsaṃ gharadevatānaṃ ādiseyya,
atk-s0102a:522_1: pattiṃ dadeyya. Pūjitā pūjayantīti – “ime manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na honti, evampi
atk-s0102a:522_2: no pattiṃ dentī”ti ārakkhaṃ susaṃvihitaṃ karothāti suṭṭhu ārakkhaṃ karonti. Mānitā
atk-s0102a:522_3: mānayantīti kālānukālaṃ balikammakaraṇena mānitā “ete manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na
atk-s0102a:522_4: honti, catumāsachamāsantare no balikammaṃ karontī”ti mānenti, mānentiyo uppannaṃ parissayaṃ haranti.
atk-s0102a:523_0: Tato nanti tato naṃ paṇḍitajātikaṃ manussaṃ. Orasanti ure ṭhapetvā saṃvaḍḍhitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:523_1: yathā mātā orasaṃ puttaṃ anukampati, uppannaparissayaharaṇatthameva tassa vāyamati,
atk-s0102a:523_2: evaṃ anukampantīti attho. Bhadrāni passatīti sundarāni passati.
atk-s0102a:524: 154. Uḷumpanti pāragamanatthāya āṇiyo koṭṭetvā kataṃ. Kullanti valliādīhi bandhitvā kataṃ.
atk-s0102a:525_0: “Ye taranti aṇṇava”nti gāthāya aṇṇavanti sabbantimena paricchedena yojanamattaṃ gambhīrassa
atk-s0102a:525_1: ca puthulassa ca udakaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Saranti idha nadī adhippetā. Idaṃ
atk-s0102a:525_2: vuttaṃ hoti, ye gambhīravitthataṃ taṇhāsaraṃ taranti, te ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ setuṃ
atk-s0102a:525_3: katvāna. Visajja pallalāni anāmasitvā udakabharitāni ninnaṭṭhānāni. Ayaṃ pana idaṃ
atk-s0102a:525_4: appamattakaṃ taritukāmopi kullañhi jano pabandhati. Buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vināyeva
atk-s0102a:528_0: 155. Koṭigāmoti mahāpanādassa pāsādakoṭiyaṃ katagāmo. Ariyasaccānanti ariyabhāvakarānaṃ
atk-s0102a:528_1: saccānaṃ. Ananubodhāti abujjhanena ajānanena. Appaṭivedhāti appaṭivijjhanena. Sandhāvitanti
atk-s0102a:528_2: bhavato bhavaṃ gamanavasena sandhāvitaṃ. Saṃsaritanti punappunaṃ gamanāgamanavasena
atk-s0102a:528_3: saṃsaritaṃ. Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ca tumhehi ca. Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti
atk-s0102a:528_4: sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti emamettha attho veditabbo. Bhavanetti
atk-s0102a:528_5: samūhatāti bhavato bhavaṃ nayanasamatthā taṇhārajju suṭṭhu hatā chinnā appavattikatā.
atk-s0102a:530: 156. Nātikāti ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitumahāpituputtānaṃ dve gāmā. Nātiketi ekasmiṃ ñātigāmake. Giñjakāvasatheti iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe.
atk-s0102a:531_1: Oranti laddhanāmehi vā tīhi maggehi pahātabbānītipi orambhāgiyāni. Tattha kāmacchando,
atk-s0102a:531_2: byāpādoti imāni dve samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhitāni, maggena vā asamucchinnāni nibbattavasena
atk-s0102a:531_3: uddhaṃ bhāgaṃ rūpabhavañca arūpabhavañca gantuṃ na denti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi
atk-s0102a:531_4: tattha nibbattampi ānetvā puna idheva nibbattāpentīti sabbānipi orambhāgiyāneva.
atk-s0102a:532_0: Rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttāti ettha kadāci karahaci uppattiyā ca, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya
atk-s0102a:532_1: cāti dvedhāpi tanubhāvo veditabbo. Sakadāgāmissa hi puthujjanānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ rāgādayo
atk-s0102a:532_2: nuppajjanti, kadāci karahaci uppajjanti. Uppajjamānā ca puthujjanānaṃ viya bahalabahalā
atk-s0102a:532_3: nuppajjanti, makkhikāpattaṃ viya tanukatanukā uppajjanti. Dīghabhāṇakatipiṭakamahāsīvatthero
atk-s0102a:532_4: panāha – “yasmā sakadāgāmissa puttadhītaro honti, orodhā ca honti, tasmā bahalā kilesā.
atk-s0102a:532_5: Idaṃ pana bhavatanukavasena kathita”nti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “sotāpannassa sattabhave
atk-s0102a:532_6: ṭhapetvā aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi. Sakadāgāmissa dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu
atk-s0102a:532_7: bhavesu bhavatanukaṃ natthi. Anāgāmissa rūpārūpabhave ṭhapetvā kāmabhave bhavatanukaṃ
atk-s0102a:532_8: natthi. Khīṇāsavassa kismiñci bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthī”ti vuttattā paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:533_0: Imaṃ lokanti imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ayañcettha adhippāyo, sace hi
atk-s0102a:533_1: manussesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patto devesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti, iccetaṃ
atk-s0102a:533_2: kusalaṃ. Asakkonto pana avassaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā sacchikaroti. Devesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0102a:533_3: pattopi sace manussesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Asakkonto
atk-s0102a:534_0: Avinipātadhammoti ettha vinipatanaṃ vinipāto, nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo.
atk-s0102a:534_1: Catūsu apāyesu avinipātadhammo catūsu apāyesu avinipātasabhāvoti attho. Niyatoti
atk-s0102a:534_2: dhammaniyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ
atk-s0102a:534_3: ayanaṃ assa gati paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0102a:536_0: 158. Vihesāti tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagatiṃ ñāṇūpapattiṃ ñāṇābhisamparāyaṃ olokentassa kāyakilamathova
atk-s0102a:536_1: esa, ānanda, tathāgatassāti dīpeti, cittavihesā pana buddhānaṃ natthi. Dhammādāsanti
atk-s0102a:536_2: dhammamayaṃ ādāsaṃ. Yenāti yena dhammādāsena samannāgato. Khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti
atk-s0102a:536_3: idaṃ nirayādīnaṃyeva vevacanavasena vuttaṃ. Nirayādayo hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato
atk-s0102a:536_4: apetattā apāyā. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati. Ye dukkaṭakārino, te ettha
atk-s0102a:537: Aveccappasādenāti buddhaguṇānaṃ yathābhūtato ñātattā acalena accutena pasādena. Upari padadvayepi eseva nayo. Itipi so bhagavātiādīnaṃ pana vitthāro visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0102a:538_0: Ariyakantehīti ariyānaṃ kantehi piyehi manāpehi. Pañca sīlāni hi ariyasāvakānaṃ kantāni
atk-s0102a:538_1: honti, bhavantarepi avijahitabbato. Tāni sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbopi panettha saṃvaro labbhatiyeva.
atk-s0102a:539_0: Sotāpannohamasmīti idaṃ desanāsīsameva. Sakadāgāmiādayopi pana sakadāgāmīhamasmītiādinā
atk-s0102a:539_1: nayena byākaronti yevāti. Sabbesampi hi sikkhāpadāvirodhena yuttaṭṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ anuññātameva hoti.
atk-s0102a:541_0: 161. Vesāliyaṃ viharatīti ettha tena kho pana samayena vesālī iddhā ceva hoti phītācātiādinā
atk-s0102a:541_1: khandhake vuttanayena vesāliyā sampannabhāvo veditabbo. Ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā
atk-s0102a:541_2: gaṇikāya uyyānabhūte ambavane. Sato bhikkhaveti bhagavā ambapālidassane satipaccupaṭṭhānatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:541_3: visesato idha satipaṭṭhānadesanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha saratīti sato. Sampajānātīti sampajāno.
atk-s0102a:541_4: Satiyā ca sampajaññena ca samannāgato hutvā vihareyyāti attho. Kāye kāyānupassītiādīsu
atk-s0102a:542_0: Nīlāti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhakaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇātiādi tasseva vibhāgadassanaṃ. Tattha na tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:542_1: pakativaṇṇo nīlo, nīlavilepanavilittattā panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Nīlavatthāti paṭadukūlakoseyyādīnipi
atk-s0102a:542_2: tesaṃ nīlāneva honti. Nīlālaṅkārāti nīlamaṇīhi nīlapupphehi alaṅkatā, rathāpi tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:542_3: nīlamaṇikhacitā nīlavatthaparikkhittā nīladdhajā nīlavammikehi nīlābharaṇehi nīlaassehi
atk-s0102a:542_4: yuttā, patodalaṭṭhiyopi nīlā yevāti. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Parivaṭṭesīti
atk-s0102a:542_5: pahari. Kiṃ je ambapālīti jeti ālapanavacanaṃ, bhoti ambapāli, kiṃ kāraṇāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0102a:542_6: hoti. “Kiñcā”tipi pāṭho, ayamevettha attho. Sāhāranti sajanapadaṃ. Aṅguliṃ phoṭesunti
atk-s0102a:543_0: Yesanti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, yehi adiṭṭhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Olokethāti passatha.
atk-s0102a:543_1: Avalokethāti punappunaṃ passatha. Upasaṃharathāti upanetha. Imaṃ licchaviparisaṃ
atk-s0102a:543_2: tumhākaṃ cittena tāvatiṃsasadisaṃ upasaṃharatha upanetha allīyāpetha. Yatheva tāvatiṃsā
atk-s0102a:543_3: abhirūpā pāsādikā nīlādinānāvaṇṇā, evamime licchavirājānopīti tāvatiṃsehi samake
atk-s0102a:544_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā anekasatehi suttehi cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādīsu nimittaggāhaṃ paṭisedhetvā
atk-s0102a:544_1: idha mahantena ussāhena nimittaggāhe uyyojetīti? Hitakāmatāya. Tatra kira ekacce
atk-s0102a:544_2: bhikkhū osannavīriyā, tesaṃ sampattiyā palobhento – “appamādena samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ
atk-s0102a:544_3: evarūpā issariyasampatti sulabhā”ti samaṇadhamme ussāhajananatthaṃ āha. Aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthañcāpi
atk-s0102a:544_4: evamāha. Nacirasseva hi sabbepime ajātasattussa vasena vināsaṃ pāpuṇissanti. Atha
atk-s0102a:544_5: nesaṃ rajjasirisampattiṃ disvā ṭhitabhikkhū – “tathārūpāyapi nāma sirisampattiyā
atk-s0102a:544_6: vināso paññāyissatī”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ bhāvetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantīti
atk-s0102a:545_0: Adhivāsetūti ambapāliyā nimantitabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi kasmā nimantentīti? Asaddahanatāya
atk-s0102a:545_1: ceva vattasīsena ca. Sā hi dhuttā itthī animantetvāpi nimantemīti vadeyyāti tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:545_2: cittaṃ ahosi, dhammaṃ sutvā gamanakāle ca nimantetvā gamanaṃ nāma manussānaṃ vattameva.
atk-s0102a:547_0: 163. Veḷuvagāmakoti vesāliyā samīpe veḷuvagāmo. Yathāmittantiādīsu mittā mittāva.
atk-s0102a:547_1: Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā. Sambhattāti suṭṭhu
atk-s0102a:547_2: bhattā sinehavanto daḷhamittā. Yesaṃ yesaṃ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū atthi, te
atk-s0102a:547_3: te tattha tattha vassaṃ upethāti attho. Kasmā evamāha? Tesaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya. Tesañhi
atk-s0102a:547_4: veḷuvagāmake senāsanaṃ nappahoti, bhikkhāpi mandā. Samantā vesāliyā pana bahūni senāsanāni,
atk-s0102a:547_5: bhikkhāpi sulabhā, tasmā evamāha. Atha kasmā – “yathāsukhaṃ gacchathā”ti na vissajjesi?
atk-s0102a:547_6: Tesaṃ anukampāya. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “ahaṃ dasamāsamattaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyissāmi,
atk-s0102a:547_7: sace ime dūraṃ gacchissanti, mama parinibbānakāle daṭṭhuṃ na sakkhissanti. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0102a:547_8: – “satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṃ satimattampi na adāsi, sace jāneyyāma, evaṃ na dūre
atk-s0102a:547_9: vaseyyāmā”ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya. Vesāliyā samantā pana vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre
atk-s0102a:547_10: āgantvā dhammaṃ suṇissanti, sugatovādaṃ labhissantī”ti na vissajjesi.
atk-s0102a:548_0: 164. Kharoti pharuso. Ābādhoti visabhāgarogo. Bāḷhāti balavatiyo. Māraṇantikāti maraṇantaṃ
atk-s0102a:548_1: maraṇasantikaṃ pāpanasamatthā. Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā
atk-s0102a:548_2: ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi. Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṃ
atk-s0102a:548_3: parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamānova adhivāsesi. Anāmantetvāti ajānāpetvā.
atk-s0102a:548_4: Anapaloketvāti na apaloketvā ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vīriyenāti pubbabhāgavīriyena
atk-s0102a:548_5: ceva phalasamāpattivīriyena ca. Paṭipaṇāmetvāti vikkhambhetvā. Jīvitasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0102a:548_6: ettha jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro. Yena jīvitaṃ saṅkhariyati chijjamānaṃ ghaṭetvā ṭhapiyati,
atk-s0102a:548_7: so phalasamāpattidhammopi jīvitasaṅkhāro. So idha adhippeto. Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0102a:548_8: pavattetvā, jīvitaṭṭhapanasamatthaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0102a:549_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjatīti? Samāpajjati. Sā pana
atk-s0102a:549_1: khaṇikasamāpatti. Khaṇikasamāpatti ca antosamāpattiyaṃyeva vedanaṃ vikkhambheti,
atk-s0102a:549_2: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṃ
atk-s0102a:549_3: puna sarīraṃ vedanā ajjhottharati. Yā pana rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṃ
atk-s0102a:549_4: nijjaṭaṃ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti, sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti. Yathā
atk-s0102a:549_5: nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyūḷho sevālo
atk-s0102a:549_6: cirena udakaṃ ottharati; evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0102a:549_7: taṃ divasaṃ mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavavipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakaṃ
atk-s0102a:549_8: niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0102a:549_9: – “dasamāse mā uppajjitthā”ti samāpattiṃ samāpajji. Samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā
atk-s0102a:550_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito. Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo
atk-s0102a:550_1: sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya. Na pakkhāyantīti nappakāsanti, nānākārato
atk-s0102a:550_2: na upaṭṭhahanti. Dhammāpi maṃ na paṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānādidhammā mayhaṃ pākaṭā
atk-s0102a:550_3: na hontīti dīpeti. Tantidhammā pana therassa supaguṇā. Na udāharatīti pacchimaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-s0102a:551_0: 165. Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṃ akatvā. “Ettakaṃ
atk-s0102a:551_1: dhammaṃ parassa na desessāmī”ti hi cintento dhammaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma. “Ettakaṃ
atk-s0102a:551_2: parassa desessāmī”ti cintento dhammaṃ bāhiraṃ karoti nāma. “Imassa puggalassa desessāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:551_3: cintento pana puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma. “Imassa na desessāmī”ti cintento
atk-s0102a:551_4: puggalaṃ bāhiraṃ karoti nāma. Evaṃ akatvā desitoti attho. Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:551_5: ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti. Daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā
atk-s0102a:551_6: piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti, evaṃ tathāgatassa – “idaṃ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:551_7: kathessāmī”ti muṭṭhiṃ katvā “pariharissāmī”ti ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:552_0: Ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmīti vā mamuddesikoti ahaṃ
atk-s0102a:552_1: uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko. Maṃyeva uddisitvā mama paccāsīsamāno
atk-s0102a:552_2: bhikkhusaṅgho hotu, mama accayena vā mā ahesuṃ, yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotūti iti vā yassa
atk-s0102a:552_3: assāti attho. Na evaṃ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmacchariyānaṃ vihatattā evaṃ na
atk-s0102a:552_4: hoti. Sa kinti so kiṃ. Āsītikoti asītisaṃvacchariko. Idaṃ pacchimavayaanuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:552_6: Maññeti jiṇṇasakaṭaṃ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti. Arahattaphalaveṭhanena catuiriyāpathakappanaṃ
atk-s0102a:553_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pakāsento yasmiṃ, ānanda, samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbanimittānanti
atk-s0102a:553_1: rūpanimittādīnaṃ. Ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanānaṃ. Tasmātihānandāti yasmā
atk-s0102a:553_2: iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti, tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṃ viharathāti
atk-s0102a:553_3: dasseti. Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatadīpaṃ viya attānaṃ dīpaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0102a:553_4: Attasaraṇāti attagatikāva hotha, mā aññagatikā. Dhammadīpadhammasaraṇapadesupi eseva
atk-s0102a:553_5: nayo. Tamataggeti tamaagge. Majjhe takāro padasandhivasena vutto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0102a:553_6: – “ime aggatamāti tamataggā”ti. Evaṃ sabbaṃ tamayogaṃ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve
atk-s0102a:553_7: ete, ānanda, mama bhikkhū bhavissanti. Tesaṃ atiagge bhavissanti, ye keci sikkhākāmā,
atk-s0102a:553_8: sabbepi te catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:556_0: 166. Vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisīti kadā pāvisi? Ukkacelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ gatakāle.
atk-s0102a:556_1: Bhagavā kira vuṭṭhavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ gamissāmīti āgatamaggeneva
atk-s0102a:556_2: paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pāvisi. Dhammasenāpati bhagavato
atk-s0102a:556_3: vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ gato. So tattha antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu
atk-s0102a:556_4: divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā pāde pakkhāletvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0102a:556_5: phalasamāpattiṃ pāvisi. Athassa yathāparicchedena tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṃ parivitakko
atk-s0102a:556_6: udapādi – “buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti, agasāvakā nu kho”ti? Tato – “aggasāvakā
atk-s0102a:556_7: paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokesi. So – “sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhāro pavattatī”ti
atk-s0102a:556_8: ñatvā – “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintesi. Tato – “rāhulo tāvatiṃsesu parinibbuto,
atk-s0102a:556_9: aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero chaddantadahe, ahaṃ kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti puna cintento
atk-s0102a:556_10: mātaraṃ ārabbha satiṃ uppādesi – “mayhaṃ mātā sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ mātā hutvāpi
atk-s0102a:556_11: buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā, atthi nu kho tassā upanissayo, natthi nu kho”ti āvajjetvā
atk-s0102a:556_12: sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā – “kassa desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento
atk-s0102a:556_13: – “mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati, na aññassa. Sace kho panāhaṃ appossukko bhaveyyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:556_14: bhavissanti me vattāro – ‘sāriputtatthero avasesajanānampi avassayo hoti. Tathā hissa
atk-s0102a:556_15: samacittasuttadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā. Tayo magge paṭividdhadevatānaṃ
atk-s0102a:556_16: gaṇanā natthi. Aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti. Thereva cittaṃ pasādetvā
atk-s0102a:556_17: sagge nibbattāneva asītikulasahassāni. So dāni sakamātumicchādassanamattampi harituṃ
atk-s0102a:556_18: nāsakkhī’ti. Tasmā mātaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:556_19: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā – “ajjeva bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā nikkhamissāmī”ti cundattheraṃ
atk-s0102a:556_20: āmantesi. “Āvuso, cunda, amhākaṃ pañcasatāya bhikkhuparisāya saññaṃ dehi – ‘gaṇhathāvuso
atk-s0102a:556_21: pattacīvarāni, dhammasenāpati nāḷakagāmaṃ gantukāmo’ti”. Thero tathā akāsi. Bhikkhū
atk-s0102a:556_22: senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṃ āgamaṃsu. Thero senāsanaṃ
atk-s0102a:556_23: saṃsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṃ olokento –
atk-s0102a:556_24: “idaṃ dāni pacchimadassanaṃ, puna āgamanaṃ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhuparivuto bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:561: Anujānātu me bhante, bhagavā, anujānātu sugato;
atk-s0102a:563_0: Buddhā pana yasmā “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti nāma, “mā parinibbāhī”ti
atk-s0102a:563_1: vutte vaṭṭassa guṇaṃ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṃ āropessanti, tasmā tadubhayampi
atk-s0102a:563_2: na vadanti. Tena naṃ bhagavā āha – “kattha parinibbāyissasi sāriputtā”ti? “Atthi,
atk-s0102a:563_3: bhante, magadhesu nāḷakagāme jātovarako, tatthāhaṃ parinibbāyissāmī”ti vutte “yassa
atk-s0102a:563_4: dāni tvaṃ, sāriputta, kālaṃ maññasi, idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṃ tādisassa
atk-s0102a:563_5: bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissatīti desehi tesaṃ dhamma”nti āha.
atk-s0102a:564_0: Thero – “satthā mayhaṃ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0102a:564_1: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā puna oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sattatālappamāṇe
atk-s0102a:564_2: antalikkhe ṭhito iddhivikubbanaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Sakalanagaraṃ sannipati.
atk-s0102a:564_3: Thero oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “gamanakālo me, bhante”ti āha. Bhagavā “dhammasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0102a:564_4: paṭipādessāmī”ti dhammāsanā uṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukho gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:564_5: Thero tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā – “bhagavā ito kappasatasahassādhikassa
atk-s0102a:564_6: asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassisammāsambuddhassa pādamūle nipatitvā tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:564_7: patthesiṃ. Sā me patthanā samiddhā, diṭṭhā tumhe, taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ, idaṃ pacchimadassanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:564_8: Puna tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ natthī”ti – vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0102a:564_9: yāva dassanavisayo, tāva abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā “ito paṭṭhāya cutipaṭisandhivasena
atk-s0102a:564_10: kismiñci ṭhāne gamanāgamanaṃ nāma natthī”ti vanditvā pakkāmi. Udakapariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0102a:564_11: mahābhūmicālo ahosi. Bhagavā parivāretvā ṭhite bhikkhū āha – “anugacchatha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:564_12: tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātika”nti. Bhikkhū yāva dvārakoṭṭhakā agamaṃsu. Thero – “tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0102a:564_13: tumhe āvuso, appamattā hothā”ti nivattāpetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṃ pakkāmi. Manussā
atk-s0102a:564_14: – “pubbe ayyo paccāgamanacārikaṃ carati, idaṃ dāni gamanaṃ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti
atk-s0102a:564_15: paridevantā anubandhiṃsu. Tepi “appamattā hotha āvuso, evaṃbhāvino nāma saṅkhārā”ti nivattāpesi.
atk-s0102a:565_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto antarāmagge sattāhaṃ manussānaṃ anuggahaṃ karonto sāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:565_1: nāḷakagāmaṃ patvā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. Atha uparevato nāma therassa
atk-s0102a:565_2: bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero
atk-s0102a:565_3: taṃ āha – “atthi gehe te ayyikā”ti? Āma, bhanteti. Gaccha amhākaṃ idhāgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:565_4: ārocehi. “Kasmā āgato”ti ca vutte “ajja kira ekadivasaṃ antogāme bhavissati, jātovarakaṃ
atk-s0102a:565_5: paṭijaggatha, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāthā”ti. So gantvā “ayyike,
atk-s0102a:565_6: mayhaṃ mātulo āgato”ti āha. Idāni kuhinti? Gāmadvāreti. Ekakova, aññopi koci atthīti?
atk-s0102a:565_7: Atthi pañcasatā bhikkhūti. Kiṃ kāraṇā āgatoti? So taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Brāhmaṇī
atk-s0102a:565_8: – “kiṃ nu kho ettakānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggāpeti, daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle
atk-s0102a:565_9: gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:566_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Abhiruhitvā ca jātovarakaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:566_1: Nisajjeva – “tumhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchathā”ti bhikkhū uyyojesi. Tesu gatamattesuyeva
atk-s0102a:566_2: therassa kharo ābādho uppajji, lohitapakkhandikā māraṇantikā vedanā vattanti, ekaṃ
atk-s0102a:566_3: bhājanaṃ pavisati, ekaṃ nikkhamati. Brāhmaṇī – “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṃ na ruccatī”ti
atk-s0102a:566_4: attano vasanagabbhadvāraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi. Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṃ
atk-s0102a:566_5: viharatī”ti olokentā “nāḷakagāme jātovarake parinibbānamañce nipanno, pacchimadassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:566_6: gamissāmā”ti āgamma vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero – ke tumheti? Mahārājāno, bhanteti.
atk-s0102a:566_7: Kasmā āgatatthāti? Gilānupaṭṭhākā bhavissāmāti. Hotu, atthi gilānupaṭṭhāko, gacchatha
atk-s0102a:566_8: tumheti uyyojesi. Tesaṃ gatāvasāne teneva nayena sakko devānamindo, tasmiṃ gate suyāmādayo
atk-s0102a:566_9: mahābrahmā ca āgamiṃsu. Tepi tatheva thero uyyojesi.
atk-s0102a:567_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṃ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā – “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0102a:567_1: gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṃ gantvā – “tāta, cunda, kā pavattī”ti pucchi. So
atk-s0102a:567_2: taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā – “mahāupāsikā, bhante āgatā”ti āha. Thero kasmā avelāya
atk-s0102a:567_3: āgatatthāti pucchi. Sā tuyhaṃ tāta dassanatthāyāti vatvā “tāta ke paṭhamaṃ āgatā”ti
atk-s0102a:567_4: pucchi. Cattāro mahārājāno, upāsiketi. Tāta, tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi mahantataroti?
atk-s0102a:567_5: Ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike, amhākaṃ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā
atk-s0102a:567_6: hutvā ārakkhaṃ akaṃsūti. Tesaṃ tāta, gatāvasāne ko āgatoti? Sakko devānamindoti.
atk-s0102a:567_7: Devarājatopi tvaṃ tāta, mahantataroti? Bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerasadiso esa upāsike, amhākaṃ
atk-s0102a:567_8: satthu tāvatiṃsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā otiṇṇoti. Tassa tāta gatāvasāne
atk-s0102a:567_9: jotamāno viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike tuyhaṃ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti.
atk-s0102a:567_10: Mayhaṃ bhagavato mahābrahmatopi tvaṃ tāta mahantataroti? Āma upāsike, ete nāma kira
atk-s0102a:567_11: amhākaṃ satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti.
atk-s0102a:568_0: Atha brāhmaṇiyā – “puttassa tāva me ayaṃ ānubhāvo, kīdiso vata mayhaṃ puttassa bhagavato
atk-s0102a:568_1: satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīre
atk-s0102a:568_2: phari. Thero – “uppannaṃ me mātu pītisomanassaṃ, ayaṃ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā”ti
atk-s0102a:568_3: cintetvā – “kiṃ cintesi mahāupāsike”ti āha. Sā – “puttassa tāva me ayaṃ guṇo, satthu
atk-s0102a:568_4: panassa kīdiso guṇo bhavissatīti idaṃ, tāta, cintemī”ti āha. Mahāupāsike, mayhaṃ
atk-s0102a:568_5: satthu jātakkhaṇe, mahābhinikkhamane, sambodhiyaṃ, dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0102a:568_6: kampittha, sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:568_7: itipi so bhagavāti vitthāretvā buddhaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:569_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṃ āha
atk-s0102a:569_1: – “tāta, upatissa, kasmā evamakāsi, evarūpaṃ nāma amataṃ mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na
atk-s0102a:569_2: adāsī”ti. Thero – “dinnaṃ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṃ, ettakena
atk-s0102a:569_3: vaṭṭissatī”ti cintetvā “gaccha mahāupāsike”ti brāhmaṇiṃ uyyojetvā “cunda kā velā”ti
atk-s0102a:569_4: āha. Balavapaccūsakālo, bhanteti. Tena hi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātehīti. Sannipatito,
atk-s0102a:569_5: bhante, saṅghoti. Maṃ ukkhipitvā nisīdāpehi cundāti ukkhipitvā nisīdāpesi. Thero
atk-s0102a:569_6: bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso catucattālīsaṃ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṃ vicarantānaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0102a:569_7: me kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha, khamatha taṃ āvusoti. Ettakaṃ, bhante, amhākaṃ
atk-s0102a:569_8: chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṃ aruccanakaṃ nāma natthi, tumhe pana amhākaṃ
atk-s0102a:569_9: khamathāti. Atha thero aruṇasikhāya paññāyamānāya mahāpathaviṃ unnādayanto anupādisesāya
atk-s0102a:569_10: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Bahū devamanussā therassa parinibbāne sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:570_0: Āyasmā cundo therassa pattacīvarañca dhātuparissāvanañca gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0102a:570_1: ānandattheraṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. Bhagavā dhātuparissāvanaṃ gahetvā pañcahi
atk-s0102a:570_2: gāthāsatehi therassa guṇaṃ kathetvā dhātucetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahagamanatthāya ānandattherassa
atk-s0102a:570_3: saññaṃ adāsi. Thero bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi. Bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ
atk-s0102a:570_4: agamāsi. Tattha gatakāle mahāmoggallānatthero parinibbāyi. Bhagavā tassa dhātuyo
atk-s0102a:570_5: gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahato nikkhamitvā anupubbena gaṅgābhimukho gantvā
atk-s0102a:570_6: ukkacelaṃ agamāsi. Tattha gaṅgātīre bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā tattha sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ
atk-s0102a:570_7: parinibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suttaṃ desetvā ukkacelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:570_8: Evaṃ gate atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0102a:571_0: Nisīdananti ettha cammakkhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. Udenacetiyanti udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:571_1: katavihāro vuccati. Gotamakādīsupi eseva nayo. Bhāvitāti vaḍḍhitā. Bahulīkatāti punappunaṃ
atk-s0102a:571_2: katā. Yānīkatāti yuttayānaṃ viya katā. Vatthukatāti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya
atk-s0102a:571_3: katā. Anuṭṭhitāti adhiṭṭhitā. Paricitāti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. Susamāraddhāti suṭṭhu samāraddhā.
atk-s0102a:572_0: Iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento tathāgatassa khotiādimāha. Ettha ca
atk-s0102a:572_1: kappanti āyukappaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:572_2: karonto tiṭṭheyya. Kappāvasesaṃ vāti – “appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vuttavassasatato atirekaṃ
atk-s0102a:572_3: vā. Mahāsīvatthero panāha – “buddhānaṃ aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ nāma natthi. Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake
atk-s0102a:572_4: uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambheti, evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-s0102a:572_5: samāpajjitvā dasa dasa māse vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyya, kasmā pana
atk-s0102a:572_6: na ṭhitoti? Upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyati, buddhā ca khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:572_7: apatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti. Buddhānubuddhesu
atk-s0102a:572_8: ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu ekakeneva khāṇukena viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti, daharasāmaṇeraparivāritena
atk-s0102a:572_9: vā. Tato – ‘aho buddhānaṃ parisā’ti hīḷetabbataṃ āpajjeyya. Tasmā na ṭhito”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0102a:572_10: vuttepi so na ruccati, “āyukappo”ti idameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niyamitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:573_0: 167. Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Yathā mārena
atk-s0102a:573_1: pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0102a:573_2: evameva nāsakkhi paṭivijjhitunti attho. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:573_3: dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. Therassa cattāro vipallāsā
atk-s0102a:573_4: appahīnā, tenassa māro cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ
atk-s0102a:573_5: karotīti? Bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti, tato sattā taṃ
atk-s0102a:573_6: disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti. Tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0102a:573_7: hadayaṃ maddati. Tato visaññāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Therassa panesa mukhena hatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:573_8: pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati? Bheravārammaṇaṃ pana dasseti. Taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:573_9: na paṭivijjhi. Bhagavā jānantoyeva – “kimatthaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ āmantesī”ti? Parato “tiṭṭhatu,
atk-s0102a:573_10: bhante, bhagavā”ti yācite “tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, tuyhevetaṃ aparaddha”nti dosāropanena
atk-s0102a:575_0: 168. Māro pāpimāti ettha māroti satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro. Pāpimāti tasseva
atk-s0102a:575_1: vevacanaṃ. So hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā “pāpimā”ti vuccati. Kaṇho, antako, namuci,
atk-s0102a:575_2: pamattabandhūtipi tasseva nāmāni. Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā
atk-s0102a:575_3: aṭṭhame sattāhe bodhimaṇḍeyeva āgantvā – “bhagavā yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0102a:575_4: so vo attho anuppatto, paṭividdhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, kiṃ te lokavicāraṇenā”ti vatvā,
atk-s0102a:575_5: yathā ajja, evameva “parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā”ti yāci. Bhagavā cassa – “na
atk-s0102a:575_6: tāvāha”ntiādīni vatvā paṭikkhipi. Taṃ sandhāya “bhāsitā kho panesā bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:576_0: Tattha viyattāti maggavasena viyattā. Tatheva vinītā tathā visāradā. Bahussutāti
atk-s0102a:576_1: tepiṭakavasena bahu sutametesanti bahussutā. Tameva dhammaṃ dhārentīti dhammadharā.
atk-s0102a:576_2: Athavā pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca. Pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0102a:576_3: dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānudhammapaṭipannāti ariyadhammassa
atk-s0102a:576_5: paṭipannā. Anudhammacārinoti anudhammacaraṇasīlā. Sakaṃ ācariyakanti attano ācariyavādaṃ.
atk-s0102a:576_6: Ācikkhissantītiādīni sabbāni aññamaññassa vevacanāni. Sahadhammenāti sahetukena sakāraṇena
atk-s0102a:576_7: vacanena. Sappāṭihāriyanti yāva na niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0102a:577_0: Brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. Iddhanti samiddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:577_1: jhānassādavasena. Phītanti vuddhippattaṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāya sampattivasena.
atk-s0102a:577_2: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena. Bāhujaññanti bahujanehi
atk-s0102a:577_3: ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ mahājanābhisamayavasena. Puthubhūtanti sabbākāravasena puthulabhāvappattaṃ.
atk-s0102a:577_4: Kathaṃ? Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā ca
atk-s0102a:578_0: Appossukkoti nirālayo. Tvañhi pāpima, aṭṭhamasattāhato paṭṭhāya – “parinibbātu dāni,
atk-s0102a:578_1: bhante, bhagavā parinibbātu, sugato”ti viravanto āhiṇḍittha. Ajja dāni paṭṭhāya vigatussāho
atk-s0102a:578_2: hohi; mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:580_0: 169. Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-s0102a:580_1: āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajji, pajahi. Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0102a:580_2: ossaji, temāsamattameva pana samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti
atk-s0102a:580_3: cittaṃ uppādesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ossajī”ti. “Ussajjī”ti pi pāṭho. Mahābhūmicāloti
atk-s0102a:580_4: mahanto pathavīkampo. Tadā kira dasasahassī lokadhātu kampittha. Bhiṃsanakoti bhayajanako.
atk-s0102a:580_5: Devadundubhiyo ca phaliṃsūti devabheriyo phaliṃsu, devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajji, akālavijjulatā
atk-s0102a:581_0: Udānaṃ udānesīti kasmā udānesi? Koci nāma vadeyya – “bhagavā pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā
atk-s0102a:581_1: – ‘parinibbāyatha, bhante, parinibbāyatha, bhante’ti upadduto bhayena āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0102a:581_2: vissajjesī”ti. “Tassokāso mā hotu, bhītassa udānaṃ nāma natthī”ti etassa dīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:582_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ.
atk-s0102a:582_1: Kiṃ taṃ? Kāmāvacarakammaṃ. Na tulaṃ, na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0102a:582_2: atthīti atulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Mahaggatakammaṃ. Athavā kāmāvacararūpāvacaraṃ tulaṃ, arūpāvacaraṃ
atk-s0102a:582_3: atulaṃ. Appavipākaṃ vā tulaṃ, bahuvipākaṃ atulaṃ. Sambhavanti sambhavassa hetubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0102a:582_4: piṇḍakārakaṃ rāsikārakanti attho. Bhavasaṅkhāranti punabbhavasaṅkhāraṇakaṃ. Avassajīti
atk-s0102a:582_5: vissajjesi. Munīti buddhamuni. Ajjhattaratoti niyakajjhattarato. Samāhitoti upacārappanāsamādhivasena
atk-s0102a:582_6: samāhito. Abhindi kavacamivāti kavacaṃ viya abhindi. Attasambhavanti attani sañjātaṃ
atk-s0102a:582_7: kilesaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ, bhavābhisaṅkhāraṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0102a:582_8: ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji. Saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ
atk-s0102a:582_9: viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindī”ti.
atk-s0102a:583_0: Atha vā tulanti tulento tīrento. Atulañca sambhavanti nibbānañceva sambhavañca. Bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0102a:583_1: bhavagāmikammaṃ. Avassaji munīti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho
atk-s0102a:583_2: nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0102a:583_3: disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhārakammaṃ – “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0102a:583_4: evaṃ vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ? Ajjhattarato samāhito
atk-s0102a:583_5: abhindi kavacamiva attani sambhavaṃ. So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato samathavasena
atk-s0102a:583_6: samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:583_7: pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ, attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbakilesajālaṃ
atk-s0102a:583_8: abhindi. Kilesābhāvena ca katakammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ
atk-s0102a:583_9: kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi, pahīnakilesassa ca bhayaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā abhītova
atk-s0102a:583_10: āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji, abhītabhāvañāpanatthañca udānaṃ udānesīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:585_0: 171. Yaṃ mahāvātāti yena samayena yasmiṃ vā samaye mahāvātā vāyanti, mahāvātā vāyantāpi
atk-s0102a:585_2: udakasandhārakaṃ vātaṃ upacchindanti, tato ākāse udakaṃ bhassati, tasmiṃ bhassante
atk-s0102a:585_3: pathavī bhassati. Puna vāto attano balena antodhamakaraṇe viya udakaṃ ābandhitvā
atk-s0102a:585_4: gaṇhāti, tato udakaṃ uggacchati, tasmiṃ uggacchante pathavī uggacchati. Evaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0102a:585_5: kampitaṃ pathaviṃ kampeti. Etañca kampanaṃ yāva ajjakālāpi hotiyeva, bahalabhāvena
atk-s0102a:586_0: Mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti ijjhanassa mahantatāya mahiddhiko, anubhavitabbassa mahantatāya
atk-s0102a:586_1: mahānubhāvo. Parittāti dubbalā. Appamāṇāti balavā. So imaṃ pathaviṃ kampetīti so
atk-s0102a:586_2: iddhiṃ nibbattetvā saṃvejento mahāmoggallāno viya, vīmaṃsanto vā mahānāgattherassa
atk-s0102a:586_3: bhāgineyyo saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero viya pathaviṃ kampeti. So kirāyasmā khuraggeyeva
atk-s0102a:586_4: arahattaṃ patvā cintesi – “atthi nu kho koci bhikkhu, yena pabbajitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ
atk-s0102a:586_5: patvā vejayanto pāsādo kampitapubbo”ti? Tato – “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā – “ahaṃ kampessāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:586_6: abhiññābalena vejayantamatthake ṭhatvā pādena paharitvā kampetuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0102a:586_7: sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo āhaṃsu – “putta saṅgharakkhita, tvaṃ pūtigandheneva sīsena
atk-s0102a:586_8: vejayantaṃ kampetuṃ icchasi, suppatiṭṭhito tāta pāsādo, kathaṃ kampetuṃ sakkhissasī”ti?
atk-s0102a:587_0: Sāmaṇero – “imā devatā mayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti, ahaṃ kho pana ācariyaṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0102a:587_1: kahaṃ nu kho me ācariyo sāmuddikamahānāgatthero”ti āvajjento mahāsamudde udakaleṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:587_2: māpetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnoti ñatvā tattha gantvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Tato naṃ
atk-s0102a:587_3: thero – “kiṃ, tāta saṅgharakkhita, asikkhitvāva yuddhaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti vatvā “nāsakkhi,
atk-s0102a:587_4: tāta, vejayantaṃ kampetu”nti pucchi. Ācariyaṃ, bhante, nālatthanti. Atha naṃ thero
atk-s0102a:587_5: – “tāta tumhādise akampente ko añño kampessati. Diṭṭhapubbaṃ te, tāta, udakapiṭṭhe
atk-s0102a:587_6: gomayakhaṇḍaṃ pilavantaṃ, tāta, kapallakapūvaṃ pacantā antantena paricchindanti,
atk-s0102a:587_7: iminā opammena jānāhī”ti āha. So – “vaṭṭissati, bhante, ettakenā”ti vatvā pāsādena
atk-s0102a:587_8: patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotūti adhiṭṭhāya vejayantābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:588_0: Devadhītaro taṃ disvā – “ekavāraṃ lajjitvā gato, punapi sāmaṇero eti, punapi etī”ti
atk-s0102a:588_1: vadiṃsu. Sakko devarājā – “mā mayhaṃ puttena saddhiṃ kathayittha, idāni tena ācariyo
atk-s0102a:588_2: laddho, khaṇena pāsādaṃ kampessatī”ti āha. Sāmaṇeropi pādaṅguṭṭhena pāsādathūpikaṃ
atk-s0102a:588_3: pahari. Pāsādo catūhi disāhi oṇamati. Devatā – “patiṭṭhātuṃ dehi, tāta, pāsādassa
atk-s0102a:588_4: patiṭṭhātuṃ dehi, tāta, pāsādassā”ti viraviṃsu. Sāmaṇero pāsādaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0102a:593: Ito paresu chasu pathavīkampesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāpadāne vuttameva.
atk-s0102a:594_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu pathavīkampesu paṭhamo dhātukopena, dutiyo iddhānubhāvena, tatiyacatutthā
atk-s0102a:594_1: puññatejena, pañcamo ñāṇatejena, chaṭṭho sādhukāradānavasena, sattamo kāruññabhāvena,
atk-s0102a:594_2: aṭṭhamo ārodanena. Mātukucchiṃ okkamante ca tato nikkhamante ca mahāsatte tassa puññatejena
atk-s0102a:594_3: pathavī akampittha. Abhisambodhiyaṃ ñāṇatejena abhihatā hutvā akampittha. Dhammacakkappavattane
atk-s0102a:594_4: sādhukārabhāvasaṇṭhitā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā akampittha. Āyusaṅkhārossajjane kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā
atk-s0102a:594_5: cittasaṅkhobhaṃ asahamānā akampittha. Parinibbāne ārodanavegatunnā hutvā akampittha.
atk-s0102a:594_6: Ayaṃ panattho pathavīdevatāya vasena veditabbo, mahābhūtapathaviyā panetaṃ natthi acetanattāti.
atk-s0102a:595_0: Ime kho, ānanda, aṭṭha hetūti ettha imeti niddiṭṭhanidassanaṃ. Ettāvatā ca panāyasmā
atk-s0102a:595_1: ānando – “addhā ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho”ti sallakkhesi. Bhagavā pana
atk-s0102a:595_2: sallakkhitabhāvaṃ jānantopi okāsaṃ adatvāva aññānipi aṭṭhakāni sampiṇḍento – “aṭṭha kho imā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:597_1: sā pana aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateyeva. Sallapitapubbanti ālāpasallāpo katapubbo.
atk-s0102a:597_2: Sākacchāti dhammasākacchāpi samāpajjitapubbā. Yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇoti te odātāpi honti
atk-s0102a:597_3: kāḷāpi maṅguracchavīpi, satthā suvaṇṇavaṇṇova. Idaṃ pana saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:597_4: Saṇṭhānampi ca kevalaṃ tesaṃ paññāyatiyeva, na pana bhagavā milakkhusadiso hoti,
atk-s0102a:597_5: nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo, buddhaveseneva nisīdati. Te pana attano samānasaṇṭhānameva
atk-s0102a:597_6: passanti. Yādisako tesaṃ saroti te chinnassarāpi honti gaggarassarāpi kākassarāpi,
atk-s0102a:597_7: satthā brahmassarova. Idaṃ pana bhāsantaraṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ. Sacepi hi satthā rājāsane
atk-s0102a:597_8: nisinno katheti, “ajja rājā madhurena sarena kathetī”ti tesaṃ hoti. Kathetvā pakkante
atk-s0102a:597_9: pana bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā – “ko nu kho aya”nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:597_10: Tattha ko nu kho ayanti imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurenākārena
atk-s0102a:597_11: kathento ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito, kiṃ devo, udāhu manussoti evaṃ vīmaṃsantāpi na
atk-s0102a:597_12: jānantīti attho. Kimatthaṃ panevaṃ ajānantānaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti? Vāsanatthāya. Evaṃ
atk-s0102a:597_13: sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hoti yevāti anāgataṃ paṭicca deseti. Anekasataṃ
atk-s0102a:598_0: Imā pana aṭṭha parisā bhagavā kimatthaṃ āhari? Abhītabhāvadassanatthameva. Imā kira
atk-s0102a:598_1: āharitvā evamāha – “ānanda, imāpi aṭṭha parisā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ desentassa tathāgatassa
atk-s0102a:598_2: bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi, māraṃ pana ekakaṃ disvā tathāgato bhāyeyyāti ko evaṃ
atk-s0102a:598_3: saññaṃ uppādetumarahati. Abhīto, ānanda, tathāgato acchambhī, sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajī”ti.
atk-s0102a:600_0: 173. Abhibhāyatanānīti abhibhavanakāraṇāni. Kiṃ abhibhavanti? Paccanīkadhammepi ārammaṇānipi.
atk-s0102a:600_1: Tāni hi paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti, puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni.
atk-s0102a:601_0: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī
atk-s0102a:601_1: nāma hoti. Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti.
atk-s0102a:601_2: Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthapādapiṭṭhesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:601_3: vā karoti. Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:601_4: vā karoti. Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:601_5: vā karoti. Taṃ pana sunīlaṃ supītaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātakaṃ na hoti, avisuddhameva hoti.
atk-s0102a:602_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, nimittaṃ
atk-s0102a:602_1: pana bahiddhā, so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena – “ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0102a:602_2: rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Parittānīti avaḍḍhitāni. Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti
atk-s0102a:602_3: suvaṇṇāni vā honti, dubbaṇṇāni vā. Parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:602_4: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā – “kiṃ
atk-s0102a:602_5: ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti, evameva ñāṇuttariko
atk-s0102a:602_6: puggalo visadañāṇo – “kiṃ ettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi, nāyaṃ mama
atk-s0102a:602_7: bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ
atk-s0102a:602_8: pāpetīti attho. Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito
atk-s0102a:602_9: vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiyaṃ. Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi
atk-s0102a:602_10: evaṃsaññī hoti. Abhibhavanasaññā hissa antosamāpattiyampi atthi, ābhogasaññā pana
atk-s0102a:603_0: Appamāṇānīti vaḍḍhitappamāṇāni, mahantānīti attho. Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā
atk-s0102a:603_1: mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā – “aññampi hotu, kiṃ etaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0102a:603_2: karissatī”ti taṃ na mahantato passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ
atk-s0102a:603_3: ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ, nayidaṃ appamāṇaṃ, na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī”ti
atk-s0102a:603_4: tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0102a:604: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0102a:605_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhāva uppannaṃ,
atk-s0102a:605_1: so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena – “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko
atk-s0102a:605_2: bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Sesamettha catutthābhibhāyatane vuttanayameva.
atk-s0102a:605_3: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena,
atk-s0102a:605_4: suvaṇṇaṃ dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. Etesañhi etāni sappāyāni.
atk-s0102a:605_5: Sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge caritaniddese vuttā.
atk-s0102a:606_0: Pañcamaabhibhāyatanādīsu nīlānīti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇānīti vaṇṇavasena.
atk-s0102a:606_1: Nīlanidassanānīti nidassanavasena, apaññāya mānavivarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva
atk-s0102a:606_2: hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīlanibhāsānīti idaṃ pana obhāsavasena vuttaṃ, nīlobhāsāni
atk-s0102a:606_3: nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena nesaṃ visuddhataṃ dasseti. Visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva
atk-s0102a:606_4: hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. Umāpupphanti etañhi pupphaṃ siniddhaṃ mudu,
atk-s0102a:606_5: dissamānampi nīlameva hoti. Girikaṇṇikapupphādīni pana dissamānāni setadhātukāneva
atk-s0102a:606_6: honti. Tasmā idameva gahitaṃ, na tāni. Bārāṇaseyyakanti bārāṇasisambhavaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0102a:606_7: kira kappāsopi mudu, suttakantikāyopi tantavāyāpi chekā, udakampi suci siniddhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:606_8: Tasmā taṃ vatthaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ hoti; dvīsupi passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati.
atk-s0102a:607_0: Pītānītiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:607_1: nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca
atk-s0102a:607_2: parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva. Imānipi
atk-s0102a:607_3: aṭṭha abhibhāyatanāni abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni. Imāni kira vatvā evamāha
atk-s0102a:607_4: – “ānanda, evarūpāpi samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca tathāgatassa
atk-s0102a:607_5: bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi, māraṃ pana ekakaṃ disvā tathāgato bhāyeyyāti ko evaṃ
atk-s0102a:607_6: saññaṃ uppādetumarahati. Abhīto, ānanda, tathāgato acchambhī, sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajī”ti.
atk-s0102a:609_0: 174. Vimokkhakathā uttānatthāyeva. Imepi aṭṭha vimokkhā abhītabhāvadassanatthameva
atk-s0102a:609_1: ānītā. Imepi kira vatvā evamāha – “ānanda, etāpi samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa
atk-s0102a:609_2: ca tathāgatassa bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi…pe… ossajī”ti.
atk-s0102a:610: 175. Idānipi bhagavā ānandassa okāsaṃ adatvāva ekamidāhantiādinā nayena aparampi desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha paṭhamābhisambuddhoti abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamameva aṭṭhame sattāhe.
atk-s0102a:611: 177. Ossaṭṭhoti vissajjito paricchinno, evaṃ kira vatvā – “tenāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu kampitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:613_0: 178. Alanti paṭikkhepavacanametaṃ. Bodhinti catumaggañāṇapaṭiveghaṃ. Saddahasi tvanti
atk-s0102a:613_1: evaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ tathāgatassa saddahasīti vadati. Tasmātihānandāti yasmā idaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0102a:614_0: 179. Ekamidāhanti idaṃ bhagavā – “na kevalaṃ ahaṃ idheva taṃ āmantesiṃ, aññadāpi
atk-s0102a:614_1: āmantetvā oḷārikaṃ nimittaṃ akāsiṃ, tampi tayā na paṭividdhaṃ, tavevāyaṃ aparādho”ti
atk-s0102a:614_2: evaṃ sokavinodanatthāya nānappakārato therasseva dosāropanatthaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0102a:615_0: 183. Piyehi manāpehīti mātāpitābhātābhaginiādikehi jātiyā nānābhāvo, maraṇena vinābhāvo,
atk-s0102a:615_1: bhavena aññathābhāvo. Taṃ kutettha labbhāti tanti tasmā, yasmā sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi
atk-s0102a:615_2: nānābhāvo, tasmā dasa pāramiyo pūretvāpi, sambodhiṃ patvāpi, dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvāpi,
atk-s0102a:615_3: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvāpi, devorohaṇaṃ katvāpi, yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ
atk-s0102a:615_4: palokadhammaṃ, taṃ vata tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0102a:615_5: rodantenāpi kandantenāpi na sakkā taṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhunti. Puna paccāvamissatīti yaṃ
atk-s0102a:615_6: cattaṃ vantaṃ, taṃ vata puna paṭikhādissatīti attho.
atk-s0102a:616_0: 184. Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyanti yathā idaṃ sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0102a:616_1: Addhaniyanti addhānakkhamaṃ. Ciraṭṭhitikanti cirappavattivasena ciraṭṭhitikaṃ. Cattāro
atk-s0102a:616_2: satipaṭṭhānātiādi sabbaṃ lokiyalokuttaravaseneva kathitaṃ. Etesaṃ pana bodhipakkhiyānaṃ
atk-s0102a:619_0: 186. Nāgāpalokitanti yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni paccekabuddhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:619_1: aṅkusakalaggāni viya, na evaṃ buddhānaṃ. Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni
atk-s0102a:619_2: hutvā ṭhitāni, tasmā pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ. Yathā
atk-s0102a:619_3: pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati, evaṃ parivattitabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:619_4: hoti. Bhagavato pana nagaradvāre ṭhatvā – “vesāliṃ apalokessāmī”ti citte uppannamatte
atk-s0102a:619_5: – “bhagavā anekāni kappakoṭisahassāni pāramiyo pūrentehi tumhehi na gīvaṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0102a:619_6: apalokanakammaṃ kata”nti ayaṃ pathavī kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:620_1: tato tato nikkhantakāle taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimadassanameva, tattha tattha kasmā nāgāpalokitaṃ
atk-s0102a:620_2: nāpalokesīti? Anacchariyattā. Tattha tattha hi nivattetvā apalokentassetaṃ na acchariyaṃ
atk-s0102a:620_3: hoti, tasmā nāpalokesi. Api ca vesālirājāno āsannavināsā, tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ upari vinassissanti.
atk-s0102a:620_4: Te taṃ nagaradvāre nāgāpalokitaṃ nāma cetiyaṃ katvā gandhamālādīhi pūjessanti, taṃ
atk-s0102a:620_5: nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti tesaṃ anukampāya apalokesi.
atk-s0102a:621: Dukkhassantakaroti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro. Cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
atk-s0102a:623: 187. Mahāpadeseti mahāokāse, mahāapadese vā, buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti attho.
atk-s0102a:624_0: 188. Neva abhinanditabbanti haṭṭhatuṭṭhehi sādhukāraṃ datvā pubbeva na sotabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:624_1: evaṃ kate hi pacchā “idaṃ na sametī”ti vuccamāno – “kiṃ pubbeva ayaṃ dhammo, idāni
atk-s0102a:624_2: na dhammo”ti vatvā laddhiṃ na vissajjeti. Nappaṭikkositabbanti – “kiṃ esa bālo vadatī”ti
atk-s0102a:624_3: evaṃ pubbeva na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ vutte hi vattuṃ yuttampi na vakkhati. Tenāha – “anabhinanditvā
atk-s0102a:624_4: appaṭikkositvā”ti. Padabyañjanānīti padasaṅkhātāni byañjanāni. Sādhukaṃ uggahetvāti
atk-s0102a:624_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāḷi vuttā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho vutto, imasmiṃ ṭhāne anusandhi kathito,
atk-s0102a:624_6: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pubbāparaṃ kathitanti suṭṭhu gahetvā. Sutte osāretabbānīti sutte otāretabbāni.
atk-s0102a:625_0: Ettha ca suttanti vinayo. Yathāha – “kattha paṭikkhittaṃ? Sāvatthiyaṃ suttavibhaṅge”ti.
atk-s0102a:625_1: Vinayoti khandhako. Yathāha – “vinayātisāre”ti. Evaṃ vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādiyati.
atk-s0102a:625_2: Ubhatovibhaṅgā pana suttaṃ, khandhakaparivārā vinayoti evaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ pariyādiyati.
atk-s0102a:625_3: Athavā suttantapiṭakaṃ suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evaṃ dveyeva piṭakāni pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0102a:625_4: Suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evampi tīṇi piṭakāni
atk-s0102a:625_5: na tāva pariyādiyanti. Asuttanāmakañhi buddhavacanaṃ nāma atthi. Seyyathidaṃ – jātakaṃ,
atk-s0102a:625_6: paṭisambhidā, niddeso, suttanipāto, dhammapadaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, vimānavatthu,
atk-s0102a:626_0: Sudinnatthero pana – “asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ na atthī”ti taṃ sabbaṃ paṭipakkhipitvā
atk-s0102a:626_1: – “tīṇi piṭakāni suttaṃ, vinayo pana kāraṇa”nti āha. Tato taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento idaṃ suttamāhari –
atk-s0102a:627_0: “Ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0102a:627_1: saññogāya saṃvattanti no visaññogāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya, mahicchatāya
atk-s0102a:627_2: saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0102a:627_3: saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, kosajjāya saṃvattanti no vīriyārambhāya, dubbharatāya
atk-s0102a:627_4: saṃvattanti no subharatāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi – ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo,
atk-s0102a:627_5: netaṃ satthusāsana’nti. Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā virāgāya
atk-s0102a:627_6: saṃvattanti no sarāgāya, visaññogāya saṃvattanti no saññogāya, apacayāya saṃvattanti
atk-s0102a:627_7: no ācayāya, appicchatāya saṃvattanti no mahicchatāya, santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no
atk-s0102a:627_8: asantuṭṭhiyā, pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya, vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti no
atk-s0102a:627_9: kosajjāya, subharatāya saṃvattanti no dubbharatāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi
atk-s0102a:628_0: Tasmā sutteti tepiṭake buddhavacane otāretabbāni. Vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe
atk-s0102a:628_1: saṃsandetabbānīti ayamettha attho. Na ceva sutte osarantīti suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci
atk-s0102a:628_3: aññatarato āgatāni paññāyantīti attho. Evaṃ āgatāni hi rāgādivinaye ca na paññāyamānāni
atk-s0102a:628_4: chaḍḍetabbāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “iti hetaṃ, bhikkhave, chaḍḍeyyāthā”ti. Etenupāyena
atk-s0102a:629: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, catutthaṃ mahāpadesaṃ dhāreyyāthāti idaṃ catutthaṃ dhammassa patiṭṭhānokāsaṃ dhāreyyātha.
atk-s0102a:630_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sutte cattāro mahāpadesā, khandhake
atk-s0102a:630_1: cattāro mahāpadesā, cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni, suttaṃ, suttānulomaṃ, ācariyavādo,
atk-s0102a:631: Tattha – “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo”ti dhammavinicchaye patte ime cattāro mahāpadesā pamāṇaṃ. Yaṃ ettha sameti tadeva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ viravantassapi na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:632_0: “Idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti kappiyākappiyavinicchaye patte – “yaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:632_1: mayā idaṃ na kappatīti appaṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati,
atk-s0102a:632_2: taṃ vo na kappatī”tiādinā nayena khandhake vuttā cattāro mahāpadesā pamāṇaṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:632_3: vinicchayakathā samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttā. Tattha vuttanayena yaṃ kappiyaṃ anulometi,
atk-s0102a:632_4: tadeva kappiyaṃ, itaraṃ akappiyanti evaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:633_0: Ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho, vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho, paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho,
atk-s0102a:633_1: ṭhapanīyo pañhoti imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni nāma. Tattha “cakkhuṃ anicca”nti
atk-s0102a:633_2: puṭṭhena – “āma anicca”nti ekaṃseneva byākātabbaṃ. Esa nayo sotādīsu. Ayaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo
atk-s0102a:633_3: pañho. “Aniccaṃ nāma cakkhu”nti puṭṭhena – “na cakkhumeva, sotampi aniccaṃ ghānampi
atk-s0102a:633_4: anicca”nti evaṃ vibhajitvā byākātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho. “Yathā cakkhu
atk-s0102a:633_5: tathā sotaṃ, yathā sotaṃ tathā cakkhu”nti puṭṭhena “kenaṭṭhena pucchasī”ti paṭipucchitvā
atk-s0102a:633_7: vutte āmāti byākātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho. “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni
atk-s0102a:633_8: puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo, esa pañho na byākātabbo. Ayaṃ
atk-s0102a:633_9: ṭhapanīyo pañho. Iti tenākārena pañhe sampatte imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:634_0: Suttādīsu pana suttaṃ nāma tisso saṅgītiyo ārūḷhāni tīṇi piṭakāni. Suttānulomaṃ nāma
atk-s0102a:634_1: anulomakappiyaṃ. Ācariyavādo nāma aṭṭhakathā. Attanomati nāma nayaggāhena anubuddhiyā
atk-s0102a:634_2: attano paṭibhānaṃ. Tattha suttaṃ appaṭibāhiyaṃ, taṃ paṭibāhantena buddhova paṭibāhito
atk-s0102a:634_3: hoti. Anulomakappiyaṃ pana suttena samentameva gahetabbaṃ, na itaraṃ. Ācariyavādopi
atk-s0102a:634_4: suttena samentoyeva gahetabbo, na itaro. Attanomati pana sabbadubbalā, sāpi suttena
atk-s0102a:634_5: samentāyeva gahetabbā, na itarā. Pañcasatikā, sattasatikā, sahassikāti imā pana tisso
atk-s0102a:634_6: saṅgītiyo. Suttampi tāsu āgatameva pamāṇaṃ, itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0102a:634_7: otarantānipi hi padabyañjanāni na ceva sutte otaranti, na ca vinaye sandissantīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0102a:636_0: 189. Kammāraputtassāti suvaṇṇakāraputtassa. So kira aḍḍho mahākuṭumbiko bhagavato
atk-s0102a:636_1: paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpanno hutvā attano ambavane vihāraṃ kārāpetvā niyyātesi. Taṃ
atk-s0102a:637_0: Sūkaramaddavanti nātitaruṇassa nātijiṇṇassa ekajeṭṭhakasūkarassa pavattamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0102a:637_1: kira mudu ceva siniddhañca hoti, taṃ paṭiyādāpetvā sādhukaṃ pacāpetvāti attho. Eke
atk-s0102a:637_3: yathā gavapānaṃ nāma pākanāma”nti. Keci bhaṇanti – “sūkaramaddavaṃ nāma rasāyanavidhi,
atk-s0102a:637_4: taṃ pana rasāyanasatthe āgacchati, taṃ cundena – ‘bhagavato parinibbānaṃ na bhaveyyā’ti
atk-s0102a:637_5: rasāyanaṃ paṭiyatta”nti. Tattha pana dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu devatā ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:638_0: Nāhaṃ tanti imaṃ sīhanādaṃ kimatthaṃ nadati? Parūpavādamocanatthaṃ. Attanā paribhuttāvasesaṃ
atk-s0102a:638_1: neva bhikkhūnaṃ, na manussānaṃ dātuṃ adāsi, āvāṭe nikhaṇāpetvā vināsesīti hi vattukāmānaṃ
atk-s0102a:638_2: idaṃ sutvā vacanokāso na bhavissatīti paresaṃ upavādamocanatthaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadatīti.
atk-s0102a:639_0: 190. Bhuttassa ca sūkaramaddavenāti bhuttassa udapādi, na pana bhuttapaccayā. Yadi
atk-s0102a:639_1: hi abhuttassa uppajjissatha, atikharo bhavissati. Siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuttattā panassa
atk-s0102a:639_2: tanuvedanā ahosi. Teneva padasā gantuṃ asakkhi. Virecamānoti abhiṇhaṃ pavattalohitavirecanova
atk-s0102a:639_3: samāno. Avocāti attanā patthitaṭṭhāne parinibbānatthāya evamāha. Imā pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
atk-s0102a:641: 191. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Acchodakāti pasannodakā. Sātodakāti madhurodakā. Sītodakāti tanusītalasalilā. Setakāti nikkaddamā. Suppatitthāti sundaratitthā.
atk-s0102a:643_0: 192. Pukkusoti tassa nāmaṃ. Mallaputtoti mallarājaputto. Mallā kira vārena rajjaṃ
atk-s0102a:643_1: kārenti. Yāva nesaṃ vāro na pāpuṇāti, tāva vaṇijjaṃ karonti. Ayampi vaṇijjameva karonto
atk-s0102a:643_2: pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā dhuravāte vāyante purato gacchati, pacchā vāte vāyante
atk-s0102a:643_3: satthavāhaṃ purato pesetvā sayaṃ pacchā gacchati. Tadā pana pacchā vāto vāyi, tasmā
atk-s0102a:643_4: esa purato satthavāhaṃ pesetvā sabbaratanayāne nisīditvā kusinārato nikkhamitvā “pāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:643_5: gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji. Tena vuttaṃ – “kusinārāya pāvaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotī”ti.
atk-s0102a:644_0: Āḷāroti tassa nāmaṃ. Dīghapiṅgalo kireso, tenassa āḷāroti nāmaṃ ahosi. Kālāmoti gottaṃ.
atk-s0102a:644_1: Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma. Neva dakkhatīti na addasa. Yatrasaddayuttattā panetaṃ anāgatavasena
atk-s0102a:645_0: 193. Niccharantīsūti vicarantīsu. Asaniyā phalantiyāti navavidhāya asaniyā bhijjamānāya
atk-s0102a:645_1: viya mahāravaṃ ravantiyā. Navavidhā hi asaniyo – asaññā, vicakkā, saterā, gaggarā,
atk-s0102a:645_2: kapisīsā, macchavilolikā, kukkuṭakā, daṇḍamaṇikā, sukkhāsanīti. Tattha asaññā asaññaṃ
atk-s0102a:645_3: karoti. Vicakkā ekaṃ cakkaṃ karoti. Saterā saterasadisā hutvā patati. Gaggarā gaggarāyamānā
atk-s0102a:645_4: patati. Kapisīsā bhamukaṃ ukkhipento makkaṭo viya hoti. Macchavilolikā vilolitamaccho
atk-s0102a:645_5: viya hoti. Kukkuṭakā kukkuṭasadisā hutvā patati. Daṇḍamaṇikā naṅgalasadisā hutvā
atk-s0102a:646_0: Deve vassanteti sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjitvā antarantarā vassante. Ātumāyanti ātumaṃ nissāya
atk-s0102a:646_1: viharāmi. Bhusāgāreti khalasālāyaṃ. Etthesoti etasmiṃ kāraṇe eso mahājanakāyo sannipatito.
atk-s0102a:646_2: Kva ahosīti kuhiṃ ahosi. So taṃ bhanteti so tvaṃ bhante.
atk-s0102a:647_1: attho. Dhāraṇīyanti antarantarā mayā dhāretabbaṃ, paridahitabbanti attho. Taṃ kira
atk-s0102a:647_2: so tathārūpe chaṇadivaseyeva dhāretvā sesakāle nikkhipati. Evaṃ uttamaṃ maṅgalavatthayugaṃ
atk-s0102a:647_3: sandhāyāha. Anukampaṃ upādāyāti mayi anukampaṃ paṭicca. Acchādehīti upacāravacanametaṃ
atk-s0102a:647_4: – ekaṃ mayhaṃ dehi, ekaṃ ānandassāti attho. Kiṃ pana thero taṃ gaṇhīti? Āma gaṇhi.
atk-s0102a:647_5: Kasmā? Matthakappattakiccattā. Kiñcāpi hesa evarūpaṃ lābhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:647_6: paṭipanno. Taṃ panassa upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ. Tasmā aggahesi. Ye cāpi
atk-s0102a:647_7: evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “anārādhako maññe ānando pañcavīsati vassāni upaṭṭhahantena na kiñci
atk-s0102a:647_8: bhagavato santikā tena laddhapubba”nti. Tesaṃ vacanokāsacchedanatthampi aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:647_9: Api ca jānāti bhagavā – “ānando gahetvāpi attanā na dhāressati, mayhaṃyeva pūjaṃ
atk-s0102a:647_10: karissati. Mallaputtena pana ānandaṃ pūjentena saṅghopi pūjito bhavissati, evamassa
atk-s0102a:647_11: mahāpuññarāsi bhavissatī”ti therassa ekaṃ dāpesi. Theropi teneva kāraṇena aggahesīti.
atk-s0102a:648_0: 195. Bhagavato kāyaṃ upanāmitanti nivāsanapārupanavasena allīyāpitaṃ. Bhagavāpi tato
atk-s0102a:648_1: ekaṃ nivāsesi, ekaṃ pārupi. Hataccikaṃ viyāti yathā hatacciko aṅgāro antanteneva
