atk-s0102a:1352_4: ca kathetabbo. Sevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādiveramaṇīhi ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1353_0: Pariyesanā pana kāyavācāhi pariyesanāyeva. Sā kāyavacīsamācāragahaṇena gahitāpi samānā
atk-s0102a:1353_1: yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma etasmiññeva dvāradvaye uppajjati, na ākāse, tasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīladassanatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1353_2: visuṃ vuttā. Tattha nasevitabbapariyesanā anariyapariyesanāya kathetabbā. Sevitabbapariyesanā
atk-s0102a:1354_0: “Dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanā anariyā ca pariyesanā, ariyā ca pariyesanā. Katamā
atk-s0102a:1354_1: ca, bhikkhave, anariyā pariyesanā? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno
atk-s0102a:1354_2: jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati, attanā jarādhammo, byādhidhammo, maraṇadhammo, sokadhammo,
atk-s0102a:1355_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jātidhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ, bhikkhave, jātidhammaṃ, dāsidāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:1355_1: jātidhammaṃ ajeḷakaṃ jātidhammaṃ, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ jātidhammaṃ, hatthigavāssavaḷavaṃ
atk-s0102a:1355_2: jātidhammaṃ, jātarūparajataṃ jātidhammaṃ. Jātidhammā hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo, etthāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1355_3: gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1356: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jarādhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ, bhikkhave, jarādhammaṃ…pe… jarādhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1357_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, byādhidhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ, bhikkhave, byādhidhammaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1357_1: dāsidāsaṃ byādhidhammaṃ, ajeḷakaṃ, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ, hatthigavāssavaḷavaṃ byādhidhammaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1357_2: Byādhidhammā hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo, etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā
atk-s0102a:1358: Kiñca, bhikkhave, maraṇadhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ, bhikkhave, maraṇadhammaṃ…pe… maraṇadhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1359: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sokadhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ…pe… sokadhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1360_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, saṃkilesadhammaṃ vadetha…pe… jātarūparajataṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1360_1: Saṃkilesadhammā, hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo, etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno
atk-s0102a:1360_2: attanā saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesati. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, anariyā pariyesanāti.
atk-s0102a:1361: Apica kuhanādivasena pañcavidhā, agocaravasena chabbidhā vejjakammādivasena ekavīsatividhā, evaṃ pavattā sabbāpi anesanā anariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1362_0: “Katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyā pariyesanā? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā jātidhammo
atk-s0102a:1362_1: samāno jātidhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā ajātaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati,
atk-s0102a:1362_2: attanā jarādhammo, byādhi, maraṇa, soka, saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhamme ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0102a:1362_3: viditvā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati. Ayaṃ ariyā pariyesanāti.
atk-s0102a:1363: Apica pañca kuhanādīni cha agocare ekavīsatividhañca anesanaṃ vajjetvā bhikkhācariyāya dhammena samena pariyesanāpi ariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1364_0: Ettha ca yo yo “na sevitabbo”ti vutto, so so pubbabhāge pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sambhārapariyesanāpayogakaraṇagamanakālato
atk-s0102a:1364_1: paṭṭhāya na sevitabbova. Itaro ādito paṭṭhāya sevitabbo, asakkontena cittampi uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1364_2: Apica saṅghabhedādīnaṃ atthāya parakkamantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya kāyasamācāro na
atk-s0102a:1364_3: sevitabbo, divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanādivasena pavatto
atk-s0102a:1364_5: vācaṃ bhindantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya vacīsamācāro na sevitabbo, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1364_7: sevitabbo. Anariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā na sevitabbā,
atk-s0102a:1364_8: ariyapariyesanameva pariyesantānaṃ dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1365_0: Evaṃ paṭipanno khoti evaṃ asevitabbaṃ kāyavacīsamācāraṃ pariyesanañca pahāya sevitabbānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1365_1: pāripūriyā paṭipanno, devānaminda, bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarāya uttamajeṭṭhakasīlasaṃvaratthāya
atk-s0102a:1365_2: paṭipanno nāma hotīti bhagavā khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyapubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1367_0: 365. Dutiyapucchāyaṃ indriyasaṃvarāyāti indriyānaṃ pidhānāya, guttadvāratāya saṃvutadvāratāyāti
atk-s0102a:1367_1: attho. Vissajjane panassa cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpampītiādi sevitabbarūpādivasena indriyasaṃvaradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1367_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha evaṃ vutteti heṭṭhā somanassādipañhāvissajjanānaṃ sutattā imināpi
atk-s0102a:1367_3: evarūpena bhavitabbanti sañjātapaṭibhāno bhagavatā evaṃ vutte sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0102a:1367_4: etadavoca, etaṃ imassa kho ahaṃ, bhanteti ādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavāpissa okāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:1367_5: datvā tuṇhī ahosi. Kathetukāmopi hi yo atthaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, atthaṃ sampādetuṃ
atk-s0102a:1367_6: sakkonto vā na kathetukāmo hoti, na tassa bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ pana yasmā
atk-s0102a:1367_7: kathetukāmo ceva, sakkoti ca atthaṃ sampādetuṃ tenassa bhagavā okāsamakāsi.
atk-s0102a:1368_0: Tattha evarūpaṃ na sevitabbanti ādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepo – yaṃ rūpaṃ passato rāgādayo
atk-s0102a:1368_1: uppajjanti, taṃ na sevitabbaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ na oloketabbanti attho. Yaṃ pana passato
atk-s0102a:1368_2: asubhasaññā vā saṇṭhāti, pasādo vā uppajjati, aniccasaññāpaṭilābho vā hoti, taṃ sevitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1369_0: Yaṃ cittakkharaṃ cittabyañjanampi saddaṃ suṇato rāgādayo uppajjanti, evarūpo saddo
atk-s0102a:1369_1: na sevitabbo. Yaṃ pana atthanissitaṃ dhammanissitaṃ kumbhadāsigītampi suṇantassa
atk-s0102a:1369_2: pasādo vā uppajjati, nibbidā vā saṇṭhāti, evarūpo saddo sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1370: Yaṃ gandhaṃ ghāyato rāgādayo uppajjanti, evarūpo gandho na sevitabbo. Yaṃ pana gandhaṃ ghāyato asubhasaññādipaṭilābho hoti, evarūpo gandho sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1371_0: Yaṃ rasaṃ sāyato rāgādayo uppajjanti, evarūpo raso na sevitabbo. Yaṃ pana rasaṃ sāyato
atk-s0102a:1371_1: āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ceva uppajjati, sāyitapaccayā ca kāyabalaṃ nissāya ariyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0102a:1371_3: kilesakkhayo vā hoti, evarūpo raso sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1372_0: Yaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusato rāgādayo uppajjanti, evarūpaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ na sevitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1372_1: Yaṃ pana phusato sāriputtattherādīnaṃ viya āsavakkhayo ceva, vīriyañca supaggahitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1372_2: pacchimā ca janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpādanena anuggahitā hoti, evarūpaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:1372_3: sevitabbaṃ. Sāriputtatthero kira tiṃsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi. Tathā mahāmoggallānatthero.
atk-s0102a:1372_4: Mahākassapatthero vīsavassasataṃ mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi. Anuruddhatthero paññāsa
atk-s0102a:1372_5: vassāni. Bhaddiyatthero tiṃsa vassāni. Soṇatthero aṭṭhārasa vassāni. Raṭṭhapālatthero
atk-s0102a:1372_6: dvādasa. Ānandatthero pannarasa. Rāhulatthero dvādasa. Bākulatthero asīti vassāni.
atk-s0102a:1372_7: Nāḷakatthero yāvaparinibbānā mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresīti.
atk-s0102a:1373_0: Ye manoviññeyye dhamme samannāharantassa rāgādayo uppajjanti, “aho, vata yaṃ paresaṃ
atk-s0102a:1373_1: paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ mamassā”tiādinā nayena vā abhijjhādīni āpāthamāgacchanti evarūpā
atk-s0102a:1373_2: dhammā na sevitabbā. “Sabbe sattā averā hontū”ti evaṃ mettādivasena, ye vā pana tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:1373_3: therānaṃ dhammā, evarūpā sevitabbā. Tayo kira therā vassūpanāyikadivase kāmavitakkādayo
atk-s0102a:1373_4: akusalavitakkā na vitakketabbāti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Atha pavāraṇadivase saṅghatthero
atk-s0102a:1373_5: saṅghanavakaṃ pucchi – “āvuso, imasmiṃ temāse kittake ṭhāne cittassa dhāvituṃ dinna”nti?
atk-s0102a:1373_6: Na, bhante, pariveṇaparicchedato bahi dhāvituṃ adāsinti. Dutiyaṃ pucchi – “tava āvuso”ti?
atk-s0102a:1373_7: Nivāsagehato, bhante, bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti. Atha dvepi theraṃ pucchiṃsu “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0102a:1373_8: pana, bhante”ti? Niyakajjhattakhandhapañcakato, āvuso, bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti.
atk-s0102a:1373_9: Tumhehi, bhante, dukkaraṃ katanti. Evarūpo manoviññeyyo dhammo sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1374_0: 366. Ekantavādāti ekoyeva anto vādassa etesaṃ, na dvedhā gatavādāti ekantavādā, ekaññeva
atk-s0102a:1374_1: vadantīti pucchati. Ekantasīlāti ekācārā. Ekantachandāti ekaladdhikā. Ekantaajjhosānāti ekantapariyosānā.
atk-s0102a:1375_0: Anekadhātu nānādhātu kho, devānaminda, lokoti devānaminda, ayaṃ loko anekajjhāsayo
atk-s0102a:1375_1: nānajjhāsayo. Ekasmiṃ gantukāme eko ṭhātukāmo hoti. Ekasmiṃ ṭhātukāme eko sayitukāmo
atk-s0102a:1375_2: hoti. Dve sattā ekajjhāsayā nāma dullabhā. Tasmiṃ anekadhātunānādhātusmiṃ loke yaṃ
atk-s0102a:1375_3: yadeva dhātuṃ yaṃ yadeva ajjhāsayaṃ sattā abhinivisanti gaṇhanti, taṃ tadeva. Thāmasā
atk-s0102a:1375_4: parāmāsāti thāmena ca parāmāsena ca. Abhinivissa voharantīti suṭṭhu gaṇhitvā voharanti,
atk-s0102a:1375_5: kathenti dīpenti kittenti. Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti idaṃ amhākameva vacanaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1376_0: Accantaniṭṭhāti anto vuccati vināso, antaṃ atītā niṭṭhā etesanti accantaniṭṭhā. Yā
atk-s0102a:1376_1: etesaṃ niṭṭhā, yo paramassāso nibbānaṃ, taṃ sabbesaṃ vināsātikkantaṃ niccanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1376_2: Yogakkhemoti nibbānasseva nāmaṃ, accanto yogakkhemo etesanti accantayogakkhemī. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0102a:1376_3: brahmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ carantīti brahmacārī. Accantatthāya brahmacārī accantabrahmacārī.
atk-s0102a:1376_4: Pariyosānantipi nibbānassa nāmaṃ. Accantaṃ pariyosānaṃ etesanti accantapariyosānā.
atk-s0102a:1377_0: Taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttāti taṇhāsaṅkhayoti maggopi nibbānampi. Maggo taṇhaṃ saṅkhiṇāti
atk-s0102a:1377_1: vināsetīti taṇhāsaṅkhayo. Nibbānaṃ yasmā taṃ āgamma taṇhā saṅkhiyati vinassati, tasmā
atk-s0102a:1377_2: taṇhāsaṅkhayo. Taṇhāsaṅkhayena maggena vimuttā, taṇhāsaṅkhaye nibbāne vimuttā adhimuttāti
atk-s0102a:1378_0: Ettāvatā ca bhagavatā cuddasapi mahāpañhā byākatā honti. Cuddasa mahāpañhā nāma issāmacchariyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1378_1: eko pañho, piyāppiyaṃ eko, chando eko, vitakko eko, papañco eko, somanassaṃ eko,
atk-s0102a:1378_2: domanassaṃ eko, upekkhā eko, kāyasamācāro eko, vacīsamācāro eko, pariyesanā eko,
atk-s0102a:1378_3: indriyasaṃvaro eko, anekadhātu eko, accantaniṭṭhā ekoti.
atk-s0102a:1379_0: 367. Ejāti calanaṭṭhena taṇhā vuccati. Sā pīḷanaṭṭhena rogo, anto padussanaṭṭhena
atk-s0102a:1379_1: gaṇḍo, anuppaviṭṭhaṭṭhena sallaṃ. Tasmā ayaṃ purisoti yasmā ejā attanā katakammānurūpena
atk-s0102a:1379_2: purisaṃ tattha tattha abhinibbattatthāya kaḍḍhati, tasmā ayaṃ puriso tesaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0102a:1379_3: bhavānaṃ vasena uccāvacaṃ āpajjati. Brahmaloke ucco hoti, devaloke avaco. Devaloke
atk-s0102a:1379_4: ucco, manussaloke avaco. Manussaloke ucco, apāye avaco. Yesāhaṃ, bhanteti yesaṃ ahaṃ
atk-s0102a:1379_5: bhante. Sandhivasena panettha “yesāha”nti hoti. Yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattanti yathā
atk-s0102a:1379_6: mayā suto ceva uggahito ca, evaṃ. Dhammaṃ desemīti sattavatapadaṃ dhammaṃ desemi.
atk-s0102a:1379_7: Na cāhaṃ tesanti ahaṃ pana tesaṃ sāvako na sampajjāmi. Ahaṃ kho pana, bhantetiādinā
atk-s0102a:1381_0: 368. Vedapaṭilābhanti tuṭṭhipaṭilābhaṃ. Devāsurasaṅgāmoti devānañca asurānañca saṅgāmo.
atk-s0102a:1381_1: Samupabyūḷhoti samāpanno nalāṭena nalāṭaṃ paharaṇākārappatto viya. Etesaṃ kira kadāci
atk-s0102a:1381_2: mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe saṅgāmo hoti tattha pana chedanavijjhanādīhi aññamaññaṃ ghāto nāma
atk-s0102a:1381_3: natthi, dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya jayaparājayamattameva hoti. Kadāci devā jinanti,
atk-s0102a:1381_4: kadāci asurā. Tattha yasmiṃ saṅgāme devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu, taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0102a:1381_5: tasmiṃ kho pana bhantetiādimāha. Ubhayametanti ubhayaṃ etaṃ. Duvidhampi ojaṃ ettha
atk-s0102a:1381_6: devaloke devāyeva paribhuñjissantīti evamassa āvajjantassa balavapītisomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1381_7: Sadaṇḍāvacaroti sadaṇḍāvacarako, daṇḍaggahaṇena satthaggahaṇena saddhiṃ ahosi, na
atk-s0102a:1381_8: nikkhittadaṇḍasatthoti dasseti. Ekantanibbidāyāti ekanteneva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāyāti
atk-s0102a:1382_0: 369. Pavedesīti kathesi dīpesi. Idhevāti imasmiññeva okāse. Devabhūtassa me satoti
atk-s0102a:1382_1: devassa me sato. Punarāyu ca me laddhoti puna aññena kammavipākena me jīvitaṃ laddhanti,
atk-s0102a:1382_2: iminā attano cutabhāvaṃ ceva upapannabhāvañca āvikaroti.
atk-s0102a:1383_0: Diviyā kāyāti dibbā attabhāvā. Āyuṃ hitvā amānusanti dibbaṃ āyuṃ jahitvā. Amūḷho
atk-s0102a:1383_1: gabbhamessāmīti niyatagatikattā amūḷho hutvā. Yattha me ramatī manoti yattha me mano
atk-s0102a:1383_2: ramissati, tattheva khattiyakulādīsu gabbhaṃ upagacchissāmīti sattakkhattuṃ deve
atk-s0102a:1384: Ñāyena viharissāmīti manussesu upapannopi mātaraṃ jīvitā voropanādīnaṃ abhabbattā ñāyena kāraṇena samena viharissāmīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1385_0: Sambodhi ce bhavissatīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati, sace sakadāgāmī bhavissāmīti
atk-s0102a:1385_1: dīpeti. Aññātā viharissāmīti aññātā ājānitukāmo hutvā viharissāmi. Sveva anto bhavissatīti
atk-s0102a:1385_2: so eva me manussaloke anto bhavissatīti.
atk-s0102a:1386: Puna devo bhavissāmi, devalokasmiṃ uttamoti puna devalokasmiṃ uttamo sakko devānamindo bhavissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:1387_0: Antime vattamānamhīti antime bhave vattamāne. So nivāso bhavissatīti ye te āyunā
atk-s0102a:1387_1: ca paññāya ca akaniṭṭhā jeṭṭhakā sabbadevehi paṇītatarā devā, avasāne me so nivāso
atk-s0102a:1387_2: bhavissati. Ayaṃ kira tato sakkattabhāvato cuto tasmiṃ attabhāve anāgāmimaggassa
atk-s0102a:1387_3: paṭiladdhattā uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī hutvā avihādīsu nibbattanto avasāne akaniṭṭhe
atk-s0102a:1387_4: nibbattissati. Taṃ sandhāya evamāha. Esa kira avihesu kappasahassaṃ vasissati, atappesu
atk-s0102a:1387_5: dve kappasahassāni, sudassesu cattāri kappasahassāni, sudassīsu aṭṭha, akaniṭṭhesu
atk-s0102a:1387_6: soḷasāti ekatiṃsa kappasahassāni brahmaāyuṃ anubhavissati. Sakko devarājā anāthapiṇḍiko
atk-s0102a:1387_7: gahapati visākhā mahāupāsikāti tayopi hi ime ekappamāṇaāyukā eva, vaṭṭābhiratasattā
atk-s0102a:1387_8: nāma etehi sadisā sukhabhāgino nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:1388: 370. Apariyositasaṅkappoti aniṭṭhitamanoratho. Yassu maññāmi samaṇeti ye ca samaṇe pavivittavihārinoti maññāmi.
atk-s0102a:1389: Ārādhanāti sampādanā. Virādhanāti asampādanā. Na sampāyantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:1390_0: Ādiccabandhunanti ādiccopi gotamagotto, bhagavāpi gotamagotto, tasmā evamāha. Yaṃ
atk-s0102a:1390_1: karomasīti yaṃ pubbe brahmuno namakkāraṃ karoma. Samaṃ devehīti devehi saddhiṃ, ito
atk-s0102a:1390_2: paṭṭhāya idāni amhākaṃ brahmuno namakkārakaraṇaṃ natthīti dasseti. Sāmaṃ karomāti namakkāraṃ karoma.
atk-s0102a:1391_0: 371. Parāmasitvāti tuṭṭhacitto sahāyaṃ hatthena hatthamhi paharanto viya pathaviṃ
atk-s0102a:1391_1: paharitvā, sakkhibhāvatthāya vā paharitvā “yathā tvaṃ niccalo, evamahaṃ bhagavatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1391_2: Ajjhiṭṭhapañhāti ajjhesitapañhā patthitapañhā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0102a:1398_0: 373. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ. Tatrāyamapubbapadavaṇṇanā – ekāyano
atk-s0102a:1398_1: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggoti kasmā bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsi? Kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthatāya.
atk-s0102a:1398_2: Kururaṭṭhavāsino kira bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā
atk-s0102a:1398_3: tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti.
atk-s0102a:1398_4: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ samatthā
atk-s0102a:1398_5: honti. Tena nesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ sampassanto ekavīsatiyā
atk-s0102a:1398_6: ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ
atk-s0102a:1398_7: abhāsi. Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:1398_8: suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya, evaṃ bhagavā kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ
atk-s0102a:1398_9: labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi. Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni imasmiṃ dīghanikāye
atk-s0102a:1398_10: mahānidānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sāropamaṃ, rukkhopamaṃ, raṭṭhapālaṃ, māgaṇḍiyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1399_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā
atk-s0102a:1399_1: viharanti, antamaso dāsakammakaraparijānāpi satipaṭṭhānapaṭisaṃyuttameva kathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0102a:1399_2: Udakatitthasuttakantanaṭṭhānādīsupi niratthakakathā nāma nappavattati. Sace kāci
atk-s0102a:1399_3: itthī “amma, tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti
atk-s0102a:1399_4: vadati, taṃ garahanti “dhiratthu tava jīvitaṃ, jīvamānāpi tvaṃ matasadisā”ti. Atha
atk-s0102a:1399_5: naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti. Yā
atk-s0102a:1399_6: pana “ahaṃ asukasatipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasikaromī”ti vadati, tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti
atk-s0102a:1399_7: sādhukāraṃ katvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ, tvaṃ nāma manussattaṃ pattā, tavatthāya
atk-s0102a:1399_8: sammāsambuddho uppanno”tiādīhi pasaṃsanti. Na kevalañcettha manussajātikāva satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā,
atk-s0102a:1400_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati. So bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-s0102a:1400_1: upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato. Taṃ sāmaṇeriyo gahetvā
atk-s0102a:1400_2: paṭijaggiṃsu. Buddharakkhito tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā
atk-s0102a:1400_3: mahātherī āha – “buddharakkhitā”ti. Kiṃ, ayyeti? Atthi te koci bhāvanāmanasikāroti?
atk-s0102a:1400_4: Natthi, ayyeti. Āvuso, pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ
atk-s0102a:1400_5: na vaṭṭati, kocideva manasikāro icchitabbo, tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi, “aṭṭhi
atk-s0102a:1400_6: aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ karohīti. So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0102a:1401_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena
atk-s0102a:1401_1: aggahesi. So “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi. Sāmaṇeriyo sutvā “ayye buddharakkhito sakuṇena
atk-s0102a:1401_2: gahito, mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ. Taṃ ānetvā purato
atk-s0102a:1401_3: ṭhapitaṃ therī āha – “buddharakkhita, sakuṇena gahitakāle kiṃ cintesī”ti? Na, ayye,
atk-s0102a:1401_4: aññaṃ kiñci cintesiṃ, aṭṭhipuñjova aṭṭhipuñjaṃ gahetvā gacchati, katarasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0102a:1401_5: vippakirissatīti, evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti. Sādhu, sādhu, buddharakkhita,
atk-s0102a:1401_6: anāgate bhavakkhayassa te paccayo bhavissatīti. Evaṃ tattha tiracchānagatāpi satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā.
atk-s0102a:1401_7: Tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva janento idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1404: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti.
atk-s0102a:1405_0: Bahūni nāmāni. Svāyamidha ayananāmena vutto, tasmā ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggoti
atk-s0102a:1405_1: ettha ekamaggo ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo na dvidhā pathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1405_2: Atha vā ekena ayitabboti ekāyano. Ekenāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vūpakaṭṭhena pavivittacittena.
atk-s0102a:1405_3: Ayitabbo paṭipajjitabbo, ayanti vā etenāti ayano, saṃsārato nibbānaṃ gacchantīti
atk-s0102a:1405_4: attho. Ekassa ayano ekāyano. Ekassāti seṭṭhassa. Sabbasattaseṭṭho ca bhagavā, tasmā
atk-s0102a:1405_5: bhagavatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi hi tena aññepi ayanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatova
atk-s0102a:1405_6: so ayano tena uppāditattā. Yathāha “so hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa
atk-s0102a:1405_7: uppādetā”tiādi. Ayatīti vā ayano, gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ekasmiṃ ayanoti ekāyano,
atk-s0102a:1405_8: imasmiññeva dhammavinaye pavattati, na aññatthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:1405_9: kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhatī”ti. Desanābhedoyeva
atk-s0102a:1405_10: heso, atthato pana ekova. Apica ekaṃ ayatīti ekāyano. Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi
atk-s0102a:1405_11: aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha brahmā sahampati –
atk-s0102a:1410_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1410_1: tasmā “ekāyano”ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā
atk-s0102a:1410_2: byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ. Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1410_3: yojetvā vucceyya, byañjanaṃ yujjeyya, attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā? Idha
atk-s0102a:1410_5: idhādhippeto, na lokuttaro, so ca anekavārampi ayati, anekañcassa ayanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1411_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggoti
atk-s0102a:1411_1: āha. Ācariyo panassa tipiṭakacūḷasumatthero missakamaggoti āha. Pubbabhāgo bhanteti?
atk-s0102a:1411_2: Missako, āvusoti. Ācariye pana punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi. Pañhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1411_3: avinicchinitvāva uṭṭhahiṃsu. Athācariyatthero nahānakoṭṭhakaṃ gacchanto “mayā missakamaggo
atk-s0102a:1411_4: kathito, cūḷanāgo pubbabhāgamaggoti ādāya voharati, ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ
atk-s0102a:1411_5: ādito paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ
atk-s0102a:1411_6: bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi. Lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta
atk-s0102a:1411_7: vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi, mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati. Cūḷanāgena diṭṭho
atk-s0102a:1411_8: pubbabhāgamaggova labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:1412_0: Porāṇakattherā kira piyadhammasavanā honti, saddaṃ sutvāva “ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ, ahaṃ paṭhama”nti
atk-s0102a:1412_1: ekappahāreneva osaranti. Tasmiñca divase cūḷanāgattherassa vāro, tena dhammāsane
atk-s0102a:1412_2: nisīditvā bījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa etadahosi
atk-s0102a:1412_3: – “raho nisīditvā na vakkhāmī”ti. Porāṇakattherā hi anusūyakā honti. Na attano rucimeva
atk-s0102a:1412_4: ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti, kāraṇameva gaṇhanti, akāraṇaṃ vissajjenti.
atk-s0102a:1412_5: Tasmā thero “āvuso, cūḷanāgā”ti āha. So ācariyassa viya saddoti dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0102a:1412_6: “kiṃ bhante”ti āha. Āvuso, cūḷanāga, mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati, tayā vutto
atk-s0102a:1412_7: pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggova labbhatīti. Thero cintesi – “amhākaṃ ācariyo sabbapariyattiko
atk-s0102a:1412_8: tepiṭako sutabuddho, evarūpassāpi nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti, anāgate mama
atk-s0102a:1412_9: bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0102a:1419_0: Maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena ca.
atk-s0102a:1419_1: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1419_2: sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya. Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1419_4: buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā anekasatā paccekabuddhā
atk-s0102a:1419_5: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā paramavisuddhiṃ
atk-s0102a:1419_6: pattā. Rūpamalavasena pana saṃkilesavodānapaññattiyeva natthi. Tathā hi –
atk-s0102a:1423: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”.
atk-s0102a:1424: Yathāha – “cittasaṃkilesā, bhikkhave, sattā saṃkilissanti, cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti. Tañca cittavodānaṃ iminā satipaṭṭhānamaggena hoti. Tenāha “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1425_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya pahānāyāti
atk-s0102a:1425_1: attho, ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya, paṭācārādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1426: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te mātu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0102a:1427: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1428: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto. Paṭācārā –
atk-s0102a:1429: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0102a:1431_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā. Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci
atk-s0102a:1431_1: dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi, tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1432_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ
atk-s0102a:1432_1: dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya
atk-s0102a:1432_2: dukkhassa, sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1433_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthadīpanā – sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo
atk-s0102a:1433_1: pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati. Tassa kaniṭṭhabhātu bhariyā “gacchatha,
atk-s0102a:1433_2: naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi. Te gantvā theraṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1433_3: Thero āha – “kasmā āgatattha upāsakā”ti? Taṃ jīvitā voropessāmāti. Pāṭibhogaṃ me
atk-s0102a:1433_4: upāsakā, gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa, imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāṭibhogo
atk-s0102a:1433_5: bhavissatīti? Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā
atk-s0102a:1433_6: pāṭibhogo”ti āha. Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu. Therassa vedanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1433_7: vikkhambhetvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1433_8: Tato anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane
atk-s0102a:1438_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ
atk-s0102a:1438_1: upagantvā “āvuso, tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammova kātabbo, na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti
atk-s0102a:1438_2: vatvā vihariṃsu. Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho
atk-s0102a:1438_3: āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati. Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0102a:1438_4: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso, kuhi”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0102a:1438_5: ñatvā ca “idāni gahitena gahitomhīti vattabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu. Atha aññataraṃ
atk-s0102a:1438_6: daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi. So “byaggho bhante”ti āha. Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe
atk-s0102a:1438_7: ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu. Byaggho bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānamāruyha
atk-s0102a:1438_8: taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya khādituṃ ārabhi. Itarepi “idāni sappurisa,
atk-s0102a:1438_9: amhehi kattabbaṃ natthi, bhikkhūnaṃ viseso nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1438_10: So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā
atk-s0102a:1438_11: khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā, yāva jaṇṇukā khāditasamaye sakadāgāmī, yāva nābhiyā
atk-s0102a:1438_12: khāditasamaye anāgāmī hutvā, hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0102a:1442: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, aṭṭhiyā ca nhārussa ca;
atk-s0102a:1444_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
atk-s0102a:1444_1: āgamma rājānaṃ passitvā raññā katānuggaho ekadivasaṃ kilañjakāpaṇasāladvārena gacchanto
atk-s0102a:1444_2: “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha, taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0102a:1444_3: sukhāya bhavissatī”ti na tumhākavākyaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano, na
atk-s0102a:1444_4: vedanā”ti. So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0102a:1444_5: pabbajito upasampanno dvemātikā paguṇā katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:1444_6: gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Pādesu avahantesu jaṇṇukehi caṅkamati. Tamenaṃ rattiṃ
atk-s0102a:1444_7: eko migaluddako migoti maññamāno pahari. Satti vinivijjhitvā gatā, so taṃ sattiṃ
atk-s0102a:1444_8: harāpetvā paharaṇamukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0102a:1444_9: okāsaṃ kāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena
atk-s0102a:1444_10: āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ byākaritvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:1446: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0102a:1449: Evaṃ tāva ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1450_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhapubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito
atk-s0102a:1450_1: domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi. So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne
atk-s0102a:1450_2: asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0102a:1451_0: Subrahmāpi devaputto accharāsahassaparivuto saggasampattiṃ anubhoti. Tattha pañcasatā
atk-s0102a:1451_1: accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye uppannā. So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti
atk-s0102a:1451_2: upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti upaparikkhanto
atk-s0102a:1451_3: attano āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā cavitvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto
atk-s0102a:1451_4: ativiya domanassajāto hutvā “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati, na añño”ti avasesā
atk-s0102a:1451_5: pañcasatā accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0102a:1454: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitoti. ;
atk-s0102a:1458_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0102a:1458_1: thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti. Evaṃ ayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa
atk-s0102a:1459_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tassa adhigamāya, pattiyāti
atk-s0102a:1459_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa
atk-s0102a:1459_2: adhigamāya saṃvattati. Tenāha “ñāyassa adhigamāyā”ti. Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti
atk-s0102a:1459_3: taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya, attapaccakkhatāyāti
atk-s0102a:1459_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti. Tenāha
atk-s0102a:1460_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva
atk-s0102a:1460_1: honti, ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni, na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0102a:1460_2: sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti. Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ
atk-s0102a:1460_3: taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti. Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti, taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0102a:1460_4: katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha. Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi
atk-s0102a:1460_5: ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati, sā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamena hoti. Sokaparidevānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1460_6: samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamena, dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo ñāyassādhigamena,
atk-s0102a:1460_7: ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya. Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti
atk-s0102a:1461_0: Apica vaṇṇabhaṇanametaṃ ekāyanamaggassa. Yatheva hi bhagavā – “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:1461_1: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_2: parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi
atk-s0102a:1461_3: padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Yathā ca ariyavaṃsadesanāya “cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā
atk-s0102a:1461_4: aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkīyanti na saṅkīyissanti,
atk-s0102a:1461_5: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi; evaṃ imassāpi
atk-s0102a:1461_6: ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Kasmāti
atk-s0102a:1461_7: ce, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ. Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū “ayaṃ kira
atk-s0102a:1461_8: maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ, vācāvippalāpabhūtaṃ paridevaṃ, kāyikaasātabhūtaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_9: dukkhaṃ, cetasikaasātabhūtaṃ domanassanti cattāro upaddave hanati, visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_10: nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_11: dhāretabbaṃ, vācetabbaṃ, imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissanti. Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_12: ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Kambalavāṇijādayo kambalādīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0102a:1462_1: asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti. Kesakambalavāḷakambalādayopi hi duggandhā
atk-s0102a:1462_2: kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti. Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo
atk-s0102a:1462_3: ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti, tadā ye pahonti, te gaṇhanti. Ye nappahonti,
atk-s0102a:1462_4: tepi dassanakāmā honti; evameva ‘ekāyano, bhikkhave, ayaṃ maggo’ti vuttepi asukamaggoti
atk-s0102a:1462_5: na tāva pākaṭo hoti. Nānappakārakā hi aniyyānikamaggāpi maggātveva vuccanti. “Sattānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_6: visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati, tayo visese
atk-s0102a:1462_7: āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ
atk-s0102a:1462_8: vācetabbaṃ, imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1463_0: Yadidanti nipāto, ye imeti ayamassa attho. Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena na tato
atk-s0102a:1463_1: heṭṭhā, na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā
atk-s0102a:1463_2: satigocaropi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0102a:1463_3: “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha…pe…
atk-s0102a:1463_4: ko ca, bhikkhave, kāyassa samudayo. Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro
atk-s0102a:1463_5: satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati. Tathā “kāyo upaṭṭhānaṃ no sati, sati pana upaṭṭhānañceva
atk-s0102a:1463_6: sati cā”tiādīsupi. Tassattho – patiṭṭhāti asminti paṭṭhānaṃ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati.
atk-s0102a:1463_7: Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, padhānaṃ ṭhānanti vā paṭṭhānaṃ. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1464_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsituṃ arahatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1464_1: ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0102a:1464_2: vuttā. Tassattho – paṭṭhapetabbato paṭṭhānaṃ, pavattayitabbatoti attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabbatoti?
atk-s0102a:1464_3: Satiyā. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
atk-s0102a:1464_4: satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva “satipaṭṭhānaṃ”ti vuccati. Tassattho
atk-s0102a:1464_5: – paṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti
atk-s0102a:1464_6: attho. Satiyeva satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1464_7: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānaṃ cātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Idamidhādhippetaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1465_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “satipaṭṭhānā”ti bahuvacanaṃ? Satibahuttā. Ārammaṇabhedena hi bahukā
atk-s0102a:1465_1: etā satiyo. Atha maggoti kasmā ekavacanaṃ? Maggaṭṭhena ekattā. Catassopi hi etā satiyo
atk-s0102a:1465_2: maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0102a:1465_3: Nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena cā”ti. Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0102a:1465_4: kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti, ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi maggiyanti,
atk-s0102a:1465_5: tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuccanti. Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva
atk-s0102a:1465_6: desanā hoti, “mārasenappamaddanaṃ, vo bhikkhave, maggaṃ desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha…pe…
atk-s0102a:1465_7: katamo ca, bhikkhave, mārasenappamaddano maggo? Yadidaṃ satta bojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0102a:1465_8: Yathā mārasenappamaddanoti ca, satta bojjhaṅgāti ca atthato ekaṃ, byañjanamevettha
atk-s0102a:1465_9: nānaṃ. Evaṃ “ekāyanamaggo”ti ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti ca atthato ekaṃ, byañjanamevettha
atk-s0102a:1465_10: nānaṃ, tasmā maggaṭṭhena ekattā ekavacanaṃ. Ārammaṇabhedena satibahuttā bahuvacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1466_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti? Veneyyahitattā.
atk-s0102a:1466_2: dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1466_4: mandassa nātippabhedagataṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa atippabhedagataṃ
atk-s0102a:1466_5: dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo. Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena
atk-s0102a:1466_6: adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa oḷārikārammaṇe
atk-s0102a:1466_7: asaṇṭhahanato dutiyaṃ. Vipassanāyānikassapi mandassa nātippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ tatiyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1466_8: tikkhassa atippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ catutthaṃ. Iti cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
atk-s0102a:1467_0: Subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ vā. Kāyo hi asubho, tattha ca subhavipallāsavipallatthā
atk-s0102a:1467_1: sattā. Tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0102a:1467_2: satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0102a:1467_3: cittaṃ aniccaṃ, dhammā anattā, tesu ca sukhaniccaattavipallāsavipallatthā sattā.
atk-s0102a:1467_4: Tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti
atk-s0102a:1467_5: evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti
atk-s0102a:1467_6: veditabbā. Na kevalañca vipallāsappahānatthameva, atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi
atk-s0102a:1467_7: catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāva pakaraṇanayo.
atk-s0102a:1468_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1468_1: ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ. Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā
atk-s0102a:1468_2: pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti, dakkhiṇato.
atk-s0102a:1468_3: Pacchimato. Uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena
atk-s0102a:1468_4: nagarameva pavisanti; evaṃ – sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nagaraṃ viya hi nibbānamahānagaraṃ,
atk-s0102a:1468_5: dvāraṃ viya aṭṭhaṅgiko lokuttaramaggo, pācīnadisādayo viya kāyādayo.
atk-s0102a:1469_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva
atk-s0102a:1469_1: pavisanti, evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0102a:1469_2: kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti. Yathā
atk-s0102a:1469_3: dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇāya disāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena
atk-s0102a:1469_4: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1469_5: bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti.
atk-s0102a:1469_6: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena
atk-s0102a:1469_7: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1469_8: bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti.
atk-s0102a:1469_9: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva
atk-s0102a:1469_10: pavisanti, evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0102a:1469_11: dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti. Evaṃ
atk-s0102a:1469_12: saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena
atk-s0102a:1470_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatā pucchā. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Bhikkhaveti dhammapaṭiggāhakapuggalālapanametaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1470_1: Bhikkhūti paṭipattisampādakapuggalanidassanametaṃ. Aññepi ca devamanussā paṭipattiṃ
atk-s0102a:1470_2: sampādentiyeva, seṭṭhattā pana paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1470_3: Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho, sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā
atk-s0102a:1470_4: bhājanabhāvato. Tasmā seṭṭhattā “bhikkhū”ti āha. Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva
atk-s0102a:1470_5: honti, rājagamanādīsu rājaggahaṇena sesaparisā viya. Yo ca imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0102a:1470_6: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha. Paṭipannako
atk-s0102a:1470_7: hi devo vā hotu manusso vā, bhikkhūti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatiyeva yathāha –
atk-s0102a:1474: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1475_0: Kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena
atk-s0102a:1475_1: hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto. Yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena, evaṃ kucchitānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1475_2: āyaṭṭhena. Kucchitānañhi paramajegucchānaṃ so āyotipi kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Tatthāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1475_3: vacanattho. Āyanti tatoti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ āyoti kāyo.
atk-s0102a:1476_0: Kāyānupassīti kāye anupassanasīlo kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno. Kāyeti ca vatvāpi puna kāyānupassīti
atk-s0102a:1476_2: Tena na kāye vedanānupassī vā, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti
atk-s0102a:1476_3: kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1476_4: dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavinimuttaekadhammānupassī, nāpi kesalomādivinimuttaitthipurisānupassī,
atk-s0102a:1476_5: yopi cettha kesalomādiko bhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhāto kāyo, tatthapi na bhūtupādāyavinimuttaekadhammānupassī,
atk-s0102a:1476_6: atha kho rathasambhārānupassako viya aṅgapaccaṅgasamūhānupassī, nagarāvayavānupassako
atk-s0102a:1476_8: viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0102a:1476_9: vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti. Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto
atk-s0102a:1476_10: kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati, yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva
atk-s0102a:1476_11: pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0102a:1477: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0102a:1478: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1479_0: Ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthanti vuttaṃ, ādisaddena cettha ayampi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1479_1: Ayañhi etasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassīyeva, na añña dhammānupassīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā anudakabhūtāyapi
atk-s0102a:1479_2: marīciyā udakānupassino honti, na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye
atk-s0102a:1479_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yvāyaṃ parato “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā…pe… so
atk-s0102a:1479_6: yo ca “idhekacco pathavīkāyaṃ aniccato anupassati, āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1479_7: lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ cammakāyaṃ maṃsakāyaṃ rudhirakāyaṃ nhārukāyaṃ aṭṭhikāyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti
atk-s0102a:1479_8: paṭisambhidāyaṃ kāyo vutto, tassa sabbassa imasmiññeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti
atk-s0102a:1480_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato,
atk-s0102a:1480_1: tassa tasseva pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti
atk-s0102a:1481_0: Apica “imasmiṃ kāye aniccato anupassati, no niccato”tiādinā anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1481_1: āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa kāyassa anupassanatopi
atk-s0102a:1481_2: kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0102a:1481_3: paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena
atk-s0102a:1481_4: aniccato anupassati, no niccato. Dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato. Anattato anupassati,
atk-s0102a:1481_5: no attato. Nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no rajjati, nirodheti. No samudeti,
atk-s0102a:1481_6: paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato
atk-s0102a:1481_7: anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto
atk-s0102a:1481_8: nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto
atk-s0102a:1482_0: Viharatīti iriyati. Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo, vīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1482_1: Ātāpo assa atthīti ātāpī. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti
atk-s0102a:1482_2: kāyapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0102a:1482_3: paññāya anupassati, na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi, tenevāha – “satiñca
atk-s0102a:1482_4: khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti. Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1482_5: ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo
atk-s0102a:1482_6: antarāyakaro hoti, asampajāno upāyapariggahe anupāyaparivajjane ca sammuyhati, muṭṭhassati
atk-s0102a:1482_7: upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti, tenassa taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0102a:1482_8: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati, tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno
atk-s0102a:1483_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0102a:1483_1: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
atk-s0102a:1483_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi tasmiññeva kāye. Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti
atk-s0102a:1483_3: adhippeto. Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati, vedanādīsupi
atk-s0102a:1483_4: pahīyatiyeva. Tasmā pañcapi upādānakkhandhā lokoti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ. Lokasaṅkhātattā
atk-s0102a:1483_5: vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panāha – “tattha katamo loko?
atk-s0102a:1483_6: Sveva kāyo loko”ti, ayamevettha attho. Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ
atk-s0102a:1483_7: sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā panettha abhijjhāggahaṇena kāmacchando, domanassaggahaṇena
atk-s0102a:1484_0: Visesena cettha abhijjhāvinayena kāyasampattimūlakassa anurodhassa, domanassavinayena
atk-s0102a:1484_1: kāyavipattimūlakassa virodhassa, abhijjhāvinayena ca kāye abhiratiyā, domanassavinayena
atk-s0102a:1484_2: kāyabhāvanāya anabhiratiyā, abhijjhāvinayena kāye abhūtānaṃ subhasukhabhāvādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1484_3: pakkhepassa, domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca
atk-s0102a:1484_4: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti. Yogānubhāvo
atk-s0102a:1484_5: hi esa, yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito
atk-s0102a:1484_6: ca hoti. Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca
atk-s0102a:1485_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. “Viharatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1485_1: ettha vuttavihārena kammaṭṭhānikassa kāyapariharaṇaṃ, “ātāpī”tiādīsu pana ātāpena
atk-s0102a:1485_3: vā. Satiyā vā kāyānupassanāvasena paṭiladdhasamatho, sampajaññena vipassanā abhijjhādomanassavinayena
atk-s0102a:1486_0: Vibhaṅge pana anupassīti tattha “katamā anupassanā? Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo
atk-s0102a:1486_1: dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_2: vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā
atk-s0102a:1486_3: paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto
atk-s0102a:1486_4: paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi, ayaṃ vuccati anupassanā. Imāya anupassanāya
atk-s0102a:1486_5: upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samannāgato, tena vuccati anupassīti.
atk-s0102a:1486_6: Viharatīti iriyati pavattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati, tena vuccati viharatīti.
atk-s0102a:1486_7: Ātāpīti tattha katamaṃ ātāpaṃ? Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikammo parakkamo uyyāmo
atk-s0102a:1486_8: vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittaddandatā anikkhittadhuratā
atk-s0102a:1486_9: dhurasampaggāhī vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ sammāvāyāmo, idaṃ vuccati ātāpaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1486_10: Iminā ātāpena upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato, tena vuccati ātāpīti. Sampajānoti tattha
atk-s0102a:1486_11: katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā
atk-s0102a:1486_12: paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā
atk-s0102a:1486_13: pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_14: paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi,
atk-s0102a:1486_15: idaṃ vuccati sampajaññaṃ. Iminā sampajaññena upeto hoti …pe… samannāgato, tena vuccati
atk-s0102a:1486_16: sampajānoti. Satimāti tattha katamā sati? Yā sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā
atk-s0102a:1486_17: dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammusanatā sati satindriyaṃ satibalaṃ sammāsati, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0102a:1486_18: sati. Imāya satiyā upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato, tena vuccati satimāti.
atk-s0102a:1487_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko? Sveva kāyo loko. Pañcapi upādānakkhandhā
atk-s0102a:1487_1: loko, ayaṃ vuccati loko. Tattha katamā abhijjhā? Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho
atk-s0102a:1487_2: nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo, ayaṃ vuccati abhijjhā. Tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ?
atk-s0102a:1487_3: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā, idaṃ
atk-s0102a:1487_4: vuccati domanassaṃ. Iti ayañca abhijjhā, idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti
atk-s0102a:1487_5: paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasamitā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā
atk-s0102a:1487_6: visositā byantīkatā, tena vuccati vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti.
atk-s0102a:1488: Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho vutto. Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati, evaṃ veditabbo. Ayaṃ tāva kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānuddesassa atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0102a:1489_0: Idāni vedanāsu. Citte. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati…pe… vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti
atk-s0102a:1489_1: ettha vedanāsu vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1489_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vedanāsu vedanānupassī. Citte cittānupassī. Dhammesu dhammānupassīti
atk-s0102a:1489_3: ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā, tā ca lokiyā eva. Cittampi lokiyaṃ, tathā dhammā.
atk-s0102a:1489_4: Tesaṃ vibhāgo niddesavāre pākaṭo bhavissati. Kevalaṃ panidha yathā vedanā anupassitabbā,
atk-s0102a:1489_5: tathā tā anupassanto “vedanāsu vedanānupassī”ti veditabbo. Esa nayo cittadhammesupi.
atk-s0102a:1489_6: Kathañca vedanā anupassitabbāti? Sukhā tāva vedanā dukkhato, dukkhā sallato, adukkhamasukhā aniccato. Yathāha –
atk-s0102a:1492: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1493_0: Sabbā eva cetā “dukkhā”tipi anupassitabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0102a:1493_1: dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti. Sukhadukkhatopi ca anupassitabbā. Yathāha “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā
atk-s0102a:1494_3: āgatasantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Kāmañcettha yassa
atk-s0102a:1494_4: kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ, tassa vedanādīsupi taṃ pahīnameva.
atk-s0102a:1494_6: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti, tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi
atk-s0102a:1497_1: upakaraṇāni kattukāmo ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0102a:1497_2: gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya, evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya
atk-s0102a:1497_3: sattānaṃ anekappakāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0102a:1497_4: Katame cattāro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0102a:1497_5: ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kāyaṃ vibhajanto
atk-s0102a:1498_0: Tattha kathañcātiādi vitthāretukamyatāpucchā. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:1498_1: kena ca pakārena bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti? Esa nayo sabbapucchāvāresu.
atk-s0102a:1498_2: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhūti bhikkhave imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. Ayañhettha idhasaddo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa
atk-s0102a:1498_4: Vuttañhetaṃ “idheva bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1499_0: Araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vāti idamassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1499_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ
atk-s0102a:1499_2: otarituṃ na icchati, kūṭagoṇayuttaratho viya uppathameva dhāvati. Tasmā seyyathāpi
atk-s0102a:1499_3: nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0102a:1499_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya. Athassa
atk-s0102a:1499_5: so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya
atk-s0102a:1499_6: vā upanipajjeyya vā, evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0102a:1499_7: duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ
atk-s0102a:1499_8: vā pavisitvā tattha satipaṭṭhānārammaṇatthambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ. Evamassa
atk-s0102a:1499_9: taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ
atk-s0102a:1499_10: chinditvā palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva
atk-s0102a:1500: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0102a:1502: Evamassetaṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanānurūpaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “idamassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpana”nti.
atk-s0102a:1503_0: Apica yasmā idaṃ kāyānupassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1503_2: na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ, saddakaṇḍakattā jhānassa. Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena
atk-s0102a:1503_3: idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0102a:1503_4: katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, tasmāssa anurūpasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1504_0: Vatthuvijjācariyo viya hi bhagavā. So yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā
atk-s0102a:1504_1: suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati, sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite
atk-s0102a:1504_2: rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati, evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā
atk-s0102a:1504_4: yoginā anukkamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0102a:1505_0: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu dīpisadisoti vuccati. Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1505_1: vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo
atk-s0102a:1505_2: mige gaṇhāti, evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena
atk-s0102a:1505_3: cattāro magge ceva cattāri ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhāti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0102a:1509_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1509_1: Ito paraṃ imasmiṃ ānāpānapabbe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. Seyyathāpi,
atk-s0102a:1509_2: bhikkhave, dakkho bhamakāro vāti idañhi upamāmattameva iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāyeti idaṃ
atk-s0102a:1509_3: appanāmattameva ca tattha anāgataṃ, sesaṃ āgatameva.
atk-s0102a:1510_0: Yaṃ pana anāgataṃ, tattha dakkhoti cheko. Dīghaṃ vā añchantoti mahantānaṃ bherīpokkharādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1510_1: likhanakāle hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā dīghaṃ kaḍḍhanto. Rassaṃ vā añchantoti khuddakānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1510_2: dantasūcivedhakādīnaṃ likhanakāle mandamandaṃ rassaṃ kaḍḍhanto. Evameva khoti evaṃ
atk-s0102a:1510_3: ayampi bhikkhu addhānavasena ittaravasena ca pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ
atk-s0102a:1510_4: vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe… passasissāmīti sikkhatīti. Tassevaṃ sikkhato
atk-s0102a:1510_5: assāsapassāsanimitte cattāri jhānāni uppajjanti, so jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāse
atk-s0102a:1511_0: Tattha assāsapassāsakammiko “ime assāsapassāsā kiṃ nissitā? Vatthunissitā. Vatthu
atk-s0102a:1511_1: nāma karajakāyo, karajakāyo nāma cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañce”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1511_2: Tato tadārammaṇe phassapañcamake nāmanti. Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tassa paccayaṃ
atk-s0102a:1511_4: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0102a:1511_5: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1512_0: Jhānakammikopi “imāni jhānaṅgāni kiṃ nissitāni, vatthunissitāni, vatthu nāma karajakāyo
atk-s0102a:1512_1: jhānaṅgāni nāmaṃ, karajakāyo rūpa”nti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0102a:1512_3: puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1512_4: vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Idamekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1513_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā assāsapassāsakāye kāyānupassī viharati. Bahiddhā
atk-s0102a:1513_1: vāti parassa vā assāsapassāsakāye. Ajjhattabahiddhā vāti kālena attano, kālena parassa
atk-s0102a:1513_2: assāsapassāsakāye. Etenassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapetvā aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo
atk-s0102a:1513_3: kathito. Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0102a:1514_0: Samudayadhammānupassī vāti yathā nāma kammārassa bhastañca gaggaranāḷiñca tajjañca
atk-s0102a:1514_1: vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto aparāparaṃ sañcarati, evaṃ bhikkhuno karajakāyañca nāsapuṭañca
atk-s0102a:1514_2: cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsakāyo aparāparaṃ sañcarati. Kāyādayo dhammā samudayadhammā,
atk-s0102a:1514_3: te passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati. Vayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1514_4: vāti yathā bhastāya apanītāya gaggaranāḷiyā bhinnāya tajje ca vāyāme asati so vāto
atk-s0102a:1514_5: nappavattati, evameva kāye bhinne nāsapuṭe viddhaste citte ca niruddhe assāsapassāsakāyo
atk-s0102a:1514_6: nāma nappavattatīti kāyādinirodhā assāsapassāsanirodhoti evaṃ passanto “vayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1514_7: vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati. Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti kālena samudayaṃ
atk-s0102a:1514_8: kālena vayaṃ anupassanto. Atthi kāyoti vā panassāti kāyova atthi, na satto, na puggalo,
atk-s0102a:1514_9: na itthī, na puriso, na attā, na attaniyaṃ, nāhaṃ, na mama, na koci, na kassacīti
atk-s0102a:1515_0: Yāvadevāti payojanaparicchedavavatthāpanametaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā sā sati paccupaṭṭhitā
atk-s0102a:1515_1: hoti, sā na aññadatthāya. Atha kho yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya aparāparaṃ uttaruttari ñāṇapamāṇatthāya
atk-s0102a:1515_2: ceva satipamāṇatthāya ca, satisampajaññānaṃ vuḍḍhatthāyāti attho. Anissito ca viharatīti
atk-s0102a:1515_3: taṇhānissayadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ vasena anissitova viharati. Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti
atk-s0102a:1515_4: lokasmiṃ kiñci rūpaṃ vā…pe… viññāṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ me attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1515_5: Evampīti upari atthaṃ upādāya sampiṇḍanattho pi-kāro. Iminā pana padena bhagavā ānāpānapabbadesanaṃ niyyātetvā dasseti.
atk-s0102a:1516_0: Tattha assāsapassāsapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccaṃ, tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
atk-s0102a:1516_1: samudayasaccaṃ ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, dukkhaparijānano samudayapajahano
atk-s0102a:1516_2: nirodhārammaṇo ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ. Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0102a:1516_3: idamekassa assāsapassāsavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1519_0: 375. Evaṃ assāsapassāsavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni iriyāpathavasena vibhajituṃ
atk-s0102a:1519_1: puna caparantiādimāha. Tattha kāmaṃ soṇasiṅgālādayopi gacchantā “gacchāmā”ti jānanti,
atk-s0102a:1519_2: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evarūpañhi jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ na
atk-s0102a:1519_3: pajahati, attasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1519_4: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati, attasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti kammaṭṭhānañceva
atk-s0102a:1519_5: satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti. Idañhi “ko gacchati, kassa gamanaṃ, kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1519_6: evaṃ sampajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0102a:1520_0: Tattha ko gacchatīti? Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati. Kassa gamananti? Na kassaci
atk-s0102a:1520_1: sattassa vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatīti? Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-s0102a:1520_2: gacchati. Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti – “gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ vāyaṃ janeti,
atk-s0102a:1520_3: vāyo viññattiṃ janeti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro
atk-s0102a:1521_0: Tatrāpi hi “tiṭṭhāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ vāyaṃ janeti, vāyo viññattiṃ janeti,
atk-s0102a:1521_1: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti
atk-s0102a:1521_2: vuccati. “Nisīdāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ vāyaṃ janeti, vāyo viññattiṃ janeti,
atk-s0102a:1521_4: nisajjāti vuccati. “Sayāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ vāyaṃ janeti, vāyo viññattiṃ
atk-s0102a:1521_5: janeti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalasarīrassa tiriyato pasāraṇaṃ sayananti vuccatīti.
atk-s0102a:1522_0: Tassa evaṃ pajānato evaṃ hoti “satto gacchati, satto tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati, atthato
atk-s0102a:1522_1: pana koci satto gacchanto vā ṭhito vā natthi. Yathā pana “sakaṭaṃ gacchati, sakaṭaṃ
atk-s0102a:1522_2: tiṭṭhatī”ti vuccati, na ca kiñci sakaṭaṃ nāma gacchantaṃ vā ṭhitaṃ vā atthi, cattāro
atk-s0102a:1522_3: pana goṇe yojetvā chekamhi sārathimhi pājente “sakaṭaṃ gacchati, sakaṭaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1522_4: vohāramattameva hoti, evameva ajānanaṭṭhena sakaṭaṃ viya kāyo, goṇā viya cittajavātā,
atk-s0102a:1522_5: sārathi viya cittaṃ. “Gacchāmi tiṭṭhāmī”ti citte uppanne vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā
atk-s0102a:1522_6: uppajjati, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena gamanādīni pavattanti, tato “satto gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1522_7: satto tiṭṭhati, ahaṃ gacchāmi, ahaṃ tiṭṭhāmī”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0102a:1524: Yathā yāti tathā kāyo, yāti vātāhato ayaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1527: Ko nāma ettha so satto, yo vinā hetupaccaye;
atk-s0102a:1528: Attano ānubhāvena, tiṭṭhe vā yadi vā vaje”ti.
atk-s0102a:1529: Tasmā evaṃ hetupaccayavaseneva pavattāni gamanādīni sallakkhento esa “gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito vā, nisinno vā, sayāno vā sayānomhīti pajānātī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1530_0: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti, tathā tathā naṃ pajānātīti sabbasaṅgāhikavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1530_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena yena vā ākārenassa kāyo ṭhito hoti, tena tena naṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1530_2: Gamanākārena ṭhitaṃ gacchatīti pajānāti. Ṭhānanisajjasayanākārena ṭhitaṃ sayānoti pajānātīti.
atk-s0102a:1531_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1531_1: Bahiddhā vāti parassa vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena. Ajjhattabahiddhā vāti kālena
atk-s0102a:1531_2: attano, kālena parassa catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati. Samudayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1531_3: vātiādīsu pana avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayotiādinā nayena pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa
atk-s0102a:1531_4: samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo. Tañhi sandhāya idha “samudayadhammānupassī vā”tiādi
atk-s0102a:1531_5: vuttaṃ. Atthi kāyoti vā panassātiādi vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0102a:1532_0: Idhāpi catuiriyāpathapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccaṃ, tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
atk-s0102a:1532_1: samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, dukkhaparijānano samudayapajahano
atk-s0102a:1532_2: nirodhārammaṇo ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ. Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0102a:1532_3: idamekassa catuiriyāpathapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1535_0: 376. Evaṃ iriyāpathavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusampajaññavasena vibhajituṃ
atk-s0102a:1535_1: puna caparantiādimāha. Tattha abhikkantetiādīni sāmaññaphale vaṇṇitāni. Iti ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0102a:1535_2: vāti evaṃ catusampajaññapariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye, parassa vā kāye, kālena vā
atk-s0102a:1535_3: attano, kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati. Idhāpi samudayavayadhammānupassītiādīsu
atk-s0102a:1535_4: rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo. Sesaṃ vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0102a:1536_0: Idha catusampajaññapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccaṃ, tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
atk-s0102a:1536_1: samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, vuttappakāro ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1536_2: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catusampajaññapariggāhakassa
atk-s0102a:1539_0: 377. Evaṃ catusampajaññavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni paṭikūlamanasikāravasena
atk-s0102a:1539_1: vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha. Tattha imameva kāyantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1539_2: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena vitthārato visuddhimagge kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ. Ubhatomukhāti
atk-s0102a:1539_3: heṭṭhā ca upari cāti dvīhi mukhehi yuttā. Nānāvihitassāti nānāvidhassa.
atk-s0102a:1540_0: Idaṃ panettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ – ubhatomukhā putoḷi viya hi cātumahābhūtiko kāyo,
atk-s0102a:1540_1: tattha missetvā pakkhittanānāvidhadhaññaṃ viya kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā, cakkhumā puriso
atk-s0102a:1540_2: viya yogāvacaro, tassa taṃ putoḷiṃ muñcitvā paccavekkhato nānāvidhadhaññassa pākaṭakālo
atk-s0102a:1540_3: viya yogino dvattiṃsākārassa vibhūtakālo veditabbo. Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ kesādipariggaṇhanena
atk-s0102a:1540_4: attano vā kāye, parassa vā kāye, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī
atk-s0102a:1540_5: viharati. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva. Kevalañhi idha dvattiṃsākārapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti
atk-s0102a:1540_6: evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0102a:1543_0: 378. Evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhātumanasikāravasena
atk-s0102a:1543_1: vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha. Tatthāyaṃ opammasaṃsandanena saddhiṃ atthavaṇṇanā
atk-s0102a:1543_2: – yathā koci goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ vadhitvā
atk-s0102a:1543_3: vinivijjhitvā catasso disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe
atk-s0102a:1543_4: koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa, evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena
atk-s0102a:1543_5: kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ, yathāṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ “atthi
atk-s0102a:1543_6: imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu…pe… vāyodhātū”ti evaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0102a:1544_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassāpi āghātanaṃ āharantassāpi āharitvā
atk-s0102a:1544_1: tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassapi vadhentassāpi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassāpi tāvadeva
atk-s0102a:1544_2: gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati, yāva naṃ padāletvā bilaso na vibhajati. Vibhajitvā
atk-s0102a:1544_3: nisinnassa panassa gāvīti saññā antaradhāyati, maṃsasaññā pavattati. Nāssa evaṃ hoti
atk-s0102a:1544_4: – “ahaṃ gāviṃ vikkiṇāmi, ime gāviṃ harantī”ti. Atha khvassa “ahaṃ maṃsaṃ vikkiṇāmi,
atk-s0102a:1544_5: ime maṃsaṃ haranti” cceva hoti; evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle
atk-s0102a:1544_6: gihibhūtassāpi pabbajitassāpi tāvadeva sattoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1544_7: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
atk-s0102a:1544_8: Dhātuso paccavekkhato panassa sattasaññā antaradhāyati, dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0102a:1544_9: Tenāha bhagavā – “‘imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati
atk-s0102a:1544_10: ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0102a:1544_11: dakkho goghātako vā…pe… vāyodhātū”ti. Goghātako viya hi yogī, gāvīti saññā viya sattasaññā,
atk-s0102a:1544_12: catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpatho, bilaso vibhajitvā nisinnabhāvo viya dhātuso paccavekkhaṇanti
atk-s0102a:1544_13: ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā. Kammaṭṭhānakathā pana visuddhimagge vitthāritā.
atk-s0102a:1545_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catudhātupariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye, parassa vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1545_1: kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0102a:1545_2: Kevalañhi idha catudhātupariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1548_0: 379. Evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni navahi sivathikapabbehi
atk-s0102a:1548_1: vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha. Tattha seyyathāpi passeyyāti yathā passeyya. Sarīranti
atk-s0102a:1548_2: matasarīraṃ. Sivathikāya chaḍḍitanti susāne apaviddhaṃ. Ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ekāhamataṃ.
atk-s0102a:1548_3: Dvīhaṃ matassa assāti dvīhamataṃ. Tīhaṃ matassa assāti tīhamataṃ. Kammārabhastā viya
atk-s0102a:1548_4: vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā
atk-s0102a:1548_5: uddhumātaṃ, uddhumātameva uddhumātakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti uddhumātakaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1548_6: Vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnavaṇṇaṃ, vinīlameva vinīlakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ
atk-s0102a:1548_7: vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa
atk-s0102a:1548_8: yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhānesu nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1548_9: Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi vissandamānapubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva
atk-s0102a:1548_10: vipubbakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ. Vipubbakaṃ jātaṃ tathābhāvaṃ
atk-s0102a:1549_0: So imameva kāyanti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati
atk-s0102a:1549_1: upaneti. Kathaṃ? Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0102a:1549_2: hoti – āyu, usmā, viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo
atk-s0102a:1549_3: hoti, imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyeva, evaṃbhāvī
atk-s0102a:1549_4: evaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissati, evaṃanatīto evaṃ uddhumātādibhāvaṃ anatikkantoti.
atk-s0102a:1549_5: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ uddhumātādipariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye, parassa vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1549_6: kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1550_0: Khajjamānanti udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsaakkhikūṭādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā
atk-s0102a:1550_2: maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nimaṃsalohitamakkhita”nti.
atk-s0102a:1550_3: Aññenāti aññena disābhāgena. Hatthaṭṭhikanti catusaṭṭhibhedampi hatthaṭṭhikaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-s0102a:1551_0: Terovassikānīti atikkantasaṃvaccharāni. Pūtīnīti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena
atk-s0102a:1551_1: terovassikāneva pūtīni honti, antobhūmigatāni pana cirataraṃ tiṭṭhanti. Cuṇṇakajātānīti
atk-s0102a:1551_2: cuṇṇaṃ cuṇṇaṃ hutvā vippakiṇṇāni. Sabbattha so imamevāti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1551_3: vasena yojanā kātabbā. Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ khajjamānādipariggaṇhanena yāva cuṇṇakabhāvā
atk-s0102a:1551_4: attano vā kāye, parassa vā kāye kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1552_0: Idha pana ṭhatvā navasivathikā samodhānetabbā. Ekāhamataṃ vāti hi ādinā nayena vuttā
atk-s0102a:1552_1: sabbāpi ekā, kākehi vā khajjamānantiādikā ekā, aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsalohitaṃ
atk-s0102a:1552_2: nhārusambandhanti ekā, nimaṃsalohitamakkhitaṃ nhārusambandhanti ekā, apagatamaṃsalohitaṃ
atk-s0102a:1552_3: nhārusambandhanti ekā, aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhānītiādikā ekā aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇapaṭibhāgānīti
atk-s0102a:1552_4: ekā, puñjakitāni terovassikānīti ekā, pūtīni cuṇṇakajātānīti ekāti.
atk-s0102a:1553_0: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhaveti idaṃ navasivathikā dassetvā kāyānupassanaṃ niṭṭhapento āha.
atk-s0102a:1553_1: Tattha navasivathikapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccaṃ, tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
atk-s0102a:1553_2: samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, dukkhaparijānano samudayapajahano
atk-s0102a:1553_3: nirodhārammaṇo ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ. Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0102a:1553_4: idaṃ navasivathikapariggāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1555_0: Ettāvatā ca ānāpānapabbaṃ, iriyāpathapabbaṃ, catusampajaññapabbaṃ, paṭikūlamanasikārapabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1555_2: hoti. Tattha ānāpānapabbaṃ, paṭikūlamanasikārapabbanti imāneva dve appanākammaṭṭhānāni,
atk-s0102a:1555_3: sivathikānaṃ pana ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā sesāni dvādasāpi upacārakammaṭṭhānānevāti.
atk-s0102a:1558_0: 380. Evaṃ bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni navavidhena
atk-s0102a:1558_1: vedanānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ
atk-s0102a:1558_2: vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānātīti
atk-s0102a:1558_3: attho. Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā “sukhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1558_4: vedanaṃ vedayāmā”ti pajānanti, na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evarūpañhi
atk-s0102a:1558_5: jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ na jahati, attasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā
atk-s0102a:1558_6: vā na hoti. Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ jahati, attasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti,
atk-s0102a:1558_7: kammaṭṭhānañceva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti. Idañhi “ko vedayati, kassa vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1558_8: kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1559_0: Tattha ko vedayatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati. Kassa vedanāti na kassaci
atk-s0102a:1559_1: sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā. Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti vatthuārammaṇāva panassa vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1559_2: tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati
atk-s0102a:1559_3: taṃ pana vedanāya pavattiṃ upādāya’ahaṃ vedayāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti. Evaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-s0102a:1559_4: ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”ti
atk-s0102a:1560_0: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati, tameko
atk-s0102a:1560_1: daharo āha – “kataraṃ vo, bhante, ṭhānaṃ rujjatī”ti. Āvuso, pāṭiyekkaṃ rujjanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1560_2: nāma natthi, vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti. Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0102a:1560_3: adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no, bhante,ti. Adhivāsemi, āvusoti. Adhivāsanā, bhante, seyyoti.
atk-s0102a:1560_4: Thero adhivāsesi. Vāto yāva hadayā phālesi, mañcake antāni rāsikatāni ahesuṃ. Thero
atk-s0102a:1560_5: daharassa dassesi “vaṭṭatāvuso, ettakā adhivāsanā”ti. Daharo tuṇhī ahosi. Thero vīriyasamataṃ
atk-s0102a:1560_6: yojetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:1561_0: Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe… nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “nirāmisaṃ
atk-s0102a:1561_1: adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti. Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0102a:1561_2: arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento yasmā phassavasena cittavasena vā kathiyamānaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0102a:1561_3: na hoti, andhakāraṃ viya khāyati, vedanānaṃ pana uppattipākaṭatāya vedanāvasena pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0102a:1561_4: hoti, tasmā sakkapañhe viya idhāpi vedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Tattha
atk-s0102a:1562_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo, sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti
atk-s0102a:1562_1: pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhavedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1562_2: vedanaṃyeva vedayāmī”ti pajānāti. Tena yā pubbe bhūtapubbā dukkhavedanā, tassa idāni
atk-s0102a:1562_3: abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā
atk-s0102a:1562_4: vipariṇāmadhammā, itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0102a:1563_0: “Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1563_1: vedeti, na adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, sukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti.
atk-s0102a:1563_2: Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye dukkhaṃ…pe… adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:1563_3: samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, adukkhamasukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:1563_4: samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Sukhāpi, kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā
atk-s0102a:1563_5: khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā. Dukkhāpi, kho…pe… adukkhamasukhāpi
atk-s0102a:1563_6: kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā…pe… nirodhadhammā. Evaṃ passaṃ, aggivessana, sutavā
atk-s0102a:1563_7: ariyasāvako sukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, dukkhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, adukkhamasukhāyapi
atk-s0102a:1563_8: vedanāya nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimuttamī’ti
atk-s0102a:1563_9: ñāṇaṃ hoti, ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1564_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisasannissitā cha gehasitasomanassavedanā.
atk-s0102a:1564_1: Nirāmisā sukhā nāma cha nekkhammasitasomanassavedanā. Sāmisā dukkhā nāma cha gehasitadomanassavedanā.
atk-s0102a:1564_2: Nirāmisā dukkhā nāma cha nekkhammasitadomanassavedanā. Sāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma
atk-s0102a:1564_3: cha gehasitaupekkhāvedanā. Nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma cha nekkhammasitaupekkhāvedanā.
atk-s0102a:1565_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sukhavedanādipariggaṇhanena attano vā vedanāsu, parassa vā
atk-s0102a:1565_1: vedanāsu, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati. Samudayavayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1565_2: vāti ettha pana avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayotiādīhi pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi vedanānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1565_3: samudayañca vayañca passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharati, vayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1565_4: vā vedanāsu viharati, kālena samudayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu, kālena vayadhammānupassī
atk-s0102a:1565_5: vā vedanāsu viharatī”ti veditabbo. Ito paraṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayameva. Kevalañhi
atk-s0102a:1565_6: idha vedanāpariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā vedanāpariggāhakassa
atk-s0102a:1568_0: 381. Evaṃ navavidhena vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1568_1: kathetuṃ kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sarāganti aṭṭhavidhalobhasahagataṃ.
atk-s0102a:1568_2: Vītarāganti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ. Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1568_3: tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati. Sesāni cattāri akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ
atk-s0102a:1568_4: na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti. Sadosanti duvidhadomanassasahagataṃ. Vītadosanti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ.
atk-s0102a:1568_5: Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti. Samohanti
atk-s0102a:1568_6: vicikicchāsahagatañceva, uddhaccasahagatañcāti duvidhaṃ. Yasmā pana moho sabbākusalesu
atk-s0102a:1568_7: uppajjati, tasmā sesānipi idha vaṭṭantiyeva. Imasmiññeva hi duke dvādasākusalacittāni
atk-s0102a:1568_9: Etañhi saṅkuṭitacittaṃ nāma. Vikkhittanti uddhaccasahagataṃ, etañhi pasaṭacittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:1569_0: Mahaggatanti rūpārūpāvacaraṃ. Amahaggatanti kāmāvacaraṃ. Sauttaranti kāmāvacaraṃ.
atk-s0102a:1569_1: Anuttaranti rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca. Tatrāpi sauttaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, anuttaraṃ
atk-s0102a:1569_2: arūpāvacarameva. Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi upacārasamādhi vā atthi. Asamāhitanti
atk-s0102a:1570_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sarāgādipariggaṇhanena yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0102a:1570_1: pavattati, taṃ taṃ sallakkhento attano vā citte, parassa vā citte, kālena vā attano,
atk-s0102a:1570_2: kālena vā parassa citte cittānupassī viharati. Samudayavayadhammānupassīti ettha
atk-s0102a:1570_3: pana avijjāsamudayā viññāṇasamudayoti evaṃ pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi viññāṇassa samudayo
atk-s0102a:1570_4: ca vayo ca nīharitabbo. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva. Kevalañhi idha cittapariggāhikā
atk-s0102a:1570_5: sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ padayojanaṃ katvā cittapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1573_0: 382. Evaṃ soḷasavidhena cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1573_1: kathetuṃ kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Apica bhagavatā kāyānupassanāya suddharūpapariggaho
atk-s0102a:1574_0: Tattha santanti abhiṇhasamudācāravasena saṃvijjamānaṃ. Asantanti asamudācāravasena
atk-s0102a:1574_1: vā pahīnattā vā asaṃvijjamānaṃ. Yathā cāti yena kāraṇena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1574_2: Tañca pajānātīti tañca kāraṇaṃ pajānāti. Iti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1575_0: Tattha subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti. Subhanimittaṃ
atk-s0102a:1575_1: nāma subhampi subhanimittaṃ, subhārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ. Ayonisomanasikāro nāma
atk-s0102a:1575_2: anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro anicce niccanti vā, dukkhe sukhanti vā, anattani
atk-s0102a:1575_3: attāti vā, asubhe subhanti vā manasikāro. Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando
atk-s0102a:1575_4: uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā – “atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ, tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro,
